story:
We are a Toronto based airsoft team Called SYP. (Speedy Young Players) we like to specialize in a play style called SpeedQB. Upclose and personal battles similar to paintballers. We are trying to make it big in Canada since no one else here plays this style we would like to be the first to make it popular! We have been potentially offered sponsorships but we need to raise money for new gear first and for a go pro or something similar to make Videos for our team to get noticed.

We have a page we recently started on Facebook so please LIKE it and pass ot on to your friends. It is SYP Toronto.

We will appreciate any support and Donations we get to help us grow and make this sport get more noticed! And we are all about paying it forward. So you help us and we will help you!

Thank you for taking the time to read this and have an amazing day!

story:
Introducing the first Innovative and Social Footwear Brand in Africa.  


KEEXS footwear is exciting and the first of its kind from Africa! It is Urban, Afrocentric, Sporty, Innovative and Social oriented.

Our mission is to pioneer innovation in footwear, bring exciting designs to life and empower communities through sustainable social oriented projects. 

GO TO THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE TO READ MORE ABOUT OUR SOCIAL GOALS.

We just successfully concluded our crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter:Click here for Kickstarter campaign link or image below

We achieved our first milestone funding of £17,500 by over 100%!

 

What You Get - Our Perks

The KEEXS Sneaker Collection: are exciting designs and African Inspired! Each Sneaker is unique, has a story that will inspire you and make you stand out from the crowd.

This first set of Sneaker Art draws inspiration from works of the legendary LemiGhariokwu, a Nigerian artist and designer who is most renowned for providing many of the original cover images for the recordings of Fela Kuti.

Fela Anikulapo Kuti or simply Fela was a Nigerian multi-instrumentalist, musician, composer, pioneer of the Afrobeat music genre, human rights activist, and political maverick. 



Our team is comprised of seasoned entrepreneurs, fashion designers, user experience designers, and supply experts with more than 40 years of entrepreneurial and manufacturing experience, so rest assured our products will exceed your expectations.

We are perfectionists! We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. We have identified and locked in our manufacturers who will be able to ship within stipulated days after successful project funding, so you can enjoy your very own KEEXS sneakers. Having said that, we cannot always control everything life throws at us and there are always uncertainties and risks for delay in any manufacturing process.

Although very unlikely, things sometimes do take longer than expected - but we are prepared for it and are engaging in precautionary steps to prevent any such event. Throughout the duration of the project - we will be in contact with you, frequently updating you in vivid detail, every step of the way!


THE KEEXS SOCIAL PROGRAM

story:
Hello, my name is Claire Gaudion. I am a textile designer with my own luxury British accessories label, CLAIRE GAUDION. My print and weave patterns are inspired from a kaleidoscopic vision of the colours and landscapes of my beloved island: Guernsey. My collections are all handmade in Britain and demonstrate beautiful quality and craftsmanship. They have been featured by Refinery29.com, Elle Decoration, NeverUnderdressed.com, The Times, Eurowoman DK and Country Living magazine, among others.

My label launched in 2012, with printed scarves and stationery collections, which are now stocked by some exciting UK and European retailers (you can check these out on my website, www.clairegaudion.com). My next step is to expand my woven collections and grow my business’ weaving design and production potential. To do this, I’d like to add a mechanical dobby loom to our studio. Can you help?

What We Need

Weaving looms are beautiful investments, and can be maintained in good working order for many years, so the addition of a new loom will be of benefit for years to come. Any funds that you can help us to raise will be added to our kitty for buying this new loom.

With more weaving facilities, we will be able to grow our sampling and production capacity. We also hope to be able to offer internships and employment opportunities in the near future, and adding to our studio facilities makes this even more possible. Your contributions, big or small, can help to make this happen. The more money we can raise, the better the loom we can buy (new modern dobby looms can cost £10,000 and upwards!)

We're also renting additional studio space at Whitchurch Silk Mill, which will house our new loom, and anyone who is interested can visit the mill to view the new loom in action!

How You Can Help & What You Get

To thank everyone who is able to financially support this project – here are the perks! We are offering a range of perks from our beautiful scarves and stationery collections - helping to fund this project is bit like shopping with big discounts! The PERKS we have chosen for you are outlined below (and product details can be viewed at www.clairegaudion.com).

If you would love to help, but are not able to contribute, there are other ways! Any help to spread the word to your friends and connections would be most appreciated. Here’s where you can find us online:

www.clairegaudion.com 

@clairegaudion 

facebook.com/clairegaudiondesign 

instagram.com/clairegaudion


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

story:
Ready-to-Wear Bridal

Inspired by the Quality of Couture

Marie Margot Couture is the proud winner of “Denver’s Best Designer, 2016”!  Having served Denver-area brides for 6 years, Maggie Burns now dreams of sharing her bridal creations across the United States. Maggie has created an 8-piece, ready to wear collection consisting of the same quality, attention-to-detail, and unconventional styles and colors that define the existing Marie-Margot Bridal Couture brand. Maggie has her eight unique designs for the collection illustrated in her sketchbook, has sewn four of the gowns to show at a recent fashion show, and has secured a trustworthy relationship with a manufacturer. The eight gowns, pictured below, are meant to showcase Maggie's love of unique, non-traditional styles that define her couture business. She has an inspiring story and work ethic, and has everything in place to make her dream a reality-- except the financial means to make it come to fruition! 


Where will your contribution go?

Maggie's goal is to raise at least $50,000 during this 30 day campaign. Here's where she'll spend the money:
1.) Production, material costs, and shipping of 16 samples for her 8-piece collection. One sample of each gown will be made in a size 2/4 and another in a size 10/12. 
2.) Expenses to attend and take orders at the National Bridal Market in Chicago from September 8th- 11th, 2016! These expenses include the booth reservation cost, exhibitor fees, travel, hotel, transportation, marketing materials, sales and marketing expenses, and displays. 
3.) Purchasing updated equipment (serger machine, straight-stitch machine, and dress forms) to improve quality & productivity
4.) Funds to manufacture gowns after receiving orders and to continue taking orders from bridal salons across the country and expanding the Marie-Margot Ready-to-Wear bridal collection

The 8 Gowns

The Violet Gown includes a short dress underneath a removable layered skirt for versatility and a modern twist on a traditional gown. 


Perks! (Please see Gallery page for images)

Maggie wants to appreciate your generosity! “DayDreams" by Marie-Margot is a day-to-night loungewear collection offering brides (or anyone looking for a modern take on lingerie) the flirty and feminine pieces they desire. Maggie is offering the following rewards from her designs, including pieces from the DayDreams collection. Be sure to view the Gallery page for images of the items.

  • $30- Lace neck scarf
  • $75- Brenda trapeze top- blush, black, white
  • $125- Jamie camisole and shorts set - pink, blue, white
  • $250- Mandi crop top and Harper Palazzo pants set- black, buff, white
  • $500- Jamie camisole and shorts set and Brenda trapeze top
  • $1,000- The next gown in the ready-to-wear collection will be named after you! Your name will become a part of the Marie-Margot brand and legacy. 
  • $3,000- $500 off a custom Marie-Margot Bridal Couture gown designed by Maggie herself! 
  • $5,000- We'll send you one sample of each design in the 8-piece ready-to-wear collection for display and resell in your boutique or bridal salon!


Who is Maggie & Marie-Margot Bridal Couture?

Maggie Burns is a humble, yet extremely talented bridal couture designer whose passion for design has led to her most recent aspiration-- the creation of an 8-piece ready-to-wear bridal gown collection with the intent of bringing it to bridal salons everywhere! She wants to bring her unique, unconventional bridal style to brides across the country!

Maggie's experience with couture began at a young age as she grew up inspired by her mother's skillful eye for style and sewing skills. Her mother helped Maggie and her 8 other siblings feel special and look beautiful during their graduation and wedding days by creating handmade gowns for these occasions. Fast forward to Maggie's inspirational decision to retire after years of working in Corporate America and choosing to pursue her lifelong passion of creating bridal gowns for women and helping to make them feel beautiful on such an important day. This translated to owning her own bridal couture business, Marie-Margot Bridal Couture, which didn't take long to catch the eyes of brides across the country. 

Aside from numerous compliments from the brides she has created custom couture gowns for, the most recent addition to her ever-growing collection of accolades came from 303 Magazine who named her as Best Designer this past May. Aside from bridal gowns, Maggie has also created two red carpet gowns worn at the Oscars, and has made costumes for the upcoming movie "Dear Eleanor", starring Jessica Alba. She also contributes one custom bridal gown to a needy military family every year. Maggie brings her attention to detail, her admiration of quality fabrics, her inspiration from her mother, and her love of couture to all of the hard work she does everyday. 


Additional Information

Manufacturing: Maggie has maintained a trustworthy relationship with the American man who has agreed to manufacture the gowns in large quantities for her out of his family's facility in the Guangdong province in China. This relationship has been standing since 2010 and they have made gowns for Maggie in the past that turned out exactly how she envisioned them!

Fundraising: When our $50,000 goal is met after 30 days, Maggie plans to continue the campaign using InDemand on Indiegogo's platform. This means that even after 30 days, you can still help Maggie's ready-to-wear collection grow. As a first priority, the funds raised will be used to order sample gowns. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you may not be able to contribute by donating, that doesn't mean you can't still support the campaign! Help us get the word out and send Maggie some social media love using the following links and platforms:

  • Utilize Indiegogo's share tools!
  • Share this campaign with your colleagues, coworkers, peers, friends, and family
  • Like and share Marie-Margot Bridal Couture's Facebook page and Instagram posts
  • Email us at info@mariemargot.com and show us you've shared this page on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. We'll send you a VIP invitation to the Launch Celebration Party in October 2016! 

Thank you for your support of Maggie's dream of making women look and feel beautiful, and for reading about this campaign. She feels very grateful to have contributors like you helping her reach her goal with every penny raised!

story:
Short Summary

The next generation of 3D baby carrier has arrived: More functionality, easier to use, and even more comfortable 2015 was a great first year for MiaMily. We won the Bizzie Baby Gold award with a 5 out of 5 stars and received approval stamps from the International Hip Dysplasia Institute and the Baby Carrier Industry Alliance recognizing that MiaMily develops products that consider the importance of healthy hip development during infancy. 


About this project

The next generation of 3D baby carrier has arrived: More functionality, easier to use, and even more comfortable 2015 was a great first year for MiaMily. We won the Bizzie Baby Gold award with a 5 out of 5 stars and received approval stamps from the International Hip Dysplasia Institute and the Baby Carrier Industry Alliance recognizing that MiaMily develops products that consider the importance of healthy hip development during infancy.


Through all this, we've received constant feedback and we’ve taken this to heart, and with our passion for making parent’s lives easier, we knew that we could make an even better 3D baby carrier. HIPSTER™ PLUS is a 3D baby carrier that is super comfortable for baby and parent, easily adjustable and with our special unique pouch under the hip seat, you can even replace your diaper bag, allowing you to be truly handsfree. 



What are the benefits of the 3D hip seat? We specifically engineered a carrier with a built in ergonomic 3D hip seat so that no matter which position you carry your baby, whether it’s facing in, forward facing, hip carry or back carry, your baby’s hips are always in the correct M position, knees supported at hip level, legs open and not dangling. It’s literally impossible to wear your baby wrong in our carrier. The hip seat absorbs the weight of the baby so your baby will feel much lighter on your shoulders and you’ll feel less pressure on your back. Because the baby is sitting on an extra seat, unlike a normal traditional carrier where baby has to be wrapped tightly to the parent’s body, the 3D hip seat provides more room for the baby so he won’t feel enclosed in.


The reality is shopping for a baby carrier can be overwhelming especially for a first time parent, here is how HIPSTER PLUS solves these issues:



Common issue: When you choose to take a baby carrier instead of a stroller, you will inevitably have to bring a bag with you to carry baby essentials (diapers, wipes, bottle, bib, keys, wallet, etc). 

HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: The newest feature of HIPSTER™ PLUS is the pocket under the 3D hip seat which conveniently keeps your baby items close by and you can focus on what really matters. You can now leave the house with just your baby and HIPSTER™ PLUS, no more big bulky diaper bags!



https://youtu.be/Uu9yNOFXShw

Common issue: It’s hard to understand which style of carrier is best for your family’s needs. 

HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: WithHIPSTER™ PLUS, you can wear your baby up to 9 different ways. Our unique attachment system allows you to use the carrier as a hip seat (without any attachment), or like a traditional structured carrier (using our double shoulder attachment) or like a ring sling (using our single shoulder attachment).  HIPSTER™ PLUS comes with the double shoulder attachment and you can purchase our single shoulder attachment from our "add-on" menu (see FAQ) for $30.  With HIPSTER™ PLUS, you can carry your baby 6 different ways, and if you buy the additional single shoulder attachment, you get 3 additional ways to carry your baby!

HIPSTER™ PLUS Solution: We incorporated a 3D hip seat specifically for this purpose, it ensures your baby’s hips are always in the correct M position, Knees bent, hips bent and open to the side and thighs supported. It’s impossible to position your baby wrongly.

“The International Hip Dsyplasia Institute has tested and approved our HIPSTER™ PLUS as a hip healthy product”

Common issue: Wraps and ring slings can be complicated to learn. Many moms are overwhelmed by the intricate fabric systems and dads tend to not be willing to learn  

HIPSTER PLUS solution: HIPSTER™ PLUS is very straight forward , the waist belt velcro attachment takes seconds to put on. 



8) Longer waist belt and shoulder straps to offer even a wider range of fit for people of all sizes

We listened to our backers and added two new accessories to go with your HIPSTER PLUS (compatible with the original HIPSTER)

Teething babies love to chew on the side straps and the upper part of the carrier (when forward facing) so we created the perfect dual purpose Front Drool Pad, giving baby a safe, clean place to teethe while also keeping the carrier clean.  

Easy to use (snaps on and off), Machine washable, 100% high quality cotton, 


With our infant insert, you can now carry your baby from birth.   We paid special attention to hip positioning when we designing our infant insert.  Our infant insert's base is slightly angled upwards so that your newborn's hips will be the natural fetal position!



We take safety very seriously. HIPSTER™ PLUS has been submitted and approved by global wide safety standards through SGS testing. SGS, is a world-leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company. For the US/ CANADA: HIPSTER™ PLUS meets the US safety standard ASTM F2236 and CPSIA 2014, and the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2014. For EUROPE: HIPSTER™  PLUSmeets the EN71-3 standard. GLOBALLY: HIPSTER™ PLUS meets the safety standard EN13209-2:2005.

"LOVE this carrier!!! It is SO versatile and super easy to use! This is the most comfortable carrier I have ever used!!! My son loves all the different ways we are able to wear it as well! We overheat easily with other carriers but with this one for the most part we stay nice and cool! Even during long hot days in full sun!" - Stephanie

"I will not be buying any other structural carrier but this one right here! [...] My other favorite feature is the hip seat itself you can use it to breastfeed putting it higher on your tummy to support your arm! I started using this with my 10lb baby at 7 weeks using the hipseat to nurse in public." - Cristina

"If you could only register for 1 item when you are having a baby- it should be this!" - LaDonna Chavez

"I tried so many different brands of baby carriers and only this one in my opinion most ergonomic for babies' spine and hips. It is very comfortable for both baby and mother. My daughter loves it." - Alexandra

"I absolutely luv this carrier! I have moby wrap, chicco ultra soft, good grief about four other types of infant/toddler carriers.... And none come close to the ease & comfort of this carrier." - Araceley Parra

"This is a great option for forward facing carrying. The seat provides extra support and my son loves facing out." - Chelsi Yarger Weedon

"This is the best carrier I own. I went through wrap carriers (boba and moby), mei tai, lille baby, baby bjorn original, baby bjorn miracle, and tried on multiple in stores after these failed. The little guy LOVES it. He loves facing out and seeing what is happening as we walk. He loves kicking and jumping in the seat. He is so comfortable and can sit in it for hours (until he's hungry or tired). My back is so comfortable with this carrier even as he has grown more. My husband loves wearing him in this as well and agrees it is our best carrier ... which is a good thing because the little guy hates being in a stroller for too long! Anywhere we go the stroller ends up being more of a cart for our belongings. We are so grateful to have found this carrier! " - AH



Risks & Challenges

The good news is we've done this before and boy, did we learn a lot the first time. Manufacturing is a complex process. In this past year, we’ve worked hard on improving our supply chain by partnering up with accredited manufacturers, high quality brand hardware and implemented smart quality control processes. It took a lot of sweat and tears but we can now say we are very confident in our ability to deliver HIPSTER™ PLUS to you on time. 

The only risk we foresee is in delivery but our estimates for delivery are conservative that being said, things can still go wrong. Aspects that are out of our control, such as delay delivery of components and material, fabric customized in the wrong color, will cause deadlines to be pushed back but we are experienced in overcoming obstacles and we promise we will work day and night to minimize any impact on delivery. 

In the event of unexpected delay, we will absolutely keep you updated!

UPDATE: So far, production is on schedule and we are aiming for delivery of all Indiegogo backers in August.

Short Summary 
The next generation of 3D baby carrier has arrived: More functionality, easier to use, and even more comfortable 2015 was a great first year for MiaMily. We won the Bizzie Baby Gold award with a 5 out of 5 stars and received approval stamps from the International Hip Dysplasia Institute and the Baby Carrier Industry Alliance recognizing that MiaMily develops products that consider the importance of healthy hip development during infancy. About this projectThe next generation of 3D baby carrier has arrived: More functionality, easier to use, and even more comfortable 2015 was a great first year for MiaMily. We won the Bizzie Baby Gold award with a 5 out of 5 stars and received approval stamps from the International Hip Dysplasia Institute and the Baby Carrier Industry Alliance recognizing that MiaMily develops products that consider the importance of healthy hip development during infancy.Approved by International Hip Dysplasia InstituteThrough all this, we've received constant feedback and we’ve taken this to heart, and with our passion for making parent’s lives easier, we knew that we could make an even better 3D baby carrier. HIPSTER™ PLUS is a 3D baby carrier that is super comfortable for baby and parent, easily adjustable and with our special unique pouch under the hip seat, you can even replace your diaper bag, allowing you to be truly handsfree. What are the benefits of the 3D hip seat? We specifically engineered a carrier with a built in ergonomic 3D hip seat so that no matter which position you carry your baby, whether it’s facing in, forward facing, hip carry or back carry, your baby’s hips are always in the correct M position, knees supported at hip level, legs open and not dangling. It’s literally impossible to wear your baby wrong in our carrier. The hip seat absorbs the weight of the baby so your baby will feel much lighter on your shoulders and you’ll feel less pressure on your back. Because the baby is sitting on an extra seat, unlike a normal traditional carrier where baby has to be wrapped tightly to the parent’s body, the 3D hip seat provides more room for the baby so he won’t feel enclosed in.ergonomic 3D hip seat ensures proper hip position every single timeThe reality is shopping for a baby carrier can be overwhelming especially for a first time parent, here is how HIPSTER PLUS solves these issues:

Common issue: When you choose to take a baby carrier instead of a stroller, you will inevitably have to bring a bag with you to carry baby essentials (diapers, wipes, bottle, bib, keys, wallet, etc). HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: The newest feature of HIPSTER™ PLUS is the pocket under the 3D hip seat which conveniently keeps your baby items close by and you can focus on what really matters. You can now leave the house with just your baby and HIPSTER™ PLUS, no more big bulky diaper bags!Leave the house with just your HIPSTER!https://youtu.be/Uu9yNOFXShwCommon issue: It’s hard to understand which style of carrier is best for your family’s needs. HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: WithHIPSTER™ PLUS, you can wear your baby up to 9 different ways. Our unique attachment system allows you to use the carrier as a hip seat (without any attachment), or like a traditional structured carrier (using our double shoulder attachment) or like a ring sling (using our single shoulder attachment).  HIPSTER™ PLUS comes with the double shoulder attachment and you can purchase our single shoulder attachment from our "add-on" menu (see FAQ) for $30.  With HIPSTER™ PLUS, you can carry your baby 6 different ways, and if you buy the additional single shoulder attachment, you get 3 additional ways to carry your baby!Up to 9 different ways to carry your baby.To see lifestyle photos of how to wear your baby 9 different ways, visit here

Common issue: Oftentimes, a family might need to buy two carriers due to the fact that different family members have different body types and as your child grows, they are required to invest in toddler sized carrier.
HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: HIPSTER™ PLUS is fully adjustable in the waist belt and shoulder straps that family members of different sizes can use the same carrier. We also provide an extender belt (available from our "add on" menu for $25, see more details in FAQ) which can fit up to a waist of 59 inches, HIPSTER™ PLUS can be used from newborn (with our infant insert) up to 3 years old (or 20 kg)


Common issue: As your baby grows and gets heavier, carrying your baby for long periods of time without a carrier can be very hard on your body. Wrap doesn’t provide strong back support. Ring slings puts pressure on one shoulder and there’s no lumbar support. Most structured carriers don’t have a strong waist belt 
HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: Not only does the hip seat absorbs the weight of your baby so that the weight you feel will also be significantly lighter, HIPSTER™ PLUS comes with a high waist belt (same concept as the waist protection belt that movers wear when they have to carry heavy items) to protect your lower back. 
Allows parent to have proper spinal posture

Common issue: Some carriers does not offer forward facing as an option because baby’s hips are not supported and will dangle. HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: With HIPSTER™ PLUS's 3D hip seat, which ensures that baby’s legs are always in the M positioning, so baby’s legs are well position even facing forward.  We want to offer parents the option to forward face their baby because as your baby develops, he will naturally be curious by his surroundings and forwarding facing allows your baby to explore while in the comfort and safety of your arms (same concept with turning the stroller seat forward when your baby starts to want to interact and see the world around him). We advise forward facing for short periods when baby is active. Naturally, there is a greater risk of overstimulation than with the 'facing in' position, since the child cannot actively turn away but since baby is right there with you, it allows parents to actively perceive the signals their children are giving. Parents know their children best and can tell when their child is fussy, tired or "zoned out" and it is time to switch to the 'facing in' or back carrying position.

Our hip seat ensure baby's legs are supported at hip level even facing forward



Common Issue: Hip Dysplasia is a condition where the ball of the thighbone doesn’t quite fit securely into the hip socket. If baby’s hips are stretched out too much it might distort the cup-shaped socket. Hip dysplasia doesn’t hurt for a baby, but it can lead to unnecessary permanent damage to the hips. No carrier can cause hip dysplasia if the baby doesn’t already have hip dysplasia as a pre-existing condition. In Switzerland, we have mandatory hip ultrasounds at 2 months old but not all countries require this mandatory check up and since hip dysplasia is a silent condition (no pain to the baby), sometimes hip dysplasia can be left undetected till too late.  
Hip Dsyplasia is a silent condition
HIPSTER™ PLUS Solution: We incorporated a 3D hip seat specifically for this purpose, it ensures your baby’s hips are always in the correct M position, Knees bent, hips bent and open to the side and thighs supported. It’s impossible to position your baby wrongly.
M Position - legs wide, knees bent, lifted at hip levelOur hip seat ensures your baby's legs are always in the correct M position“The International Hip Dsyplasia Institute has tested and approved our HIPSTER™ PLUS as a hip healthy product”Common issue: Wraps and ring slings can be complicated to learn. Many moms are overwhelmed by the intricate fabric systems and dads tend to not be willing to learn  HIPSTER PLUS solution: HIPSTER™ PLUS is very straight forward , the waist belt velcro attachment takes seconds to put on. HIPSTER PLUS takes only seconds to put on

Common issue: Some carriers aren't so easy to learn how to use on the first try so dads get turned off from baby wearing. Most carriers have feminine color and print design, not daddy friendly.
HIPSTER™ PLUS solution: HIPSTER™ PLUS is very easy to learn how to use on the first try. We purposely choose uni-sex colors because we want the parent to feel good about wearing the carrier.
Due to the manufacture condition, HIPSTER™ PLUS is only offered in Stone Grey for now. New colors will be release depending on the total quantity of the pledges.


1) Built in storage space under the hip seat

Leave your diaper bag at home

2)	Anti slip guard and extra padding on 3D hip seat





3) Smart adjustable system so you can adjust from the front and the back to making it even easier to adjust your fit no matter which position you are wearing your baby4)	Special Velcro that doesn’t stick to clothing5) Upgraded hardware to Duraflex buckles and YKK zippers. Zipper has an auto lock mechanism6) Double Security buckles

double safety buckles for a strong hold
7) Larger side pocket to fit your latest smart phone
8) Longer waist belt and shoulder straps to offer even a wider range of fit for people of all sizesWe listened to our backers and added two new accessories to go with your HIPSTER PLUS (compatible with the original HIPSTER)Teething babies love to chew on the side straps and the upper part of the carrier (when forward facing) so we created the perfect dual purpose Front Drool Pad, giving baby a safe, clean place to teethe while also keeping the carrier clean.  Easy to use (snaps on and off), Machine washable, 100% high quality cotton, Ultimate coverage to protect your carrierWith our infant insert, you can now carry your baby from birth.   We paid special attention to hip positioning when we designing our infant insert.  Our infant insert's base is slightly angled upwards so that your newborn's hips will be the natural fetal position!Our 3D hip seat provides leg room for your newborn so it's not squeezed against your bodyWe take safety very seriously. HIPSTER™ PLUS has been submitted and approved by global wide safety standards through SGS testing. SGS, is a world-leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company. For the US/ CANADA: HIPSTER™ PLUS meets the US safety standard ASTM F2236 and CPSIA 2014, and the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2014. For EUROPE: HIPSTER™  PLUSmeets the EN71-3 standard. GLOBALLY: HIPSTER™ PLUS meets the safety standard EN13209-2:2005."LOVE this carrier!!! It is SO versatile and super easy to use! This is the most comfortable carrier I have ever used!!! My son loves all the different ways we are able to wear it as well! We overheat easily with other carriers but with this one for the most part we stay nice and cool! Even during long hot days in full sun!" - Stephanie"I will not be buying any other structural carrier but this one right here! [...] My other favorite feature is the hip seat itself you can use it to breastfeed putting it higher on your tummy to support your arm! I started using this with my 10lb baby at 7 weeks using the hipseat to nurse in public." - Cristina"If you could only register for 1 item when you are having a baby- it should be this!" - LaDonna Chavez"I tried so many different brands of baby carriers and only this one in my opinion most ergonomic for babies' spine and hips. It is very comfortable for both baby and mother. My daughter loves it." - Alexandra"I absolutely luv this carrier! I have moby wrap, chicco ultra soft, good grief about four other types of infant/toddler carriers.... And none come close to the ease & comfort of this carrier." - Araceley Parra"This is a great option for forward facing carrying. The seat provides extra support and my son loves facing out." - Chelsi Yarger Weedon"This is the best carrier I own. I went through wrap carriers (boba and moby), mei tai, lille baby, baby bjorn original, baby bjorn miracle, and tried on multiple in stores after these failed. The little guy LOVES it. He loves facing out and seeing what is happening as we walk. He loves kicking and jumping in the seat. He is so comfortable and can sit in it for hours (until he's hungry or tired). My back is so comfortable with this carrier even as he has grown more. My husband loves wearing him in this as well and agrees it is our best carrier ... which is a good thing because the little guy hates being in a stroller for too long! Anywhere we go the stroller ends up being more of a cart for our belongings. We are so grateful to have found this carrier! " - AH





  Risks & Challenges  
The good news is we've done this before and boy, did we learn a lot the first time. Manufacturing is a complex process. In this past year, we’ve worked hard on improving our supply chain by partnering up with accredited manufacturers, high quality brand hardware and implemented smart quality control processes. It took a lot of sweat and tears but we can now say we are very confident in our ability to deliver HIPSTER™ PLUS to you on time. 
The only risk we foresee is in delivery but our estimates for delivery are conservative that being said, things can still go wrong. Aspects that are out of our control, such as delay delivery of components and material, fabric customized in the wrong color, will cause deadlines to be pushed back but we are experienced in overcoming obstacles and we promise we will work day and night to minimize any impact on delivery. 
In the event of unexpected delay, we will absolutely keep you updated!
UPDATE: So far, production is on schedule and we are aiming for delivery of all Indiegogo backers in August.

story:
Who I am:

My name is Melanie Pullman and I am a Fashion Designer. My brand is Melanie Joyce (trademark pending) which is my first and middle name. I'm a Colorado native with a San Fransisco vibe, which merges the laid back aspects of Colorado with the creative & individualistic aspects of San Fransisco. I have a Master of Fine Arts in Fashion Design and I currently instruct Fashion Design at an Art & Design College in Colorado while independently working as a Designer. I'm excited about building my brand and I need your help!

What makes me different outside of my passion and skills? The answer is, I have a vision. My vision is to creatively help women feel sophisticated, bold and sexy in my designs. What you wear and how you wear it is a form of communication to others. Have you thought about what your non-verbal communication through your clothing says? If not, I have. DO less and BE more without much talking. My passion, & drive brought me to this point. I need your support to take things to the next level.

If you can support financially, you can choose from sponsorship packages that come with perks. You can also create any amount you'd like to donate...just click of the pink "Back it" button. No amount is too small!

What I Need

  • $30,000 start-up funding . Here's how the costs break down:

Ongoing Marketing & Branding: 

$5,000

  • Social Media Campaigns (Facebook, Instagram)
  • Branding (labels, tags, boxes, bags, ect)
  • Photoshoots (photographer, models)

Production Cost for Designs: 

$15,000

  • Price point category: Affordable Luxury ($400-$1,500) 
  • Made-to-Measure (Custom) designs will be produced locally in Colorado to start

ULFC Gala and Fashion Show featuring Melanie Joyce-September 2018 (See event details below)

$7,000

  • Production of 4 mini collections 
  • Hair
  • Make-up 
  • Promotion 
  • Photoshoots
  • Fashion Styling

Technology 

$3,000

  • Website custom integration 
  • Ongoing hosting and website maintenance

The Impact

Your sponsorship will make the above possible. This is a start to the Melanie Joyce brand that will begin with made-to-measure. After becoming profitable, the brand will expand into ladies footwear.  You will be apart of building this brand as your sponsorship and other support will aid in doing so. 

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks, but I'm up for the challenge. What qualifies me?

  • I'm a fearless and faith-filled entrepreneur 
  • Over 8 years of retail experience so I understand my target market
  • Master of Fine Arts in Fashion Design, so I have the skills and education
  • Succeeded in areas of business that's applicable to the fashion industry as well as the e-commerce world 
  • Failed in the past so I've had opportunities to learn and grow from

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're unable to contribute financially, there are other ways you can help:

  • Share this campaign with specific people you have in mind that will support YOU supporting ME. 
  • Share this campaign with specific people who are passionate about supporting women in business.
  • Share this campaign with specific people who are passionate about supporting minorities in business. 
  • Share this campaign with specific people who are passionate about art and fashion!  

ULCFA Gala & Fashion Show Details:

What: Leadership & Legacy: Walk Your Achievement Gala which recognizes impactful leaders in the community.

Where: Denver, CO

How I fit in: There will be a fashion show that will feature Melanie Joyce Made-to-Measure designs. I hope you can come support me and the community! 

If you would like to attend, please contact Michelle Trail for ticket and sponsorship information: mdptrail@gmail.com

story:
What Are Elegant Insights Braille Creations?

The Elegant Insights product line consists of traditional jewelry items, such as bracelets, necklaces, and earrings, as well as fun accessories such as purse charms, cane charms, and even bookmarks.  All of our jewelry, accessories, and gifts feature the Elegant Insights tactile twist...Braille!  Jewelry can make a fashion statement all its own, and combined with personalization, the unique look of Braille, and the pretty design elements of gleaming contemporary metals and natural, opaque gemstones, our products offer an opportunity for self-expression unlike anything you've seen (or felt!) before.

              

                


Background

Hi!  My name is Laura Legendary, and I am the unlikely entrepreneur behind the Elegant Insights Braille jewelry and accessories collection.  What makes me an unlikely entrepreneur?  For starters, I am a business owner who is blind.   

Elegant Insights products were inspired by a gift I received while struggling through an agonizing time in my life, the loss of my beloved husband, Billy.  Life is a journey consisting of many twists and turns, some of them painful and difficult to navigate.  So, for a bit of inspiration, I was given a tiny little talisman to help me keep moving forward.  It was a "worry stone," with the word "survivor" engraved on one side, and to my surprise, the same word embossed in Braille on the other.  Right then and there, the light bulb went on over my head, and the entire concept of the Elegant Insights collection came to me in a single flash of inspiration.

Never one to ignore my intuition or neglect an insight, I set about the task of finding a manufacturer to assist me in bringing my ideas to life.  The search began in August, 2009, lasting nearly two years.

At first, I sought a manufacturer already mass-producing Braille jewelry.  I looked everywhere, including out-of-country options, and realized that there was no such animal.  Besides, I really wanted to find a manufacturer in the USA, since I am a flag-waving maniac, after all.  

Unable to find a ready-made resource, I realized that if I was going to bring my  ideas to life, I would need to get to work! And so I did, and Elegant Insights was born. In the years since, I have designed dozens of pieces, hand crafted them with a team in the USA, and sold them via my web site, via phone, and at trade shows across the country.

The Collections:

Here are some examples of our incredible collections. See more at our web site, http://elegantinsightsjewelry.com:

The Vain Cane Collection:  Why should you be the only one who gets to wear jewelry?  Dress up your favorite traveling companion with a fun flash of style!

              


The Touch of Purse-onality Collection:  It's jewelry for your handbag!  A glittering waterfall of gems, beads, and charm embellishments cascade down a length of chain, with a Braille embossed charm at the bottom.

   


The Text Messaging Collection:  Jewelry and accessories that you can wear and share or give as gifts.  That's what we call tactile style!

  


Themed Collections: Complete sets of jewelry and accessories in styles that complement each other - and you. Choose from The Falling in Leaf Collection or the Touch of Nature Collection (selections pictured below), or view others at our website.

      

              


Use of Funds

Elegant Insights has been in business for five years, and we are now presented with a tremendous opportunity.  We have been selected to showcase our products online with the new Amazon Handmade Services platform.  With the additional exposure, higher-volume platform, and increased marketing, we expect sales to grow dramatically.

In order to create sufficient inventory to meet demand, I will need additional capital to:

  • Hire two additional craftspeople;
  • Purchase workbenches, tools, and supplies for these two artisans;
  • Purchase the sheet metal, parts and components for jewelry making; and
  • Procure the hand tools needed to put it all together. 

This opportunity will mean worldwide exposure for my beautiful Braille embossed jewelry, and customers who shop on Amazon seeking special gifts for people with vision loss will discover a distinctive collection of jewelry and accessories all handcrafted, made in the USA, and embossed in crisp, readable, Braille.  Can you imagine a more meaningful and personal gift to give a loved one with vision loss?


The Plan:

There are many ways you can help!  While any donation amount will be appreciated, some things are more valuable than money.  You can make a huge contribution by letting me leverage your network.  Please share my project with your friends, fans, followers, and family.  Tweet out my campaign link, share it on your Facebook page, post this info on your favorite email lists, forward this message to your email contacts.  No effort on my behalf will go to waste, because I am passionate about what I'm doing, and will let no opportunity pass me by.  Contributions will go directly to expanding Elegant Insights.  I need two workbenches, as well as tools, sheet metal, components and jewelry crafting supplies for two new employees, who will also require training...for example, I will need to teach them to read Braille!  Want to know more about how you can help?  Just ask!


About Laura Legendary, the visionary behind Elegant Insights:

The Creative Force: In addition to running the day-to-day operation of Elegant Insights Braille Creations, I am also the creative force and designer behind every product. 

The Public Speaker: As a long-time advocate for people with disabilities, I have presented disability awareness workshops and seminars to a wide variety of audiences, from government and corporate managers to community groups and health care providers. 

The Educator: I have authored curricula used by the in-home health care industry as continuing education instruction for independent home care workers, family caregivers, and nursing professionals.  As an educator, I have helped thousands of caregivers to learn best communication and etiquette practices, so as to create a better quality of life for their elderly and disabled clients. 

The Blogger: As a blogger, I have shared my expertise in accessibility and assistive technology for people with vision loss on my blog, Accessible Insights. 

The Media Personality: I am also the co-founder of The Fashionability Channel, an audio podcast created to enable people with disabilities to enjoy greater access to fashion and style information.  Our mission is to bridge the gap between the fashion industry and people with disabilities, so that people from all walks of life are better represented in print and digital media.

Most recently, I have been invited to host a radio show for the American Council of the Blind, which will air on the ACB Radio network.  Check out the debut of Legendary Insights at 5PM Pacific Time on Thursday, April 8th, 2016.

The Public Speaker:
As a long-time advocate for people with disabilities, I have presented
disability awareness workshops and seminars to a wide variety of audiences,
from government and corporate managers to community groups and health care
providers.  
The Educator:
I have authored curricula used by the in-home health care industry as
continuing education instruction for independent home care workers, family
caregivers, and nursing professionals. 
As an educator, I have helped thousands of caregivers to learn best
communication and etiquette practices, so as to create a better quality of life
for their elderly and disabled clients.  
The Blogger:
As a blogger, I have shared my expertise in accessibility and assistive
technology for people with vision loss on my blog, Accessible Insights.  
The Media Personality:
I am also the co-founder of The Fashionability Channel, an audio podcast
created to enable people with disabilities to enjoy greater access to fashion
and style information.  Our mission is to
bridge the gap between the fashion industry and people with disabilities, so
that people from all walks of life are better represented in print and digital
media. 
Most
recently, I have been invited to host a radio show for the American Council of
the Blind, which will air on the ACB Radio network.  Check out the debut of Legendary Insights at
5PM Pacific Time on Thursday, April 8th, 2016.

story:
The Curiosity Kitten Is Sleeping!

And so the concept for this adorable pin was created. "Curiosity is not Entitlement," Is a mantra I use whenever people ask me questions that are wayyyyyy too personal. You should feel secure in declining to answer without worrying about social taboos. Let the kitten sleep.

The fragments of ideas kept bouncing around in my head until eventually the symbolism came together. It's a play on words of "Curiosity killed the cat." So, we let the kitten sleep. It's no coincidence that they are snuggling in a quilt with the same colors and pattern as the trans flag.

Greetings! I am Odin, I am a nonbinary individual that makes shiny things and yell on the internet. And because I am obsessed with enamel pins, I decided to try my hand at creating my own.

The design for this pin went through a small set of iterations, until a lovely friend took pity on my lack of skills and came up with an adorable design:

The final art was created by a dear friend HYDRAJEN. They make fantastically spooky creations, so be sure to check them out here:

https://www.etsy.com/shop/Hydrajen

https://www.facebook.com/hydrajen/

https://www.instagram.com/hydrajen.art

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make this pin run possible, I need to have a minimum order of 50 pins for the manufacturer to accept my order. 

You will receive an enamel pin (or more if you selected the higher tiers) of the finalized Curiosity Kitten design. The pins will be roughly 1in wide.

But then, there are STICKERS!!!!! Everyone loves stickers. Slap some stickers on everything! The stickers will be larger at roughly 3in x 2.5in

I would like to go well over that goal in order to make a bigger impact on selected charities to benefit from this project:

The Impact

Part of the proceeds are going toward trans based organizations. $1.50 of each pin and .50 cents of each sticker will be going toward:

The Trevor Project:

https://www.thetrevorproject.org

The Transgender Legal Defense & Education Fund

http://www.transgenderlegal.org

And my local branch of Planned Parenthood, because they have been extremely helpful during my own transition and I would like to be able to give back.

https://www.plannedparenthood.org/

The more contributors, the bigger the donations to the three organizations.

Timeline

  • January 2019 - Campaign ends and funds collected
  • Discussion with manufacturer and designs finalized Mid- End of February
  • Production Begins March
  • Shipments come in Mid May
  • Final Orders Shipped to Customers June 2019

Risks & Challenges

This is the very first time I have done an enamel pin run, so there is a bit of a learning curve when it comes to budgeting and timelines.

However I am an extreme pessimist, so I have been budgeting for the worst case scenarios and planned for the longest times so that we will be surprised when things come by earlier than expected.

I am not sure of the scale that this project will go, and I am but one person.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no worries! ^_^ There are lots of ways you can get the word out about this campaign

  • Share the campaign on Twitter and Instagram using the hashstags #WontBeErased #TransArt #TransCrowdFund #enamelpins #pingame
  • Use the IndieGoGo sharing tools to help spread the word!

And that's all there is to it. Feel free to comment with any questions about the campaign and I would be happy to answer!

I want to thank you so much for taking the time to look at the project and helping impact the lives of trans people! 

-Odin

story:
Goodbye Frustration.

Hello Beautiful Eyes!

The most frustrating and time-consuming part of putting on makeup, by far, is applying false eyelashes. Traditional false eyelashes are applied with glue. This glue is difficult to apply and gets where you don't want it to. It's not uncommon to glue your eyelids shut! It often ends in failure, at which point you need to clean off all the glue from your eyes and lashes and start over again. 

Men, if you're wondering why your lady is late for your date, it's because she's fighting with her glued-on eyelashes! 

There are newer magnetic lashes but they simply don't work! They get terrible reviews and 1 to 2 star ratings. They are nearly impossible to put on, stick out, weigh down your lashes, can pull out your natural lashes and can pinch your skin. 

 

 

The LashLiner System is different! 

The LashLiner System couldn't be easier to use. The eyeliner is applied the same as any eyeliner. After applying the eyeliner, you simply hold the lashes up to the eyeliner and they smoothly "click" into place. That's it!

Have an itch on your eyelid? No problem! Just pull the lash off, scratch that itch, and put it back into place instantly! Finally, you can have lashes which are ridiculously easy to apply, comfortable enough to wear through the day, and flexible enough to adjust to your active lifestyle. 

Our secret is the patent-pending cosmetic-grade magnetic eyeliner paired with high quality lashes embedded with incredibly strong yet tiny magnets. No glue! No sticky tape adhesive! Just beautiful eyeliner and beautiful lashes.

 

Choose Your Style

All of The LashLiner System kits come with our amazing high quality LashLiner Magnetic Eyeliner in black and a pair of beautiful reusable LashLiner Lashes.

Our first two styles of LashLiner Lashes are the Seattle and the Los Angeles.

 

The Los Angeles

 

 

Just like it's namesake, the Los Angeles Lash is captivating. The Los Angeles is a gorgeous, full, wispy lash that tapers for comfort.  The shape and design maintains the look of real lashes that are thick and luxurious. Los Angeles is the ultimate day to night lash. They're classy enough for the office while being glamorous enough for a night out on the town!

The Seattle

The Seattle is named for the classy combination of style and understated glamour that the city of Seattle is known for. This half lash accents and blends with your natural lash line while giving your lashes a boost. The wispy design looks like your real lashes, only better. It's the perfect classy lash!

 

Why Choose The LashLiner System? 

• LashLiner is SAFE - We use FDA approved ingredients and it's latex free
• LashLiner is EASY - it can be put on with one hand - No special skills or makeup artist needed 
• LashLiner is FAST - No more frustration and no more gluing your eyes shut! 
• LashLiner is STRONG - It holds but is easily repositionable 
• LashLiner is COMFORTABLE - No more seeing magnets or having sagging lashes 
• Most importantly, LashLiner makes your eyes look BEAUTIFUL!

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We're confident LashLiner will be a winner - We'll use this funding for our first production runs and marketing so we can share The LashLiner System with everyone.

Our goal is to be shipping The LashLiner System to you within 90 days of the completion of the kickstarter campaign. We are well on our way to that goal.

We are working with our lab to perfect our already awesome prototypes. After that we will do the required testing. We don't have any concerns about testing because The LashLiner System is entirely comprised of safe and FDA approved ingredients that are currently being used in cosmetics

US and International Patent Pending

story:
Hey Indiegogo! 

We are Lindsey and Josh and our company is Ginju Wallets.

We are here to launch our personalized wallet in a variety of materials, colors, and patterns.

The Story

As recent graduates from the University of California at Santa Barbara, we always searched for a trendy, unique wallet that was small enough to carry on the go. We noticed that a lot of students would carry around a rubber band that held their student Id’s, credit cards, and cash so that a bulky wallet did not take up more room in their already stuffed backpacks. With such busy schedules and so many things to constantly carry, we wanted an easily accessible and functional design that complemented and did not complicate our lifestyle.

 

 

We want to offer a thin pocket-sized wallet with enough pockets and elastic straps to hold the essential cards and cash for the day. With the Ginju Wallet you won't have to carry around those unneeded receipts, extra gift cards, and heavy coin pouches because it has the perfect amount of space for all your essentials.

 

 

Manufacturing

After we came up with the concept for Ginju "magic wallets," we were faced with the extremely difficult task of finding a manufacturer that met our high expectations of quality and efficiency. We worked very closely with our manufacturer for months tediously dissecting the design, size, and style of our wallets. 

Pre Prototype Sketches

We feel that we have selected the perfect materials, colors, and designs to make our Ginju Wallets unique. Our manufacturer hand assembles, stamps, and prints the wallets to our exact specifications. 

Your pledge will go directly towards the printing, sewing, molding, production, and final assembly cost of the wallets that we want to order on a larger scale to meet our minimum order quantity. We have spent months selecting and improving the quality and development of this wallet based upon a variety of colors and designs. We are really excited to see which wallets are most popular and to see what suggestions you have so that we can offer even more colors and patterns.

 

Rewards

Ginju Wallets are offered in a few different materials. Our Black, Dark Brown, Dark Blue, and Turquoise wallets are hand crafted out of genuine leather from one of the top leather manufacturers. Our All American wallet is crafted out of PU leather and printed with a trendy American flag design. Lastly, our Gold and Silver wallets are crafted out of a premium glitter fabric that does not rub off when you hold it.

$1 - We appreciate your support!

$23 - One wallet (1 of 4 genuine leather color options)

$25 - One wallet (Silver glitter, Gold glitter, or American flag design)

$44 - Two wallets (2 of 4 genuine leather color options)

$48 - Two wallets (Silver glitter, Gold glitter and/or American flag design)

$80 - Four wallets (ALL of our genuine leather color options) 

$150 - (ALL of our 7 Ginju Wallets; 4 leather and 3 specialty)

 

Genuine Leather Options:

 Black

Dark Brown

Dark Blue

Turquoise

 

Specialty Options:

 

The All American 

Silver & Gold Glitter

 

Design

Size: L: 4.2 in & W: 2.75 in

4 outside pockets & elastic inside bands on both sides

Thank You!

 

We can’t wait to share our Ginju Wallets with you!

We Need Your Support!

We are really excited to launch our first project and in order to meet our funding goals, we need your support. We are doing everything we can to introduce our new wallet to friends, family, and the social media world. If you could do something as simple as share our link on facebook, like our instagram or tweet about us, our project could go a long way! We really want to drive traffic to our page and share our product with everyone! 

Shipping Products

We will be ready to go into production if we have met our funding goal after the 45 day period! We have been and will continue to work closely with our manufacturer to ensure that everything runs smoothly. The production and shipment time will take a total of 35 days until we receive the wallets. Once we receive the wallets, we will ship them out ASAP to all of our amazing backers! If you need to make any adjustments to your shipping address or order, please use the comment section and we will make sure to get back to you!

Risks & challenges

We have gone through several prototype revisions over the past few months refining and perfecting every aspect of our wallets from the material, to the colors and patterns, size, stitching, and printing specifications to ensure the best quality. We risk not meeting our minimum funding needs after all of the time and financial investment we have put in over the last few months. We don’t anticipate any setbacks because we have set realistic timelines and have built a strong relationship with our manufacturer. We pledge to be upfront and honest throughout the process. We will consistently post updates on the order placements, shipping times, and deadlines.

We can’t wait to get the ball rolling on this project!

Thank you so much for your support!

-Lindsey & Josh

story:
Short Summary

Outlive Apparel is a brand new clothing company from western Massachusetts. The clothing company spreads a strong message about leading yourself, and doing what makes you happy.

The Plan

The plan is to print 100 shirts, 25 of each design. This will cost a total of $1,000. The shirts will be printed on Bella+Canvas c3001 at Thelemic Printshop in Norwich, CT. The pre-ordered shirts will be sold at a lower cost of $15, plus shipping. Once the pre-orders are done, and shirts are printed. The shirts will be at a higher price.

The Message

"Outlive your dream." That is the motto behind Outlive Apparel. We all have dreams, and we all have passions. Outlive Apparel has a message that everybody can relate to. Lead yourself, and do what makes you happy. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have any money, and still want to help out, you still can! You can help out by spreading the word, and sharing this campaign. If you want to donate, but aren't really interested in buying a shirt, you can also do that. Just click "Contribute Now," and select your donation.

story:
Short Summary

I have been a seamstress from Boulder, CO I spiked an interest in sewing when I was a young girl watching my grandma sew and always wanting to "help" her in her sewing room. When I was about 18 years old I decided I didn't like the current fashion and wanted to start making my own clothes. This became a bigger passion with time and decided I wanted to travel all over the country selling what I made and so it began. Now I have started up an Etsy and have my clothes in local shops in the area. I am getting ready to have my clothing in a storefront and I have an interest in adding a male tailoring form so I can professionally branch out into men's fashion! With this kickstarter project I will be able to custom make mens clothing and branch out into a whole new area of my fashion design!

What We Need & What You Get

My kickstarter goal will help me be able to fully start my dream of becoming a full time professional seamstress. The money raised will go toward funding a serger sewing machine as well as a male tailoring form for custom fittings!
