story:
Create your own individualized 3d printed smartphone cases.
A big thanks goes out to all our supporters!

 

Free Shipping in the U.S. and the EU. Only add the 4€ for the rest of the world.

 

Find us on Facebook, Google+,  Twitter and visit us on http://trin.do!

 

highest protection – changeable designs – individual creations - crazy functions – camera lenses option – community – many smartphone models- absolutely unique

Deutsche Version

English Version

We need your support to start production. Pick one of our perks on the right and you´re in! A big Thank You to all those who take part, tell their friends about us and / or like us on Facebook!

You can start designing your cases at the beginning of August

 

Supported Smartphone Models:

 

About Us

We are Felix, Nathanael, Philipp and Justin, all from Munich, Germany and between 20 and 25 years old. If you want to have more information about us, visit our homepage. 

The material and production process

Our cases are 3d printed and made of a high quality plastic powder. They are produced on professional laser-sinter machines. The quality of the material is impressive. It is stable and flexible at the same time, making it extremely durable. This makes our safety system, the “Smartbags” and our clip-system possible, which both would not work without the special features of our material.

Our products are made in Germany and provide the highest quality available on the 3d-printing market.

Our clip-system

It is constructed in a way that allows switching the clip without having to take the bumper off. It´s a clever system that survives falls from great heights and it still allows for easy and fast switching of the clip.

Because you, our Indiegogo supporters, are the ones making this possible, you´ll be granted exclusive access to our shop and configurator before the public does. Further, you´re cases will be shipped weeks before the first official ones. Guaranteed.

Professional Clips

We will have professional designed clips in our shop. 

Those include the city, wallet, magnet, stand and a few more at the moment. We already have the first designers onboard to bring more and more professional designed clips. Those will add awesome design and functional abilities to your phone.

The wallet clip

You can store your ID, drivers licence, credit cards, business cards and bills on the back of your smartphone. Your most important things stored in one place.

The clip can hold up to 4 cards. Even with only one card in it, everything will be safe, thanks to a clever system.

 

The Multi-angle Standclip

Place your phone in portrait and landscape at different angles.

 

The Magnetic Clip

Stick your phone to metallic surfaces.

 

Our Cityclips

Choose your favourite cities and clip them on your smartphone.

 

 

 We will start with the following cities and add more from time to time.

 

 

Camera Lens Option

 

Our camera lenses work for every smartphone model we offer. They are attached to the clips using built-in magnets. If you choose this option, each of your clips will have an integrated magnet to attach the lenses to.

The Lens set includes 180° view angle Fisheye, a 2x zoom and a macro lens.

Photo taken without lens

with Fisheye lens

with 2x Zoom lens

with macro lens

 

 

The Bumper and its safety functions:

 

 

 

We invested most of our research time into our safety system. Our Smartbags protect the weakest spot of your smartphone, the edges. The display is protected by very small ridges in the corners, while the back is perfectly guarded by our clips. At the same time, your touch experience on the screen won´t be influenced, since the Bumper is lowered on the sides to not reach into the display.

Unique creations

You can create your own cases using our online-configurator. Not just a picture that is being printed on top. You can generate new forms within your case. This way, you can be sure that nobody else has the same case as you.

For ideas or examples of what is actually possible, you can take a look at our professional designs or designs made by the community or friends. You can either continue work on a design that has been shared or order it without changes. You will surely find the perfect design.

The configurator and its functions

It is still in development, but here are some screenshots illustrating what it will look like:

We offer the following ways of shaping:

-          Cutting out material to form a silhouette, e.g. the Panda
-          Relief engraved, e.g. the Indiegogo clip
-          Relief put on, e.g. the elephant

 

 

To do this, you are equipped with the following tools:

-          Pencil (diameter, incl. a ruler for better results)
-          Circle (radius and thickness)
-          Spline (diameter and further settings regarding the form)
-          Eraser (diameter, incl. a ruler)
-          Text (fonts, sizes and further settings)

 

We´re basically covering every function you know from standard drawing software. All those feature are online, without the need to install any software.

In addition to that, you can upload an image and have it either engraved or put on. The configurator converts your image into black and white and you have a preview on how it will look on your case. You can choose different filters and settings to have the best possible result.

Colors

 

 

Blue, red, wine-red, violet, turquoise, yellow, lemon, pink, green, black and white can be choosen.

Our cases are specially coated, making them dirt repellent.

What do you need the money for?

We need the 30.000 € for the following:

-          cover the expenses of our 200+ prototypes
-          cover the development of our configurator
-          start producing in big numbers
-          purchase professional equipment for post processing
-          speed up designing, making more smartphone models possible

 

The biggest smartphone case in the world

Everybody that supports us by buying one of our perks, will have his name engraved in the biggest smartphone case of the world! The case will be printed directly after our Indiegogo campaign. Every supporter will be reserved at least 1in² on the case. The attempt on the record will be handed in at Guinness World Records after successful funding.

Trin.do for Enterprises

We develop the logo of your choice together with you. We can even realize things that are not possible using the online-configurator we will offer completely new ways of designing, that couldn’t be done like that in the online-configurator, like three-dimensional objects or logos on the case. In consultation with you we can develop your own color and individual cases for every employee you can also choose, whether you want Smartbags or the clip-system. For an additional charge, we offer multicolor and the development of cases for smartphone models that we don´t offer naturally. Please contact us for further information.                                                                                                              

The future

Right now, we´re working on the following features:

Clips that allow for fixation on your bike or car, more gadgets (e.g. passive music amplifiers) and other crazy functions. Stay tuned ;)

FAQ

How do I get my perk in your shop?

We will send you a coupon code via e-mail. After entering the code, you will have enough credits to buy the perk you chose.

I bought a new Smartphone. Do I have to buy all my clips a second time?

Sadly, yes. Most often your “old” clips won´t fit a different smartphone model. Still, we don´t want to charge you for all of those clips that you already bought for your old smartphone. Therefore, you will be granted special discount on those that you already bought for your old smartphone. 

Can I clean my case if it gets dirty?

You can easily clean it with warm water. Our cases are specially coated, which makes them easy-to-clean. You can also put them in the dishwasher to get better results. But be aware that they could lose some of their color-intensity after being washed a few times.

 

There is no case available for my smartphone, what can I do?

Basically, we want to offer a wide variety of different smartphone models and are constantly working on enlarging our portfolio. We hope you understand that we won´t be creating cases for older models like the IPhone 3g/s. But you can be sure that, if we offered your model once, you will be able to buy it even years later with the newest designs. If you have a new smartphone that we do not support, and think we should do so, write us an E-Mail to: idea@trin.do. We are looking forward to your ideas and suggestions.

How thick is a case?

Thickness varies from model to model and from clip to clip, but is noted next to every case. We guarantee that we create our cases as thin as possible, and that thin cases are a top priority for us. An IPhone 4 case has a thickness of max. 1,8mm including the clip.

At the moment we are already developing much thinner cases. With the help of our smartbags we can ensure the safety of your smartphone even on extremely thin cases. We assume that this might well be so on the later delivered cases.

 

Is there any possibility of you NOT delivering at all?

No. We will deliver. Our prototypes are already in a well advanced state. Furthermore, our partners are absolutely reliable and have lots of experience. 

Which payment options do you offer?

During our Indiegogo campaign, you can use your credit card or PayPal. As soon as our shop is online, there will be more more payment options.

 

Do I have to adjust my designs for every smartphone model?

No. We automatically scale your designs for every model. Surely there can be distortions, but those are most often minimal and not recognizable. If you choose the “share”-option to share your design with the community, your design will be automatically scaled to fit every smartphone model we offer. This way, a friend of you can choose the same design on a different smartphone.

How much does the shipping cost?

Shipping is free in the U.S. and the EU. Please add 4€ for the rest of the world.

I may have a new smartphone in two months!

This is no problem. You will choose your model not before our configurator is online in August 2013.

 

In August 2013, you can begin creating your cases. 14 days later the cases will be on your doorstep.

For further information you can visit our homepage www.trin.do or like us on Facebook – www.facebook.com/Trindo3dPrinting !

Thank you for your support!!!!

 

 

English Version

Deutsche Version

Was ist Indiegogo und Crowdfunding?

Für Startups bietet Crowdfunding eine gute Möglichkeit, an Kapital zu kommen. Auf der Plattform Indiegogo wird durch Vorverkäufe bestimmter Produkte Geld eingesammelt, um die Kosten für Entwicklung und Produktion decken zu können. Nach erfolreicher Finanzierung wird das Kapital für die Herstellung eingesetzt und das TrindoCase kann verschickt werden.

Dafür benötigen wir eure Unterstützung. Einfach einen unserer Perks auf der rechten Seite kaufen und ihr seid mit dabei. Vielen Dank an alle Leute die sich beteiligen, über uns erzählen und uns auf Facebook liken.

Anfang August könnt ihr euch eure Cases auf unserer Homepage erstellen.

 

Unterstützte Smartphone Modelle:

 

Wer steckt dahinter?

Das sind wir. Felix, Nathanael, Philipp und Justin. Wir sind aus München, Deutschland und alle zwischen 20 und 25 Jahren alt. Wenn du mehr über uns erfahren möchtest, kannst du uns auf unserer Homepage besuchen. www.trin.do/about-us

Das Material und der Herstellungsprozess

Unsere Cases kommen aus dem 3D Drucker und werden auf professionellen Laser-sinter Maschinen aus einem Kunstoffpulver gefertig. Die Eigenschaften des Materials sind herausragend. Es ist stabil und flexibel zugleich, was bedeutet, dass es fast nicht kaputt zu bekommen ist. Das ermöglicht uns unser Schutzsystem, die „Smartbags“ und unser Clipsystem einzusetzen, das ohne die Eigenschaften des Materials nicht funktionieren würde.

Unsere Produkte sind Made in Germany und bieten die höchste Qualität, die auf dem 3d-Druck Marktverfügbar ist.

Unser Clipsystem

Unser Clipsystem wurde so entwickelt, dass du deine Designs jederzeit wechseln kannst. Ohne den Bumper entfernen zu müssen. Es ist ein ausgeklügeltes System, das bei Stürzen perfekt hält und trotzdem leicht zu wechseln ist. Ein Wechsel dauert nur wenige Sekunden.

Da die Sache erst durch euch, unsere Indiegogo-Unterstützer, möglich wird, erhaltet ihr einen exklusiven Zugang zu unserem Shop und dem Konfigurator vor der Öffentlichkeit. Außerdem werden eure Hüllen garantiert bereits Wochen vor den ersten offiziellen Auslieferungen versendet.

Professional Clips


Wir werden in unserem Shop professionell erstellte Designs anbieten.

Diese schließen unter anderem die City, Geldbeutel, Magnet, Ständer und ein paar weitere Clips ein. Wir arbeiten bereits mit den ersten Designern zusammen um mehr und mehr professionelle Clips anbieten zu können. 

Der Geldbeutelclip

Mit dem Clip kannst du Ausweis, Führerschein, EC- und Kreditkarten, Visitenkarten und Geldscheine an deinem Smartphone verstauen. Somit hast du alle wichtigen Dinge bei einer Party an einem Ort.

Es passen bis zu 4 Karten in den Clip. Selbst wenn du nur eine Karte unterbringst hält sie durch das ausgeklügelte System perfekt an deinem Smartphone und fliegt nicht raus.

 

Der verstellbare Ständerclip

Stell dein Smartphone in verschiedenen Positionen hin.

 

 

Der Magnetclip

Lass dein Smartphone an metallischen Oberflächen haften.

 

 

Unsere Städteclips

Such dir deine Lieblingsstädte aus und Clip sie dir an dein Smartphone.

 

 

 

 

 

Zu Beginn bieten wir folgende Städte an. Es werden im Laufe der Zeit immer mehr folgen.

 

Kameraupgrade

 

Die Kameralinsen funktionieren für alle angebotenen Modelle. Sie werden magnetisch an den Clips befestigt. Wählst du die Option, so hat jeder deiner Clips einen Magnetring integriert, sodass deine Linsen befestigt werden können.

Das Kameralinsenset enthält eine 180° Fisheye, eine 2x Zoom und eine Makro Linse.

Standard ohne Linse


mit Fisheye Linse


mit 2x Zoom Linse


mit Makro Linse

 

Der Bumper und seine Schutzfunktionen

 

In unser Schutzsystem haben wir die meiste Entwicklungsarbeit investiert. Unsere Smartbags schützen die Ecken, die größten Schwachstellen deines Smartphones. Das Frontdisplay wird durch die minimalen Erhöhungen an den Ecken geschützt, die Rückseite wird perfekt durch unsere Clips geschützt. Um das Touch-Erlebnis nicht einzuschränken, sind die Bumper so konstruiert, dass sie seitlich unterhalb der Höhe des Displays liegen und somit nicht stören.

Eigene Kreationen

Du kannst deine Hüllen in unserem Online-Konfigurator selbst gestalten und entwerfen. Und zwar nicht nur irgendein Bild, das, wie bisher üblich, draufgedruckt wird, sondern bei uns entwickelst du eigene Formen. Du kannst also sicher sein, dass kein anderer auf der Welt die gleiche Hülle hat wie du.

Als Anregung kannst du auch vorgefertigte Designs oder Designs aus der Community oder von Freunden weiter individualisieren oder diese ohne Änderungen bestellen. Du wirst somit sicher das für dich Passende finden.

Der Konfigurator und seine Funktionen

Wir bieten folgende Optionen zur Gestaltung:

-          Scherenschnitt, siehe Panda
-          Relief aufgetragen, siehe Elefant
-          Relief eingepresst, siehe Indiegogo

 

Folgende Werkzeuge stehen dir zur Verfügung:

-          Stift (versch. Größen, inkl. Lineal für bessere Ergebnisse)
-          Kreis (versch. Radien und Dicken)
-          Spline (versch. Dicken und weitere Einstellungen zur Form)
-          Radierer (versch. Größen, inkl. Lineal)
-          Textwerkzeug (versch. Schriftarten, Größen und weitere Standardeinstellungen)

Dieser befindet sich derzeit noch in der Entwicklung. Hier sind erste Screenshots wie er aussehen wird.

Wir decken somit eigentlich alle Funktionen ab, die man aus üblichen Zeichenprogrammen kennt. Alles Online, ohne Installation von jeglicher Software.

Zusätzlich kann ein Bild hochgeladen werden und entweder aufgetragen oder eingepresst auf deinem Case platziert werden. Der Konfigurator wandelt das Bild in Schwarz und Weiß um. Anschließend siehst du eine Vorschau und kannst das Ergebnis an Hand von Parametern und Filtern optimieren.

 

Farbauswahl

 

Blau, Rot, Weinrot, Lila, Türkis, Hellgrün, Gelb, Zitronengelb, Rosa, Schwarz und Weiß stehen zur Auswahl.

Unsere Hüllen haben außerdem eine spezielle Beschichtung, die schmutzabweisend ist.

Wofür benötigt ihr die Unterstützung?

Wir benötigen die 30.000€ für folgende Dinge:
- um die bisherigen Kosten für die über 200 Prototypen zu decken.
- um die Entwicklungskosten für den Konfigurator zu decken.
- um die Produktion in großen Stückzahlen starten zu können.
- um professionelle Ausrüstung für die Nachbearbeitung der Hüllen kaufen zu können.
- schnellere Designentwicklung um mehr Smartphone Modelle anbieten zu können.

 

Die größte Smartphonehülle der Welt

Jeder der einen Perk kauft, wird namentlich auf der größten Smartphone Hülle der Welt verewigt. Die Hülle wird direkt im Anschluss an die Indiegogokampagne erstellt. Jeder Unterstützer erhält mindestens 5cm² auf der Hülle. Der Rekordversuch wird nach der erfolgreichen Kampagne bei Guinness World Records eingereicht.

Trindo für Unternehmen

Wir entwicklen gemeinsam mit Ihnen ihr gewünschtes Logo. Dabei gibt es ganz neue Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten, die mit dem Konfigurator so nicht möglich sind, wie z.B. dreidimensional Objekte oder Logos auf dem Case. Zusammen mit ihnen können wir ihre Unternehmensfarbe erarbeiten (im Spektrum der RAL-Farben) und sogar individuelle Cases für jeden Mitarbeiter gestalten (z.B. Name des Mitarbeiters oder der Abteilung). Des Weiteren können sie wählen ob sie unsere Smartbags benötigen, und gegebenfalls diese weglassen. Es besteht auch die Möglichkeit, Hüllen ohne unser Clipsystem zu produzieren (Bumper und Clip sind dann ein Bauteil). Gegen Aufpreis bieten wir Mehrfarbigkeit und auch die Entwicklung für Smartphone Modelle an, die wir standardmäßig nicht im Shop verkaufen. Hierfür bitten wir sie mit uns in Kontakt zu treten.

Zukunft

Wir arbeiten derzeit an folgenden neuen Features:

Fahrrad und Autohalter, die man als Clip anstecken kann. Weitere Gadgets für Smartphones wie passive Musikverstärker und weitere verrückte Funktionen. Ihr dürft gespannt sein ;)

FAQs

Wie gelange ich an den von mir gekauften perk?

Du bekommst einen Gutscheincode per E-Mail von uns zugeschickt. Mit diesem bekommst du genug Guthaben in deinen Account, um dir deinen gekauften Perk in unserem Onlineshop zusammenzustellen.

Ich habe ein neues Smartphone, muss ich alle Clips erneut kaufen?

Wohl oder übel Ja. Nur in den wenigsten Fällen passen Clips auf andere Modelle.
Allerdings möchten wir dir natürlich nicht nochmal alle Clips in Rechnung stellen, die du für dein altes Modell schon einmal erworben hast. 
Deshalb erhältst du einen Sonderrabatt auf alle Clips, die du für dein altes Modell schon hattest.

Was mache ich wenn mein Case schmutzig wird?

Einfach mit warmen Wasser abwaschen. Unsere Cases sind speziell beschichtet, was einen Easy-to-Clean Effekt erzeugt. Bei hartnäckigeren Verschmutzungen könnt ihr die Hüllen auch einfach in die Spülmaschine legen.
Nach mehreren Spülgängen können die Cases leicht an Farbintensität verlieren.

 

Mein Smartphone wird nicht unterstützt, was kann ich tun?

Prinzipiell ist es unser Ziel, ein großes Spektrum an Smartphones abzudecken und wir arbeiten auch ständig an der Erweiterung des Angebotes.

Wir bitten Euch um Verständnis, dass wir keine Cases mehr für alte Modelle wie das IPhone 3g/s  entwickeln. 
Ihr könnt Euch aber sicher sein, dass jedes Smartphonemodell, das wir mal angeboten haben, auch noch Jahre später mit den aktuellsten Designs gekauft werden kann.
Falls du ein neues Modell hast, das wir deiner Meinung nach anbieten sollten dann schreibe uns einfach eine Mail an idea@trin.do
Wir freuen uns über Ideen und Vorschläge.

Wie dick ist ein Case?

Dies variiert von Smartphonemodell zu Smartphonemodell und von Clip zu Clip.
Wir garantieren Euch aber, dass wir immer an der Grenze des Machbaren arbeiten und dünne Cases für uns hohe Priorität haben.

Bei einem IPhone 4 beträgt die Dicke inkl. Clip max. 1,8mm. Wir entwickeln im Moment bereits Cases die deutlich dünner sind. Durch unsere Smartbags wird auch bei extrem dünnen Cases die Sicherheit deines Smartphones nicht vernachlässigt. Wir gehen davon aus, dass dies bei den später ausgelieferten Cases der Fall sein wird.

Gibt es die Möglichkeit, dass ihr nicht liefern könnt?

Nein. Wir werden liefern. Unsere Prototypen sind schon jetzt in einem serienreifen Stadium und unsere Partner sind absolut zuverlässig. Nach 6 Monaten sind wir uns sicher, dass wir alles so liefern können, wie es hier auf Indiegogo beschrieben ist.

Was für Zahlungsmöglichkeiten habe ich?

Auf Indiegogo könnt ihr mit Kreditkarte oder PayPal bezahlen. Sobald wir mit unserem Shop online gehen, sind dann mehrere Zahlungsmöglichkeiten verfügbar.

Muss ich mein Design für jedes Smartphonemodell anpassen?

Nein. 
Wir skalieren dir automatisch dein Design auf alle anderen Modelle. Natürlich kann es hier zu Verzerrungen kommen. Diese sind aber meist minimal und nicht zu erkennen. 
Wenn du einstellst, dass du dein Design mit der Community teilen möchtest, wird dein Design für alle Modelle automatisch skaliert.
Somit kann ein Freund mit einem anderen Modell das gleiche Design tragen.

Wie hoch sind die Versandkosten?

Innerhalb der USA und der EU liefern wir kostenlos. Für alle anderen Länder bitten wir euch 4€ für den Versand dazuzurechnen.

Ich habe in 2 Monaten vielleicht ein anders Smartphone!

Das ist kein Problem. Du wählst dein Smartphonemodell erst aus wenn unser Konfigurator im August online geht.

 

Ab August könnt ihr Euch die Hüllen zusammenstellen. 14 Tage später liegen die Hüllen in eurem Briefkasten.

Für weitere Informationen könnt ihr auf unserer Homepage www.trin.do vorbeischauen oder uns auf Facebook liken – www.facebook.com/Trindo3dPrinting

Danke für Eure Unterstützung!!!

Free Shipping in the U.S. and the EU. Only add the 4€ for the rest of the world.
 
Find us on Facebook, Google+,  Twitter and visit us on http://trin.do!

We need your support to start production. Pick one of our perks on the right and you´re in! A big Thank You to all those who take part, tell their friends about us and / or like us on Facebook!
You can start designing your cases at the beginning of August
 

Supported Smartphone Models:

 
About Us
We are Felix, Nathanael, Philipp and Justin, all from Munich, Germany and between 20 and 25 years old. If you want to have more information about us, visit our homepage. 

The material and production process
Our cases are 3d printed and made of a high quality plastic powder. They are produced on professional laser-sinter machines. The quality of the material is impressive. It is stable and flexible at the same time, making it extremely durable. This makes our safety system, the “Smartbags” and our clip-system possible, which both would not work without the special features of our material.
Our products are made in Germany and provide the highest quality available on the 3d-printing market.
Our clip-system
It is constructed in a way that allows switching the clip without having to take the bumper off. It´s a clever system that survives falls from great heights and it still allows for easy and fast switching of the clip.
Because you, our Indiegogo supporters, are the ones making this possible, you´ll be granted exclusive access to our shop and configurator before the public does. Further, you´re cases will be shipped weeks before the first official ones. Guaranteed.
Professional Clips
We will have professional designed clips in our shop. 
Those include the city, wallet, magnet, stand and a few more at the moment. We already have the first designers onboard to bring more and more professional designed clips. Those will add awesome design and functional abilities to your phone.
The wallet clip
You can store your ID, drivers licence, credit cards, business cards and bills on the back of your smartphone. Your most important things stored in one place.
The clip can hold up to 4 cards. Even with only one card in it, everything will be safe, thanks to a clever system.

 
The Multi-angle Standclip
Place your phone in portrait and landscape at different angles.

 
The Magnetic Clip
Stick your phone to metallic surfaces.

 
Our Cityclips
Choose your favourite cities and clip them on your smartphone.

 
 
 We will start with the following cities and add more from time to time.


 
 
Camera Lens Option
 

Our camera lenses work for every smartphone model we offer. They are attached to the clips using built-in magnets. If you choose this option, each of your clips will have an integrated magnet to attach the lenses to.
The Lens set includes 180° view angle Fisheye, a 2x zoom and a macro lens.

with Fisheye lens

with 2x Zoom lens

with macro lens

The display is protected by very small ridges in the corners, while the back is perfectly guarded by our clips. At the same time, your touch experience on the screen won´t be influenced, since the Bumper is lowered on the sides to not reach into the display.

For ideas or examples of what is actually possible, you can take a look at our professional designs or designs made by the community or friends. You can either continue work on a design that has been shared or order it without changes. You will surely find the perfect design.

We offer the following ways of shaping:

What do you need the money for?
We need the 30.000 € for the following:
-          cover the expenses of our 200+ prototypes-          cover the development of our configurator-          start producing in big numbers-          purchase professional equipment for post processing-          speed up designing, making more smartphone models possible

Every supporter will be reserved at least 1in² on the case. The attempt on the record will be handed in at Guinness World Records after successful funding.

We can even realize things that are not possible using the online-configurator we will offer completely new ways of designing, that couldn’t be done like that in the online-configurator, like three-dimensional objects or logos on the case. In consultation with you we can develop your own color and individual cases for every employee you can also choose, whether you want Smartbags or the clip-system. For an additional charge, we offer multicolor and the development of cases for smartphone models that we don´t offer naturally. Clips that allow for fixation on your bike or car, more gadgets (e.g. passive music amplifiers) and other crazy functions. Stay tuned ;)
FAQ
How do I get my perk in your shop?
We will send you a coupon code via e-mail. After entering the code, you will have enough credits to buy the perk you chose.
I bought a new Smartphone. Do I have to buy all my clips a second time?
Sadly, yes. Most often your “old” clips won´t fit a different smartphone model. Still, we don´t want to charge you for all of those clips that you already bought for your old smartphone. Therefore, you will be granted special discount on those that you already bought for your old smartphone. 
Can I clean my case if it gets dirty?
You can easily clean it with warm water. Our cases are specially coated, which makes them easy-to-clean. You can also put them in the dishwasher to get better results. But be aware that they could lose some of their color-intensity after being washed a few times.
 
There is no case available for my smartphone, what can I do?
Basically, we want to offer a wide variety of different smartphone models and are constantly working on enlarging our portfolio. We hope you understand that we won´t be creating cases for older models like the IPhone 3g/s. But you can be sure that, if we offered your model once, you will be able to buy it even years later with the newest designs. If you have a new smartphone that we do not support, and think we should do so, write us an E-Mail to: idea@trin.do. We are looking forward to your ideas and suggestions.
How thick is a case?

At the moment we are already developing much thinner cases. With the help of our smartbags we can ensure the safety of your smartphone even on extremely thin cases. We assume that this might well be so on the later delivered cases.
 
Is there any possibility of you NOT delivering at all?
No. We will deliver. Our prototypes are already in a well advanced state. Furthermore, our partners are absolutely reliable and have lots of experience. 
Which payment options do you offer?
During our Indiegogo campaign, you can use your credit card or PayPal. As soon as our shop is online, there will be more more payment options.
 
Do I have to adjust my designs for every smartphone model?
No. We automatically scale your designs for every model. Surely there can be distortions, but those are most often minimal and not recognizable. If you choose the “share”-option to share your design with the community, your design will be automatically scaled to fit every smartphone model we offer. This way, a friend of you can choose the same design on a different smartphone.
How much does the shipping cost?
Shipping is free in the U.S. and the EU. Please add 4€ for the rest of the world.
I may have a new smartphone in two months!
This is no problem. You will choose your model not before our configurator is online in August 2013.
 
In August 2013, you can begin creating your cases. 14 days later the cases will be on your doorstep.
For further information you can visit our homepage www.trin.do or like us on Facebook – www.facebook.com/Trindo3dPrinting !
Thank you for your support!!!!
 
 
English Version

Deutsche Version
Was ist Indiegogo und Crowdfunding?
Für Startups bietet Crowdfunding eine gute Möglichkeit, an Kapital zu kommen. Auf der Plattform Indiegogo wird durch Vorverkäufe bestimmter Produkte Geld eingesammelt, um die Kosten für Entwicklung und Produktion decken zu können. Nach erfolreicher Finanzierung wird das Kapital für die Herstellung eingesetzt und das TrindoCase kann verschickt werden.
Dafür benötigen wir eure Unterstützung. Einfach einen unserer Perks auf der rechten Seite kaufen und ihr seid mit dabei. Vielen Dank an alle Leute die sich beteiligen, über uns erzählen und uns auf Facebook liken.
Anfang August könnt ihr euch eure Cases auf unserer Homepage erstellen.
 

Unterstützte Smartphone Modelle:

 
Wer steckt dahinter?
Das sind wir. Felix, Nathanael, Philipp und Justin. Wir sind aus München, Deutschland und alle zwischen 20 und 25 Jahren alt. Wenn du mehr über uns erfahren möchtest, kannst du uns auf unserer Homepage besuchen. www.trin.do/about-us

Das Material und der Herstellungsprozess
Unsere Cases kommen aus dem 3D Drucker und werden auf professionellen Laser-sinter Maschinen aus einem Kunstoffpulver gefertig. Die Eigenschaften des Materials sind herausragend. Es ist stabil und flexibel zugleich, was bedeutet, dass es fast nicht kaputt zu bekommen ist. Das ermöglicht uns unser Schutzsystem, die „Smartbags“ und unser Clipsystem einzusetzen, das ohne die Eigenschaften des Materials nicht funktionieren würde.
Unsere Produkte sind Made in Germany und bieten die höchste Qualität, die auf dem 3d-Druck Marktverfügbar ist.
Unser Clipsystem
Unser Clipsystem wurde so entwickelt, dass du deine Designs jederzeit wechseln kannst. Ohne den Bumper entfernen zu müssen. Es ist ein ausgeklügeltes System, das bei Stürzen perfekt hält und trotzdem leicht zu wechseln ist. Ein Wechsel dauert nur wenige Sekunden.
Da die Sache erst durch euch, unsere Indiegogo-Unterstützer, möglich wird, erhaltet ihr einen exklusiven Zugang zu unserem Shop und dem Konfigurator vor der Öffentlichkeit. Außerdem werden eure Hüllen garantiert bereits Wochen vor den ersten offiziellen Auslieferungen versendet.
Professional Clips
Wir werden in unserem Shop professionell erstellte Designs anbieten.
Diese schließen unter anderem die City, Geldbeutel, Magnet, Ständer und ein paar weitere Clips ein. Wir arbeiten bereits mit den ersten Designern zusammen um mehr und mehr professionelle Clips anbieten zu können. 
Der Geldbeutelclip
Mit dem Clip kannst du Ausweis, Führerschein, EC- und Kreditkarten, Visitenkarten und Geldscheine an deinem Smartphone verstauen. Somit hast du alle wichtigen Dinge bei einer Party an einem Ort.
Es passen bis zu 4 Karten in den Clip. Selbst wenn du nur eine Karte unterbringst hält sie durch das ausgeklügelte System perfekt an deinem Smartphone und fliegt nicht raus.

 
Der verstellbare Ständerclip
Stell dein Smartphone in verschiedenen Positionen hin.
 

 
Der Magnetclip
Lass dein Smartphone an metallischen Oberflächen haften.
 

 
Unsere Städteclips
Such dir deine Lieblingsstädte aus und Clip sie dir an dein Smartphone.
 

 
 
 
 
Zu Beginn bieten wir folgende Städte an. Es werden im Laufe der Zeit immer mehr folgen.

 
Kameraupgrade

 
Die Kameralinsen funktionieren für alle angebotenen Modelle. Sie werden magnetisch an den Clips befestigt. Wählst du die Option, so hat jeder deiner Clips einen Magnetring integriert, sodass deine Linsen befestigt werden können.
Das Kameralinsenset enthält eine 180° Fisheye, eine 2x Zoom und eine Makro Linse.
Standard ohne Linse

mit Fisheye Linse

mit 2x Zoom Linse

mit Makro Linse

 
Der Bumper und seine Schutzfunktionen
 


In unser Schutzsystem haben wir die meiste Entwicklungsarbeit investiert. Unsere Smartbags schützen die Ecken, die größten Schwachstellen deines Smartphones. Das Frontdisplay wird durch die minimalen Erhöhungen an den Ecken geschützt, die Rückseite wird perfekt durch unsere Clips geschützt. Um das Touch-Erlebnis nicht einzuschränken, sind die Bumper so konstruiert, dass sie seitlich unterhalb der Höhe des Displays liegen und somit nicht stören.

Eigene Kreationen
Du kannst deine Hüllen in unserem Online-Konfigurator selbst gestalten und entwerfen. Und zwar nicht nur irgendein Bild, das, wie bisher üblich, draufgedruckt wird, sondern bei uns entwickelst du eigene Formen. Du kannst also sicher sein, dass kein anderer auf der Welt die gleiche Hülle hat wie du.
Als Anregung kannst du auch vorgefertigte Designs oder Designs aus der Community oder von Freunden weiter individualisieren oder diese ohne Änderungen bestellen. Du wirst somit sicher das für dich Passende finden.
Der Konfigurator und seine Funktionen
Wir bieten folgende Optionen zur Gestaltung:
-          Scherenschnitt, siehe Panda-          Relief aufgetragen, siehe Elefant-          Relief eingepresst, siehe Indiegogo

 
Folgende Werkzeuge stehen dir zur Verfügung:
-          Stift (versch. Größen, inkl. Lineal für bessere Ergebnisse)-          Kreis (versch. Radien und Dicken)-          Spline (versch. Dicken und weitere Einstellungen zur Form)-          Radierer (versch. Größen, inkl. Lineal)-          Textwerkzeug (versch. Schriftarten, Größen und weitere Standardeinstellungen)
Dieser befindet sich derzeit noch in der Entwicklung. Hier sind erste Screenshots wie er aussehen wird.

Wir decken somit eigentlich alle Funktionen ab, die man aus üblichen Zeichenprogrammen kennt. Alles Online, ohne Installation von jeglicher Software.
Zusätzlich kann ein Bild hochgeladen werden und entweder aufgetragen oder eingepresst auf deinem Case platziert werden. Der Konfigurator wandelt das Bild in Schwarz und Weiß um. Anschließend siehst du eine Vorschau und kannst das Ergebnis an Hand von Parametern und Filtern optimieren.
 
Farbauswahl
 


Blau, Rot, Weinrot, Lila, Türkis, Hellgrün, Gelb, Zitronengelb, Rosa, Schwarz und Weiß stehen zur Auswahl.
Unsere Hüllen haben außerdem eine spezielle Beschichtung, die schmutzabweisend ist.
Wofür benötigt ihr die Unterstützung?
Wir benötigen die 30.000€ für folgende Dinge: - um die bisherigen Kosten für die über 200 Prototypen zu decken. - um die Entwicklungskosten für den Konfigurator zu decken. - um die Produktion in großen Stückzahlen starten zu können. - um professionelle Ausrüstung für die Nachbearbeitung der Hüllen kaufen zu können.- schnellere Designentwicklung um mehr Smartphone Modelle anbieten zu können.
 
Die größte Smartphonehülle der Welt
Jeder der einen Perk kauft, wird namentlich auf der größten Smartphone Hülle der Welt verewigt. Die Hülle wird direkt im Anschluss an die Indiegogokampagne erstellt. Jeder Unterstützer erhält mindestens 5cm² auf der Hülle. Der Rekordversuch wird nach der erfolgreichen Kampagne bei Guinness World Records eingereicht.
Trindo für Unternehmen
Wir entwicklen gemeinsam mit Ihnen ihr gewünschtes Logo. Dabei gibt es ganz neue Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten, die mit dem Konfigurator so nicht möglich sind, wie z.B. dreidimensional Objekte oder Logos auf dem Case. Zusammen mit ihnen können wir ihre Unternehmensfarbe erarbeiten (im Spektrum der RAL-Farben) und sogar individuelle Cases für jeden Mitarbeiter gestalten (z.B. Name des Mitarbeiters oder der Abteilung). Des Weiteren können sie wählen ob sie unsere Smartbags benötigen, und gegebenfalls diese weglassen. Es besteht auch die Möglichkeit, Hüllen ohne unser Clipsystem zu produzieren (Bumper und Clip sind dann ein Bauteil). Gegen Aufpreis bieten wir Mehrfarbigkeit und auch die Entwicklung für Smartphone Modelle an, die wir standardmäßig nicht im Shop verkaufen. Hierfür bitten wir sie mit uns in Kontakt zu treten.
Zukunft
Wir arbeiten derzeit an folgenden neuen Features:
Fahrrad und Autohalter, die man als Clip anstecken kann. Weitere Gadgets für Smartphones wie passive Musikverstärker und weitere verrückte Funktionen. Ihr dürft gespannt sein ;)
FAQs
Wie gelange ich an den von mir gekauften perk?
Du bekommst einen Gutscheincode per E-Mail von uns zugeschickt. Mit diesem bekommst du genug Guthaben in deinen Account, um dir deinen gekauften Perk in unserem Onlineshop zusammenzustellen.
Ich habe ein neues Smartphone, muss ich alle Clips erneut kaufen?
Wohl oder übel Ja. Nur in den wenigsten Fällen passen Clips auf andere Modelle. Allerdings möchten wir dir natürlich nicht nochmal alle Clips in Rechnung stellen, die du für dein altes Modell schon einmal erworben hast.  Deshalb erhältst du einen Sonderrabatt auf alle Clips, die du für dein altes Modell schon hattest.
Was mache ich wenn mein Case schmutzig wird?
Einfach mit warmen Wasser abwaschen. Unsere Cases sind speziell beschichtet, was einen Easy-to-Clean Effekt erzeugt. Bei hartnäckigeren Verschmutzungen könnt ihr die Hüllen auch einfach in die Spülmaschine legen. Nach mehreren Spülgängen können die Cases leicht an Farbintensität verlieren.
 
Mein Smartphone wird nicht unterstützt, was kann ich tun?
Prinzipiell ist es unser Ziel, ein großes Spektrum an Smartphones abzudecken und wir arbeiten auch ständig an der Erweiterung des Angebotes. Wir bitten Euch um Verständnis, dass wir keine Cases mehr für alte Modelle wie das IPhone 3g/s  entwickeln.  Ihr könnt Euch aber sicher sein, dass jedes Smartphonemodell, das wir mal angeboten haben, auch noch Jahre später mit den aktuellsten Designs gekauft werden kann.  Falls du ein neues Modell hast, das wir deiner Meinung nach anbieten sollten dann schreibe uns einfach eine Mail an idea@trin.do Wir freuen uns über Ideen und Vorschläge.
Wie dick ist ein Case?
Dies variiert von Smartphonemodell zu Smartphonemodell und von Clip zu Clip. Wir garantieren Euch aber, dass wir immer an der Grenze des Machbaren arbeiten und dünne Cases für uns hohe Priorität haben.Bei einem IPhone 4 beträgt die Dicke inkl. Clip max. 1,8mm. Wir entwickeln im Moment bereits Cases die deutlich dünner sind. Durch unsere Smartbags wird auch bei extrem dünnen Cases die Sicherheit deines Smartphones nicht vernachlässigt. Wir gehen davon aus, dass dies bei den später ausgelieferten Cases der Fall sein wird.
Gibt es die Möglichkeit, dass ihr nicht liefern könnt?
Nein. Wir werden liefern. Unsere Prototypen sind schon jetzt in einem serienreifen Stadium und unsere Partner sind absolut zuverlässig. Nach 6 Monaten sind wir uns sicher, dass wir alles so liefern können, wie es hier auf Indiegogo beschrieben ist.
Was für Zahlungsmöglichkeiten habe ich?
Auf Indiegogo könnt ihr mit Kreditkarte oder PayPal bezahlen. Sobald wir mit unserem Shop online gehen, sind dann mehrere Zahlungsmöglichkeiten verfügbar.
Muss ich mein Design für jedes Smartphonemodell anpassen?
Nein.  Wir skalieren dir automatisch dein Design auf alle anderen Modelle. Natürlich kann es hier zu Verzerrungen kommen. Diese sind aber meist minimal und nicht zu erkennen.  Wenn du einstellst, dass du dein Design mit der Community teilen möchtest, wird dein Design für alle Modelle automatisch skaliert. Somit kann ein Freund mit einem anderen Modell das gleiche Design tragen.
Wie hoch sind die Versandkosten?
Innerhalb der USA und der EU liefern wir kostenlos. Für alle anderen Länder bitten wir euch 4€ für den Versand dazuzurechnen.
Ich habe in 2 Monaten vielleicht ein anders Smartphone!
Das ist kein Problem. Du wählst dein Smartphonemodell erst aus wenn unser Konfigurator im August online geht.
 
Ab August könnt ihr Euch die Hüllen zusammenstellen. 14 Tage später liegen die Hüllen in eurem Briefkasten.
Für weitere Informationen könnt ihr auf unserer Homepage www.trin.do vorbeischauen oder uns auf Facebook liken – www.facebook.com/Trindo3dPrinting
Danke für Eure Unterstützung!!!

story:
Hey everyone, thanks so much for helping us meet our goal!

Because of you, we will be able to procure a die-cutter machine to make our seamstresses' jobs easier and more efficient. (It also means that all of our wonderful donors will get some socially-conscious, hand-made apparel!)


We still have time to keep going! Help us get to $1200 so Neighbors Apparel can buy sustainably-sourced Thai fabric for our fall and winter lines!



Our Cause

Every year, thousands of women flee persecution in their native countries and come to the U.S. seeking safety and better opportunities. However, they often face cultural hurdles to employment (such as a lack of English language skills).

Our mission at Neighbors Apparel is to create quality handmade goods while empowering refugee women to earn a living wage, cultivating dignity amidst great struggle. Their cultures are reflected in our products through authentic fabrics, spreading awareness of our seamstresses' stories through fashionable attire.



What We Need & What You Get

We need $650 to buy a die-cutter machine and 2 sets of custom dies that will allow our seamstresses to cut custom shapes from fabric.

In exchange for your help, we'll send you some of our favorite items from Neighbors Apparel!



Our Story

Hi! I'm Tessa, a designer and activist who relocated from the fashion mecca of New York City to the bustling town of Akron, Ohio. I founded Neighbors Apparel with one intention: make great fashion while creating employment opportunities for the refugee women population in Akron. A year later, Ka Naw, Kaser, and Chandra have joined my team from Burma and Bhutan and together we've built Neighbors Apparel into a small but creative space producing both great clothing and great opportunities.

Other Ways to Help

We know that not everyone can contribute financially, but rest assured, there are other ways to get involved!

Learn more about Akron's refugees at http://iiakron.org/refugees/

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Share this link: http://igg.me/at/neighborsapparel

story:
MyKeyno is:

We are MyKeyno. The makers & manufacturer of the iVest. We firmly believe that providing a stylish, eco-friendly, and U.S. made garment is good for the consumer, good for the country, and good for the planet.

Reinventing the Backpack!

We are dedicated to manufacturing environmentally friendly products in the U.S. Keeping our operations green and domestic are integral to our philosophy. The iVest® is made from Eco Circle™ polyester, a closed-loop recycling system that eliminates waste and decreases oil consumption.  Our groundbreaking new backpack seamlessly combines functional and environmental benefits with fashion like no other product on the market today. Since no other company was addressing this very common problem, we came up with our own bold new take on traditional laptop bags and backpacks. Our list of patents and trademarks is testament to our commitment to innovation.

Hey Indiegogo--Here's our project

We're raising $100,000 to produce the first 1000 iVests. The majority of the funding will go toward purchasing the necessary materials (fabric in various colors, snaps, security zippers, etc) and for manufacturing of the vests. The balance will be used to for packaging, insurance, shipping and IndieGoGo's fees.

If we exceed $100,000 with Indiegogo, additional funds will be used to expand our current website and to pay for the design and patterning of the next generation of the iVest.



Take A Look!

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Great for Biking

Need to safely and easily transport your laptop to work? Traveling by bike or motorcycle and need to keep yourself warm and your stuff dry?

 

Great for School

Imagine a garment that protects you from the elements AND allows you to carry all your stuff. With iVest, it's possible!

 

Fashion meets Function

iVest® is sporty-chic and works for almost any occasion. It's raised collar offers added weather protection while our side-slits create longer, tapered flattering look. With an iVest, you’ll be wearing instead of carrying one of the most comfortable, stylish laptop bags for women available anywhere.

Great Price/Performance

The iVest® provides great value while making your daily travels less cumbersome. By combining a stylish, multi-pocketed, all-weather vest with an integrated backpack, you no longer have to buy both separately, saving you money. Here is how iVest® stacks up against some of the leading brands for outdoor vests and bags:

 

Colors & Sizes

Initially, the iVest comes in two color combinations: Black on Black & Grey on Green. A rainbow of exterior and interior color combinations will be available after we reach full production.

Sizes:

Men's:    Small, Medium, Large, XL, XXL, XXXL

Women's: Extra Small, Small, Medium, Large, XL, XXL

story: 0-

18 years ago my dad changed my diaper the first day home from the hospital... and that's when it all began for the PooPee Mask

My dad:  “is there anything we could wear that minimizes the smell and entertains Bri while I change her diaper?”

My mom:  “like a… PooPee Mask?”

My dad:  "exactly!"

…and that’s when it all began.

Below is a picture of Brianna’s little brother on August 8, 1998

Mom wearing the original PooPee Mask in 1998 while changing my little brother (now 16)

“Who would have thought 18 years later I would bring back the PooPee Mask to sell and work my way through college!”

JUST WHAT IS… the PooPee Mask?

The PooPee Mask is a mask for people who change baby diapers.  Each PooPee Mask contains either pink or blue colors on the mask.

The PooPee Mask is a soft mask made out of 100% Polypropylene non-woven fabric that is made to be placed over the mouth and nose.

The PooPee Mask has dots, small teddy bears and letters located everywhere on the front of the mask. They are colorful to attract and keep the baby occupied while changing diapers.

Once The PooPee Mask is placed over the nose and mouth one can smell the sweet scent of strawberry while changing the diaper.

Baby is happy and occupied while the diaper changer is happy and now coherent!

The PooPee Mask package was creatively designed to sit nicely where all can see and angled specifically for easy standing for baby showers, tables, shelves and for easy balloon attachment.

It’s truly a terrific and fun showstopper!

Made for everyone in a new baby’s house!

  • Moms - Dads
  • Grandmas - Grandpas
  • Sisters – Brothers
  • Aunts – Uncles
  • Doctors - Nurses
  • Childcare Workers - Babysitters

  *** Christmas is around the corner ***

& if just one PooPee Mask isn’t enough, try the best Showstopper at any party…

The PooPee Diaper Cake

Layered with the finest infant diapers, each PooPee Diaper Cake is hand wrapped and made to please, guaranteed!

There are 3 unique sizes

  Single Layer PooPee Diaper Cake

  • 15 infant sized diapers nestled tightly into a wonderfully round cake layer
  • PooPee Mask as the topper
  • Wonderful array of bears, “Congratulations”, and colors printed on the wrap itself

  Double Layer PooPee Diaper Cake

  • 40 infant sized diapers nestled tightly into a wonderfully round cake layer
  • PooPee Mask as the topper
  • Wonderful array of bears, “Congratulations”, and colors printed on the wrap itself

  Triple Layer PooPee Diaper Cake

  • 75 infant sized diapers nestled tightly into a wonderfully round cake layer
  • PooPee Mask as the topper
  • Wonderful array of bears, “Congratulations”, and colors printed on the wrap itself

The PooPee Mask & PooPee Diaper Cake will be the centerpiece for every baby shower and gift in the hospital room.

It’s not just limited to baby messes but other messes too...

Here are some happy Dog Owners

Was there a science to the design?

The only thing my dad was thinking was fun, useful, entertaining for the child and it HAD to smell nice.

Science, no… Practical, yes!

But first, it’s important to understand some baby facts:

  • All babies poop ---- Sorry, it’s true… not one doesn’t!
  • All babies pee ---- Ditto to the above fact… Sorry again!

Can people stimulate a baby’s Eye Development?

It is critical that in the first year, a baby’s brain and eyes begin to coordinate images and remember what they’ve seen. As a parent, they participate in the newborn’s eye development and health as a normal part of your time with your baby. Proper stimulation can increase curiosity, attention span, memory, and nervous system development.

So be sure to give your baby plenty of interesting things to see… LIKE The PooPee Mask!

The First Three Months of Eye Development

Newborns can only focus about 8 - 12 inches from their face, and they see only black, white and gray. Over the next 10 - 12 weeks, babies will follow moving objects and recognizing things, bold, geometric patterns.

When Do Babies Begin To See Clearly?

Depth perception and eye-hand coordination begin to develop when infants reach four months. From four to six months, babies will begin to reach out and touch an object – something that previously only happened by chance.

Is the PooPee Mask a proven method to stimulate a baby’s eye and muscle development?

We have absolutely NO scientific proof, however, we have a whole lot of happy diaper changers who don’t cringe, but smile every time they have to do the task and enjoy the newness of life.

So, what we do know?

We know it’s a fun thing to wear when changing diapers and seeing that little tyke smiling, pointing at the dots and what’s really nice -- you’re smelling strawberries!

(Resources by www.Bausch.com)

Does it work? YES

Is it one of the best newborn gifts for a parent, sister, brother or grandparent?

…An emphatic YES!

What is the PooPee Mask made of?

Description

Material

  • Ear loop - Latex Free Elastic Cord
  • Fabric - 100% Polypropylene non-woven fabric
  • Bridge -  Coated metal wire /covered with outer layer fabric

More Info:

  • 99% Bacterial Filtration Efficiency (B.F.E.)
  • 99% Particle Filtration Efficiency (P.F.E.)
  • Inner & Outer Fluid Resistant Layers
  • Easy Breathability
  • Comfort & Protection
  • Manufacturing and Quality

We assemble in our home and office area.  If a larger facility is needed, we have the ability to expand quickly.

WE want your pictures, too… when you purchase a PooPee Mask and send us a picture, we will showcase your pic!

Where will the money go?

Brianna will use funds to get the business going and pay for her second year of college.  If she does meet and exceed her funds she’ll continue to use for the balance of her schooling. 

Brianna is on route to graduate with a Psychology degree with a goal of becoming a teacher and working with kids.

She has worked since she was 16 in retail and will continue to remain at her position.  Providing this works well, she may continue this business through her entire college life!  Her dad would really like that!

Could we ship thousands?

YES, in fact my dad said if I sold millions, he’d find a way to ship, deliver best of quality and make those million diaper changers out there very happy!

Production & Shipping

If our goal is met, we’ll make sure everything goes according to plan to ship quickly. As soon as funding is complete, PooPee Masks & PooPee Diaper Cakes will begin shipping within 10 business days.

Expected shipping dates begin approximately 10 days after funding time has ended.  We want to make sure you have your PooPee Masks and PooPee Diaper Cakes as soon as possible.

Scalability

Moving from an in-house operation to a full-scale business servicing retailers and end users requires careful planning and controlled growth. On time delivery, customer service and accurate fulfillment will be some of the most significant activities to maintain.

Background music performed by Israel Kamakawiwo'ole.The song is called "Somewhere over the Rainbow".

FAQ’s

  • What colors are on the PooPee Mask?

Blue & Pink

  • Do I get a preference of colors?

We picked neutral colors so that both work well and do the same job, which is to laugh, smell strawberry & occupy that little beauty.

  • What is the smell again?

The smell of strawberry is filled within each PooPee Mask

  • What material is the PooPee Mask made out of?

The PooPee Mask is made 100% Polypropylene non-woven fabric.

  • Do you offer any warranty?

I will make sure that your PooPee Mask is free of defects before mailing. 
However, if it does happen to be defective, just mail it back and I will send you a new one.

  • What did Regis & Kathy Lee do with the PooPee Mask?

My dad was told by a production assistant, with the show at that time that Mr. Philbin himself tried the PooPee Mask on prior to a show airing in 1998.  It almost made the cut but was never on air.

  • What did Paul Reiser do with the PooPee Mask?

My dad was told that Mr. Reiser tried the PooPee Mask on and that is all.  It did not make it into an actual show.

  • How many PooPee Masks come in each package?

There are two (2) PooPee Masks per package.

  • How long does the PooPee Mask last?

Each PooPee Mask lasts approximately one week.  It may last longer if you place in a resealable container or storage bag after each use.

A BIG - "THANK YOU" -  for your time in viewing this project!
story_txt:
18 years ago my dad changed my diaper the first day home from the hospital... and that's when it all began for the PooPee Mask

My dad:  “is there anything we could wear that minimizes the smell and entertains Bri while I change her diaper?”
My mom:  “like a… PooPee Mask?”
My dad:  "exactly!"
…and that’s when it all began.
Below is a picture of Brianna’s little brother on August 8, 1998

Mom wearing the original PooPee Mask in 1998 while changing my little brother (now 16)
“Who would have thought 18 years later I would bring back the PooPee Mask to sell and work my way through college!”

JUST WHAT IS… the PooPee Mask?

The PooPee Mask is a mask for people who change baby diapers.  Each PooPee Mask contains either pink or blue colors on the mask.

The PooPee Mask is a soft mask made out of 100% Polypropylene non-woven fabric that is made to be placed over the mouth and nose.

The PooPee Mask has dots, small teddy bears and letters located everywhere on the front of the mask. They are colorful to attract and keep the baby occupied while changing diapers.

Once The PooPee Mask is placed over the nose and mouth one can smell the sweet scent of strawberry while changing the diaper.
Baby is happy and occupied while the diaper changer is happy and now coherent!
The PooPee Mask package was creatively designed to sit nicely where all can see and angled specifically for easy standing for baby showers, tables, shelves and for easy balloon attachment.
It’s truly a terrific and fun showstopper!

Made for everyone in a new baby’s house!

Moms - Dads
Grandmas - Grandpas
Sisters – Brothers
Aunts – Uncles
Doctors - Nurses
Childcare Workers - Babysitters

  *** Christmas is around the corner ***

& if just one PooPee Mask isn’t enough, try the best Showstopper at any party…
The PooPee Diaper Cake
Layered with the finest infant diapers, each PooPee Diaper Cake is hand wrapped and made to please, guaranteed!
There are 3 unique sizes
  Single Layer PooPee Diaper Cake


15 infant sized diapers nestled tightly into a wonderfully round cake layer
PooPee Mask as the topper
Wonderful array of bears, “Congratulations”, and colors printed on the wrap itself

  Double Layer PooPee Diaper Cake


40 infant sized diapers nestled tightly into a wonderfully round cake layer
PooPee Mask as the topper
Wonderful array of bears, “Congratulations”, and colors printed on the wrap itself

  Triple Layer PooPee Diaper Cake


75 infant sized diapers nestled tightly into a wonderfully round cake layer
PooPee Mask as the topper
Wonderful array of bears, “Congratulations”, and colors printed on the wrap itself

The PooPee Mask & PooPee Diaper Cake will be the centerpiece for every baby shower and gift in the hospital room.

It’s not just limited to baby messes but other messes too...

story:
UPDATE: August 22, 2012

This weekend and next week, we will be in San Francisco so Delta can take her sewing test and attend orientation.  We are hoping for a miracle that will allow her to stay!!!  

If not, we are shifting our focus to just getting her there to meet in person with her advisor, with her financial aid officer, and with people who she might be able to find housing with, so that it may be possible to start her there in the Winter/Spring.  

WE ARE NOT GIVING UP!!!  How can you help?  You can still contribute to help us make the trip down there, and you can still contribute for the next term, so she's got a running start!

Who is Delta?

Delta Starchild is a dynamic, creative, bright free spirit who is ready to make her mark on the world of fashion! Delta is part Cajun, part dancer, part fire hooper, and ALL joy!  DELTA IS A BUDDING FASHION DESIGNER!!!  Delta works hard for what she wants, and she WANTS to go to California College of the Arts for Fashion Design!

Delta has been making costumes and
dramatic clothing combinations since she first started choosing her own outfits as a very small child.  Raised in a family that has taken  her to festivals and theatrical productions regularly, she simply absorbs concepts of how to create different looks and effects, as well as how color, form, and flow work on the human body.  Delta is caring, supportive, community and sustainability oriented, and a real team player who can work with and learn from anyone. Her joy in life is infectious and everyone becomes her friend...while imitating her look.

 

 

 

Delta also has a rare gift:  

She instinctively knows how to dress any body type.  She can 
make ANYONE look good and feel good about how they look!  

Delta has a sense of style that is classic, yet fresh, and she wants to USE that to help change the world of fashion for the better.  We all know how most women's clothing is designed for the ultra "skinny" models, but Delta changes that! She wants to design fashion for ALL, (including men, by the way).  Delta recognizes that what we wear is an essential part of how we communicate ourselves to the world, as well as affecting how we feel about ourselves in the various roles we play in life.  

What has Delta done?  

  • While still in high school, Delta began designing dresses for friends.  

  • At age 13, she took sewing lessons at the local community college, to learn basic construction and patterning skills.  

  • Delta interned with Mitra Chester, at her fashion store "Deluxe" in Eugene, OR, spending many hours learning to remake, repurpose, and create new designs.  

Delta participated in all her high school's theatrical productions, as an actress and dancer, but becoming the department's costume designer.

  • Last summer, Delta showed four of her own design creations in a downtown runway show put on by Deluxe and Redoux, another fashion shop in Eugene.  This was Delta's first experience of showing her own line "Starchild Designs", and included choosing her models, fitting her designs to them, and choosing makeup, hair, accessories, and shoes to create a themed showing...in her case, "Mardi Gras", speaking to her Cajun heritage.  

Because of Delta's stellar high school career, (National Honor Society, college credit courses, 3.87 GPA), as well as her art portfolio, she was accepted into every fashion program she applied to, with many scholarships offered, and has her heart set on attending California College of the Arts.

CCA has one of the top 10 Fashion Design programs in the US, and it's graduates have the eyes of the fashion industry.  CCA's graduates come out of their program having interned with top fashion houses in the San Francisco Bay Area and are frequently hired into positions with great career potential.  One of the things Delta particularly likes about CCA is the strong focus on sustainability, in choice and sourcing of materials and fabrics, in social issues of manufacturing, and in working on designs with depth and importance in future world needs for outerwear, wearability, and new and exciting developments in fabrics that can change with the environment.

So why isn't Delta already at CCA?

Though she was accepted as a freshman to CCA a year ago, with over $17,000 in scholarships and enough additional financial aid to cover her tuition and fees, there was nothing left over for living expenses in the expensive Bay Area.  I am a low-income mother, supporting a family of 5, including some with disabilities, and I simply don't have the ability to finance college for her.  We are barely making ends meet and there simply is no "extra".

Since the first year program at CCA is primarily studio art and art history, with the Fashion Design major beginning in sophomore year, Delta made the  choice to attend our local University of Oregon, where she had also been offered a "full-ride" in scholarships.  Delta was determined to prepare for transferring to CCA as a sophomore. She took studio art, dance, art history, and excelled in all of these. She also spent her year working in U of O's famed and prestigious Costume Shop with Alexandra Bonds, who directs a renowned Costume Design program.  Delta worked on costuming for five major productions in a large theater shop with industrial equipment.  While there, she gained all she could in sewing skills, design, working with delicate and challenging fabrics, and construction.

However, while it is an excellent university, and we love our Ducks, U of O doesn't have a Fashion Design program, and Eugene, Oregon isn't San Francisco when it comes to being in a major creative world center.  

CCA is a private arts college, located in an area where design and art and creativity are SO prevalent in everyday life!  But tuition, fees, and estimated book/materials are $40,298 per year!  And that doesn't include rent and food!

What We Need and What You Get:  

Delta received an award package from CCA that includes $18,700 in scholarships, and additional grant money through financial aid in Pell grant, Supplemental Education Opportunity grant, and Federal Work-Study.  Her total "gift aid" including scholarships, work study, and federal grants is $28,800.  She needs her loans to pay for housing and food.  While Delta is certainly willing to work for a living, being a full-time fine arts student, with major projects due, and holding a work-study position, will make it difficult, if not impossible, to manage additional outside jobs on a regular basis.

To cover the rest of her tuition, fees, and books, Delta needs $11,498.  We've set the campaign at $10,000.  We plan on having a couple of sales before Delta needs to leave, to try to cover the rest.  

Delta is so grateful for any help and wants to give you a little "piece" of her art in return.   Depending on the size of your contribution, you may receive anything from a postcard of her original art to a fashion sketch just for you!  Check out the great "perks"!

Where Will the Money Go?

Every dollar you contribute will go towards meeting Delta's tuition, fees, and book expenses.  If we are able to raise more than what she needs for this, then what is left will go towards her rent in the Bay Area, reducing her loan debt when she graduates.

What if We Don't Reach the Goal?

As Delta's mother, I KNOW what she has to offer the world, and I KNOW how incredibly powerful she is!  I would be heartbroken to see Delta unable to go to the college she has worked so hard for, because I can't afford to send her, but if it's not enough to make the dream happen this year, it would go into an account to start her savings for next year and Delta would continue to take studio art and costume design at U of O for one more year, while working to save the rest of what she needs.  BUT...in case this sounds like an easy goal, there is no guarantee Delta would be offered the same aid package next year to CCA if she doesn't begin her studies there. Delta will work on her portfolio and scholarship applications even harder, but it would feel like a waste of a year--a BIG deal for a 19 year old!

YOUR Impact!

YOU get to participate in helping a young person reach for a vision!  Imagine, seeing "Starchild Designs" making a difference in how clothing is produced, for example, or changing how people feel about themselves and the bodies they have, and KNOWING YOU HELPED IT HAPPEN!  Or, just see the look on Delta's face as she goes into her first design class, joins her first intern project, or GRADUATES with a Bachelor of Fine Arts in Fashion Design from a top college! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every single dollar is appreciated, and is a "stitch" in the fabric of Delta's future... NO donation is too small!  AND...there are other ways to help.  Please share this campaign with everyone you know!

                                                       It takes a village, right?  If you contribute $5 and then go out and get 9 more people to contribute $5, you've brought Delta $50!  And then if THEY each get 10 people to contribute $5, then you've helped bring Delta $500!!!  See how this works?  

So share on Facebook, Twitter, email...tell your friends.  USE the tools at the top of this campaign to share for even more visibility!  It's easy!

                                                       It takes a village, right?  If you contribute $5 and then go out and get 9 more people to contribute $5, you've brought Delta $50!  And then if THEY each get 10 people to contribute $5, then you've helped bring Delta $500!!!  See how this works?  
So share on Facebook, Twitter, email...tell your friends.  USE the tools at the top of this campaign to share for even more visibility!  It's easy!

story:
Short summary:      

  • Hi, my name is Dak Eubanks and I'm a professional dancer, teacher, and choreographer with experience in the entertainement industry of over 25yrs.                                                     
  • I have dreamed of creating Dak Anthony underwear line for many years now.  I wanted a to make underwear for men..while focusing on dancers and performers. Dak Anthony underwear will be a sexy, comfortable, fun line, while still focusing on great support letting you rock it out on stage without worrying about too much movement.
  • Personally, this has been a dream of mine for a long time and is a project I have been passionate about to help me regain myself spiritually while having fun and helping to build some security for my family.

What We Need 

  • All funds raised will help create Dak Anthony the brand. Not only having the underwear made but also the business portion: finding models to be the face of the company,  hiring a photographer, creating and maintaining a website, advertisements, and booking underwear shows/ parties are all part of getting this business (and myself) up on it's feet.  

The Impact     

  • Dak Anthony underwear will be fashionable, made with great quality, and sold at very afforadable prices.
  • I love to hear feed back from everyone...positive and negative. .I feel this will only make my product better for the company as well as the consumer.
  • I want to make men of all types comfortable in my underwear, but most of all comfortable in their own skin. The Dak Anthony brand will have an assortment of underwear that will help do just that.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Dak Anthony underwear line. 
  • Please help by sharing this Indiegogo page. Every bit of buzz and every single dollar helps me get the brand some exposure!

THANK YOU!!!

story:
Stephanie is campaigning to raise the necessary funds to send her little sister (mentee) Nekiyah to a special high school fashion design program at the renowned Parsons School of Design in New York City.

 

Nekiyah is thirteen years old, from Brooklyn, New York, and is about to enter high school. Nekiyah is not only exceptionally intelligent, personable, respectful, and kind, but is also extremely skilled in drawing and fashion design. She and her friend have already begun their own small business by selling their own “reconstructed” designs to kids within their community.

 

Nekiyah has little to no resources to develop her innate skill and passion at a more serious level. When not at school, Nekiyah stays at home taking care of her three-year old brother, while her mother works long shifts.

 

Nekiyah’s mother is determined to break the cycle that she believes she was a victim of- and I am too.

 

Any sort of monetary donation would go directly to Nekiyah’s fund for the Parson’s high school course starting this fall. Through this fashion design program, Nekiyah will devote her Saturdays to learning design professionally and further developing her own aesthetic from an established fashion designer.

 

Please help us give Nekiyah an opportunity of a lifetime to learn and build her skills, as I am positive she is going to be a successful young woman.

story:
We are selling t-shirts with unique and handcrafted designs to fundraise for our field trips.

 

Every year,  our middle school participates in a project called Maker Immersion Week. We take this whole week to focus on raising funds for unique trips that take place during the curriculum. During the week, we learn new skills, create designs, and build foundations for our future business careers. This year, our funds are going towards a three-day trip to the Mt. Lemmon Sky Center Observatory. The products we're selling are t-shirts with designs made by the students. These students practiced business skills as well as creative thinking to generate designs for our t-shirts, as well as marketing. While making our shirts, the students learned to follow the process of screen printing, as well as patience and incorporating teamwork. The students printed these t-shirts to provide a creative and beneficial way to fundraise for our program.

 

Wolf

 

Abstract Tree

 

The Pessimistic Whales

 

Ocean Teacup

 

Flower in a Pocket

 

Foxy Ink

 

Little Dino

 

Two-Headed Snake

 

Hourglass

 

Night Time

 

Geometric Saguaro

 

Flower

 

Sunflower

 

Arrow

 

Menacing Mushroom

 

Drip Drop

story:
Hello, lovers of the Mad and Macabre (and  a warm greeting to those just looking for an eclectic campaign to support) we are The Exquisite Corpse Creations.

A TALE OF HORROR (and an idea)...

We are a home based company that makes and sells horror themed products, including shoes, hats, and shirts. And sometimes furniture but more on that in a moment.

We started The Exquisite Corpse Creations after a long and harrowing night of watching horror movies, talking about which Jason Voorhees was better (my preference is either part 3 or part 7), and wondering what would be an exciting and fulfilling business venture for us. Since both of us adore horror movies we thought it might be cool to make some of the products we always wanted to see. Tables with Dracula on them, shirts with an original design of Friday the 13th, shoes that look killer because they have a killer named Michael Myers on them. We wanted lots of horror. Lots of spooky things.

And so began The Exquisite Corpse Creations, which offered refurbished furniture (we sanded a lot of tables, stools, and etc.) that were adorned with horror icons, old and new.

Lots of interest in the products began to come our way but we noticed that shipping these items to all parts of the United States was too rich for our poor blood (being a small, work out of our bedroom, company).

So, we shifted to smaller product (shoes, hats, etc.), while not compromising the amazing artwork and craftsmanship. We wanted to offer a great, gory, gorgeous product to all those out there who loved horror as much as we did, but couldn't find the stuff they loved, like...

Sinister Shoes

Horrifying Hats

and Terrifying t-shirts

Our brains went into overdrive creating merchandise that received enormous positive feedback. We are still counting all the Facebook and Instagram likes, while receiving inquiries and orders.

But there is one problem... Yep, you guessed it. Money. Greenbacks. The root of all evil. The more you have of it the less you spend. That stuff we all need.

Now, we are here to illicit the help of all horror lovers and others, as well! With the money earned here, we will create all the wonderfully creepy merchandise so many people have either loved, bought, swooned over, or told us they wanted to buy in the very near future.

With your generous help we can expand our small, but audacious business and take over the world.

THIS IS US...

HUGE Horror Fanatics, Netflix Lovers, Competitive Board Game Players, Sports Enthusiasts, Hardcore Nerds, Proud Parents, & Engaged. 

Jeremy Tidwell graduated from University of North Florida with a degree in Literature and Film. He is a self taught artist who also dabbles in film making and writing. He creates every piece for The Exquisite Corpse Creations by hand.

Kaley Combee graduated from University of Central Florida with a degree in Interpersonal and Organizational Communication. She is also a writer, who also happens to have a great mind for marketing and business strategies. So, of course she handles the business side of the company.

WHERE YOUR MONEY GOES...

In a large hole in the ground where we'll horde it to create a genetically enhanced race of vampire bats that will be used to take over the world.

OR...

1. The money raised here will be used to kick start the company into high gear and allow us to purchase the products (shoes, hats, T-shirts, paint, pens, pencils, brushes, paper, printer ink, fabric pens, labels, tissue paper, shipping boxes, and anything else) needed to create our one of a kind merchandise.

2. The funds will also go toward updating and maintaining our website for the business, which will allow us to reach a broader customer base and allow for easier purchasing. Currently, our website is a bare bones, functional website but we want to be able to have an extensive website that allows for an overall easier browsing/purchasing experience for our customers. As of right now, we resort to using E-BAY and other selling sites of the same ilk.

Link to our current website: www.theexquisitecorpsecreations.com

3. The contributions we receive will also help to compensate for the purchase of our LLC. We have filed the paper work to ensure we are a legitimate business but the extraneous and hidden fees to do this continue to pile up in our mailbox. We want to establish a legitimate business to make our customers feel safe in their transactions with us and the best way to do this is to become an LLC, and the only way to have this happen is to keep paying the fees and eventually reach our goal.

4. Your donations will also be used to create an extensive advertising campaign that sets up an expansive network that lets us connect on a personal level with our customers and followers. This campaign will include social media but also grass roots marketing. Your money will afford us the opportunity to purchase advertising space in various horror magazines, purchase flyers, artwork, and etc. to distribute both locally and across the United States. We want to share our passion for this company with all the others who share a love for the spooky and grotesque side of cinema, books, and art.

4. The contributions we receive will go toward funding a booth and products for the horror convention Spooky Empire that is held in Orlando, Fl, every year. It is a great business opportunity for us, as far as, generating new customers, selling product, networking, and meeting the customers, we value so much, face to face. Our ultimate goal for this business is to make great products people will love but also to meet people and have fun. We also want to show them our passion for our products but also our passion for people and horror. At Spooky Empire, we will also be donating a $1, from every sell made, to a charity we are creating to benefit the United Cerebral Palsy Foundation. The foundation is called Naya's Journey, which we started after interacting with one of our first customers, when we discovered she had a daughter who suffered from cerebral palsy and we wanted to try and help by using our business as a platform to help raise money and awareness for Cerebral Palsy.

This is the logo for our foundation...


Important links for items mentioned above: 

http://www.spookyempire.com

 http://www.ucp.org

5. Money raised here will also fund future work, which will include more products and travel expenses to different conventions where we can showcase our product and generate more interest and new customers, which gives us the chance to have a great time meeting new people and just sharing our mutual love for horror!

AND TO THE END OF ALL THINGS...

So there it is boys, ghouls and other cool people. This is our campaign. Our proposal. We hope that something written or shown here has inspired you to donate or even just share the word. This is our business. Our company. Our life. We want to see it succeed in every way possible and we want friends, valued customers, online community, and kick ass people to be involved in this journey. 
We are the Exquisite Corpse. Join us.
And as always, Stay Spooky!
