story:
Moo. With your help, I would like to get my original Kowcup design t-shirt printed. In return, you could get your very own limited offer Kowcup t-shirt along with other gifts.
 
As a side project, I've estimated that getting this t-shirt into the world would cost about $500, which includes processing fees, costs of perks, and of course the printing of the shirt itself.
 
All the t-shirts will be printed with high-quality on high-quality cotton t-shirts.
 
 
Estimate T-shirt sizing Width/Height
S - 18.5in/26in (47cm/66cm)
M - 19.6in/27.1in (50cm/69cm)
L - 20.8in/28.3in (53cm/72cm)
XL - 22in/29.1in (56cm/74cm)
2XL - 23.2in/30in (59cm/76cm)
 
Keep in mind that cotton may shrink slightly when washed.
 
Shirts come in RED or BLACK.
 
Updated design:
Black/White/Yellow on RED
White/Yellow/Pink on BLACK
 
 

The final design may be slighty tweaked depending on the printing. I will provide updates if this should happen.

 

 

 

The Perks

$5 - Moo? - One thank you postcard from yours truly. Free shipping worldwide.
 
$30 - Calf~ - One t-shirt + thank you card. Shipping NOT included. I will haunt you down for shipping... not really, but fair warning you probably won't save much. Be a good sport and pick the following perk that comes with free shipping.
 
Shipping and handling
USA - $15.95
Taiwan - $9.95
Anywhere else that's capable of receiving packages - $19.95
 
 
$50 - Kow! - One t-shirt + hand-drawn thank you card. Free shipping worldwide.
 
$99 - Bull!? - One t-shirt + one of a kind A5-size hand-drawn drawing of your choosing (*) + thank you card. Free shipping worldwide.
 
*You may request anything, as long as I am not offended I will draw to the best of my limitations.
 
 
 
 
 
 
If I reach my goal of $500 or reach 30 t-shirts, I will add bonus gifts (TBD) along with the perks.
 
If I don't reach my goal of $500, I will truly thank and honor each and one of you who helped and fulfill my commitment with love (along with the shirts).
 
 
Please send a private comment in the comments section and indicate which t-shirt color (Red/Black) and size (S/M/L/XL/2XL) you wish to receive, it would be best if you could leave your e-mail that is associated with the payment. THANKS!
 
Also, if you know me personally or through a mutual friend, please indicate and I will throw in a special gift.
 
 
I estimate that all shipments should be sent before July assuming there are no holds or delays in the funding process. If there are any technical issues, I will keep you posted so be sure to check for updates or e-mails.
 
 
Cheers!
K
story_txt:
Moo. With your help, I would like to get my original Kowcup design t-shirt printed. In return, you could get your very own limited offer Kowcup t-shirt along with other gifts.
 
As a side project, I've estimated that getting this t-shirt into the world would cost about $500, which includes processing fees, costs of perks, and of course the printing of the shirt itself. 
 
All the t-shirts will be printed with high-quality on high-quality cotton t-shirts.
 
 
Estimate T-shirt sizing Width/Height
S - 18.5in/26in (47cm/66cm)
M - 19.6in/27.1in (50cm/69cm)
L - 20.8in/28.3in (53cm/72cm)
XL - 22in/29.1in (56cm/74cm)
2XL - 23.2in/30in (59cm/76cm)
 
Keep in mind that cotton may shrink slightly when washed.
 
Shirts come in RED or BLACK.
 

Updated design:
Black/White/Yellow on RED
White/Yellow/Pink on BLACK

 
 

The final design may be slighty tweaked depending on the printing. I will provide updates if this should happen.

 
 
 
The Perks
$5 - Moo? - One thank you postcard from yours truly. Free shipping worldwide.
 
$30 - Calf~ - One t-shirt + thank you card. Shipping NOT included. I will haunt you down for shipping... not really, but fair warning you probably won't save much. Be a good sport and pick the following perk that comes with free shipping.
 
Shipping and handling
USA - $15.95
Taiwan - $9.95
Anywhere else that's capable of receiving packages - $19.95
 
 
$50 - Kow! - One t-shirt + hand-drawn thank you card. Free shipping worldwide.
 
$99 - Bull!? - One t-shirt + one of a kind A5-size hand-drawn drawing of your choosing (*) + thank you card. Free shipping worldwide.
 
*You may request anything, as long as I am not offended I will draw to the best of my limitations.
 
 
 
 
 
 
If I reach my goal of $500 or reach 30 t-shirts, I will add bonus gifts (TBD) along with the perks.
 
If I don't reach my goal of $500, I will truly thank and honor each and one of you who helped and fulfill my commitment with love (along with the shirts).
 
 
Please send a private comment in the comments section and indicate which t-shirt color (Red/Black) and size (S/M/L/XL/2XL) you wish to receive, it would be best if you could leave your e-mail that is associated with the payment. THANKS!
 
Also, if you know me personally or through a mutual friend, please indicate and I will throw in a special gift.

Cheers!K

story:
LINEDWEAR

My name's Will, a native mid-westerner, who like so many others, has fallen in love with this city. DC is an amazing sports city with some of the best fans in the world, not to mention its endless amount of cultures, tastes, and flare. Regardless if you're from DC or not, you love it here and LINEDWEAR offers socks in not only DC team colors, but in colors to make any outfit or team uniform look awesome!

LINEDWEAR offers a unique fashionable way to simultaneously express one's city and team pride. Featuring the skyline of Washington D.C. (soon to be more), LINEDWEAR socks are made with different color patterns of local teams, (Nations, Redskins, Capitals, etc). But the design doesn't stop there - there are over 16 different sock designs featuring hundreds of color combinations to suit everyone's style. For example, there are green ones for St. Patrick's Day, Pink for Breast Cancer Awareness, and others just because they look awesome! The best part about

LINEDWEAR has also partnered with local recreational sports leagues (softball, kickball, bocce, flag football, frisbee, etc) to feature our socks! There are over 100,000 people in Washington DC alone who play in some LINEDWEAR offers each team a great way to match their team colors and their DC league. 

Our socks are a high quality, cotton and nylon combination that tailors to everyone from athletes to fashionistas. Whether you're outfitting your kickball team or just want to show your DC pride, LinedWear socks offer the perfect addition.

Take advantage of our awesome backing options today to get your collection started!

What can you do to help?

No matter if we reach the goal or not, ALL of the funds will go towards updating our LINEDWEAR inventory and making them available to YOU.

Our perks are some of the best. We want to make it cheap and easy for our first supporters to get as many of these great socks as they can because simply, the more people that wear them, the more people will see them!

You're our walking billboards.

The Impact

We take pride in what we do. Not only will you be representing DC in your own cool way, you'll be helping some great causes. A portion of every sale will go to Charity. For example, pink socks raise funds for Breast Cancer Awareness.

We're not just in it for us, we want to use our popularity and your support to help out people the best we can.

Other Ways You Can Help

We think our DC design is pretty cool! But if you think you have a better one, feel free to send it over. We'll review it and if we like it, we'll produce it and pay you for every one that sells! 

If you can't help, no worries. Please spread the word any way you can! And if you have any questions, feel free to email me any time at will.f.simon@gmail.com!

story:
Watch people experience Alpha for the first time. 

 

 

 

 

High Quality Audio With Open Ear Technology

  • Dual 16mm PI Gene speakers and a TI D-Class Amp to hear songs as the artist intended. 
  • Natural airflow design provides high-quality sound.
  • Open Ear Technology allows you to hear your favorite music and take or make calls while still being aware of noises around you.

 

​

 

 

Live Sharing and Streaming

  • Record high-quality video with hands-free convenience. 
  • Stream HD video in real time at 1080p resolution to YouTube, Twitch and Facebook.

 

 

 

A.I. Smart Assistant Voice Control

  • Open features on your phone such as Siri, Google Assistant, and Bixby to receive turn-by-turn GPS directions, listen to & send texts, and record voice messages. 
  • Search the web, get weather and traffic updates, check your email, and set reminders. 
  • Alpha is your personal assistant; you never have to pull out your phone again.

 

 

 

Trendloader App

  • Take a snapshot of your food and Alpha will send you a nutrition analysis of each food item per 100 grams. 
  • Take a picture of a product’s barcode and Alpha will send a price comparison from different stores and sellers to your Trendloader App.
  • Look directly at a foreign sign and have the translation read back to you.

 

 

 

Broadcast your work, play, and life’s most exciting moments with photo capture and video streaming.

Hear your turn-by-turn directions while driving, biking, skateboarding, or walking while still hearing the traffic noise around you. 

Make phone calls, dictate text messages, listen to directions, follow recipes, all while using your hands for more important things. 

Enjoy the outdoors while hearing your favorite music, sharing your sights, and keeping on top of your digital life.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Trendloader team is located in Orange, California and we all live highly active lifestyles.

We set out to eliminate the wires from our earphones and the heft of our headphones when we developed the Sigma, and we definitely succeeded.

The open-ear design was perfect for keeping us alert of our surroundings while producing amazing audio quality. As joggers, bikers, and sports junkies, both high-quality audio and awareness of our surroundings are extremely important to us, but in 2018, we thought, “Hey, we can do better.”

So, we did.

 

When we started development 1 year and 10 months ago, we were determined to create your perfect companion sunglasses by building the best audio quality packing in all of Alpha’s incredible features.

We’ve lost countless nights of sleep developing the software, designing the frames, and tuning the audio to meet our standards. We believe that we ticked every box with Alpha and are eager to bring it to the world.

Trendloader, a premium brand company of Oho Sunshine, has 10 years of experience in the video/audio sunglasses industry. We are excited to bring the biggest project we have yet. After years of fine tuning our skills, we challenged ourselves to go even further and make something sound even better. Alpha is the product of 10 years of experience.

 

 

 

 

 

An app with over 5 million downloads, CameraFi Live allows users to broadcast live on YouTube, Facebook, and Twitch with high-quality cameras. The software will be integrated right into our glasses and current CameraFi Live users will be able to seamlessly continue using the app with Alpha.

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

There are risks that may be out of our control. However, If there are any delays, we promise to communicate with our backers right away. We will keep each backer in the loop about the final shipping date.

story:
SAVIOR WATCHES | THE VERY 1ST CHRISTIAN BASED ECO-FRIENDLY WOODEN WATCHES MADE FROM BIBLICAL MATERIALS FROM THE HOLY LAND

OUR SAVIOR WATCHES, Based in the USA, are made of premium, authentic eco-friendly wood imported directly from the City of Nazareth, the town Jesus was from. We hand select all premium materials used, offering our customers the finest quality merchandise available. Each piece is handcrafted for a unique finish and exclusivity. Our ethos is authentic religious sustainability; we consciously incorporate an image on all packaging to symbolize the love and admiration towards our God.

We are a team of designers, musicians and athletes from California who accepted Jesus Christ as our Lord and Savior. Our main goal is to inspire others to walk the same righteous path the Lord paved for us with encouraging words He left for us engraved on the backs of each watch.

EZEKIEL 27:15 "Merchants came to you from Dedan. Numerous coastlands were your captive markets; they brought payment in ivory tusks and ebony wood.”

I KINGS 6:31"And for the entering of the oracle he made doors of olive tree: the lintel and side posts were a fifth part of the wall."


Why do we think OUR SAVIOR WATCHES are superior to similar wooden products?

We don't think, we know that our premium, authentic handpicked wood from the religious holy land is a more versatile material compared to regular wood. It's stronger and visually more detailed than most trees. For our packaging, we thought an eco-friendly custom designed recycled box would be the best fit for this watch complete with passages from the bible printed inside and out.

Our designer worked side by side with our engineers for over year making sure that every detail of this watch is met. The elegance and nature of this watch was something that could not be kept lightly and had to be done with it's highest integrity. Inside and out, every aspect of Savior Watches had to go hand in hand. To maintain the wood's natural aesthetic, we decided to use natural oils and bee’s wax to give it a nice clean finish.


100% Wrist-Friendly Designs!

When designing the watches, our main ethos was to produce a 100% "Wrist-friendly" authentic product so all metal screws have been countersunk and we have included a Scratch Resistant Mineral Crystal to protect the face of the time piece.

To give the watch’s dial more of a rich look, we chose onyx, a stone referenced in the bible several times which gave the face more of a thick / durable look.

EXODUS 28:9- "You shall take two onyx stones, and engrave on them the names of the sons of Israel..."

Passages from the bible have been placed throughout the packaging as well as the back casing of the watch. For the Rejoice watch, we wanted to share Luke 1:47 which says... "and my spirit has rejoiced in God my Savior," a perfect passage to share with others to let them know the joy God gives us.

To make the clasp, back casing and number marks really pop, we plated the stainless steel gold which compliments the wood giving the watch an opulent look.

The handcrafted case for the Rejoice Watch is 100% original, you will not see any watches like this in the market. Originality is something we at Savior Watches stand strong in with these statement pieces giving you, the customer, that strong sense of being in a class all by itself.

Timeline

Wood Importing: November (Ships from Nazareth, Israel by Sea)

-Wood sent from initial campaign with extra to fulfill an additional run.

-If Indiegogo exceeds in high numbers, additional wood will be shipped via air.

Production Starts: December

Production Ends: Early March

Quality Control / Shipping: End of March

Risks and challenges

We have spent an entire year working with our manufacturer to make this beautiful time piece. Both supplier and manufacturer understands the great importance of meeting our delivery dates as they know how meeting ship dates are crucial for retail chains. Our supplier and manufacturer have been in communications with each other for half a year now and we now have a comfortable game plan to execute once we hit production.

The only challenges we face that would delay the process of production would be any random acts of God and disasters.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't get a Savior Watch doesn't mean you still can't help! By sharing us, you could help get the attention we need to get more people involved and introduced on what we're doing.

story:
UPDATE 2: You can still Preorder Via AMAZON by going to http://orapup.com There is still time to get your Orapup before Christmas! So hurry. 

 

UPDATE: If all goes according to schedule, orders in the USA will arrive before CHRISTMAS! 

I LOVE DOGS! 

But I don’t love doggie breath. Ridding your dog of bad breath shouldn't be a burden on you. With Orapup, your dog cleans it's own tongue, eliminating bad breath at the source—without even knowing what its doing!

If this concept geeks you out like it does me, keep reading.

The Story of Dr Bob

I am 78 years old. My friends tell me I am probably one of the oldest entrepreneurs in America. They also tell me I may be one of the best looking, but they might be a little biased ;)

At the sunset of my life, I have become increasingly obsessed with leaving my mark on the world, but not in the same way a dog leaves his mark on the world. I wanted to do something more helpful and less bodily-function related. So, ten years ago when I learned that 80% to 90% of bad breath comes from a dirty tongue, I invented the Orabrush, the tongue cleaner that helps cure bad breath. 

Soon after launching Orabrush, customers started asking for a doggy Orabrush. Orapup was born. 

Orapup - Dog Breath Brush

But how do you get a dog to let you clean its tongue? You don’t! You let the dog do it. I designed Orapup's licking surface to be large enough for big dogs and for small dogs—and this was the brilliant part—all dogs in between.

Consider the perfect design and construction of this, the new best friend to man’s best friend.

*Note:The colors in these pictures are only a representation from the 3D model. They don't look near as vibrant as the real thing. 

Ultra-soft Bristles: Ultra-soft, pointed bristles clean deep into the uneven crevices of your dog’s tongue loosening stinky bacteria. I borrowed the bristle design from the surgeon's scrub brush, the same special bristles surgeons use to clean bacteria from their hands before they cut you open (sorry for the gross visual there).

Inline Scrapers: Four inline scrapers collect and remove the bacteria and residue generated from brushing, helping cure bad breath. I made the scapers obscure enough your dog won't even notice them, but they get the job done.

Handle Tilt: I tried loads of different handles until I had the perfect handle. It enables the dog to lick the Orapup in the vertical position. This is the position where the dog will extend the full length of it's tongue. It also keeps your hands from getting licked.

Flavor Packs: When we clean our own tongues or brush our teeth, we pull the bad breath causing gunk out of our mouth and then spit out the residue. Dogs don’t spit. I spent 8 months researching a flavor and consistency that dogs love and is completely edible and healthy:

  • Tastes like beef brisket
  • FDA approved ingredients
  • Anti-tartar
  • Natural enzymes help balance your dogs mouth and fight future bad breath

Perks

We want everyone who believes in this project to get a better deal on Orapup than if you wait for it to reach stores.

Here is a list of all of our possible perks:

Orapup Starter Kit

Includes Orapup and 5 Flavor Packs (this kit will retail for at least $15). Everyone and their dog will have one ;)

I'll Cuddle UR Face Off — Doggy Hoody

This reward is part of the $45 and $95 backer packages: 

I Kissed My Dog and I liked It - Orapup T-shirt

This reward is part of the $95 backer package (American Apparel Womens model #2102, Mens #2001). OMD! Oh my Dog! What a delightfully inappropriate shirt!

 Orabrush Tongue Cleaners

We are giving away Orabrush tongue cleaners with every reward. That way you won’t feel left out when your dog has squeaky clean breath and you don’t.

Choose your own colors

If you contribute $30 or more, you get to pick any of 5 colors (hot pink, midnight black, sapphire blue, blaze orange or voters' choice). Orapup backers get to vote for the fifth color and in so doing, leave their mark on the world.

 

What We Need

We have finished the design, we have working prototypes and we even have a commitment from a national pet store to carry Orapup. WOOHOO! We have a local manufacturer lined up and now we just need your help to make our first run of product. Your pledge will:

  • Help us raise the $40k needed to move our prototype to production and make our first run.
  • Help us make sure we have a mold large enough to handle the demand.
  • Give retailers confidence to stock Orapup on their shelves.
  • Make us really super happy and thrilled. We will love you forever. No. Really. FOREVER!

Orapup is a Customer Created Product

Customers:

  1. Bought and loved the Orabrush.
  2. Requested a similar product for their dogs via Facebook and YouTube (some even used their Orabrush on their dogs; not recommended).
  3. Submitted hundreds of name ideas for Orapup.
  4. Overwhelmingly voted on their favorite name: Orapup.
  5. Told us what worked and what didn’t as we tested different solutions.
  6. Are now funding the first production run of product!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

When will my Orapup arrive if I get one through Indiegogo?

We are planning to get Orapup shipped to Americans before Christmas! That means you can get them as gifts for the dog lovers in your family. Some other countriess may get them by Christmas, but we can't garauntee it.

How much will Orapup cost in stores?

The Orapup Starter Kit will retail for $15ish.

When will Orapup be in stores?

We expect to be in US stores in 2013. Other countries will come soon after. If you want one this year, you will need to back us on Indiegogo :)

Is Orapup Patented?

Yes. I already have one patent that applies to Orapup's bristle and scraper technology and I have others pending to protect the concept of letting dogs clean their own tongues.

Do all dogs like the flavor packs? Will it work on my dog?

We haven't found one dog that doesn't LOVE it. We tried literally dozens of different formulations until we found one that is universally loved. If your dog doesn't like it, please send us a note so we can work harder at the perfect formula.

Does it work on dogs of all sizes?

Does it really work?

Yes! It really works! FYI: It won't work on dogs who have bad breath being caused by gum disease or rotting teeth, but in almost all other cases it will eliminate the worst dog breath. NOTE: it won't make your dog smell like mint, it removes the rank odor from the tongue, leaving a clean healthy mouth.

 

If you are a member of the media and have additional questions, please contact press@orabrush.com

At the sunset of my life, I have become increasingly obsessed with leaving my mark on the world, but not in the same way a dog leaves his mark on the world. I wanted to do something more helpful and less bodily-function related. So, ten years ago when I learned that 80% to 90% of bad breath comes from a dirty tongue, I invented the Orabrush, the tongue cleaner that helps cure bad breath. 
Soon after launching Orabrush, customers started asking for a doggy Orabrush. Orapup was born. 

Orapup - Dog Breath Brush
But how do you get a dog to let you clean its tongue? You don’t! You let the dog do it. I designed Orapup's licking surface to be large enough for big dogs and for small dogs—and this was the brilliant part—all dogs in between.
Consider the perfect design and construction of this, the new best friend to man’s best friend.


*Note:The colors in these pictures are only a representation from the 3D model. They don't look near as vibrant as the real thing. 
Ultra-soft Bristles: Ultra-soft, pointed bristles clean deep into the uneven crevices of your dog’s tongue loosening stinky bacteria. I borrowed the bristle design from the surgeon's scrub brush, the same special bristles surgeons use to clean bacteria from their hands before they cut you open (sorry for the gross visual there).
Inline Scrapers: Four inline scrapers collect and remove the bacteria and residue generated from brushing, helping cure bad breath. I made the scapers obscure enough your dog won't even notice them, but they get the job done.
Handle Tilt: I tried loads of different handles until I had the perfect handle. It enables the dog to lick the Orapup in the vertical position. This is the position where the dog will extend the full length of it's tongue. It also keeps your hands from getting licked.
Flavor Packs: When we clean our own tongues or brush our teeth, we pull the bad breath causing gunk out of our mouth and then spit out the residue. Dogs don’t spit. I spent 8 months researching a flavor and consistency that dogs love and is completely edible and healthy:

Tastes like beef brisket
FDA approved ingredients
Anti-tartar
Natural enzymes help balance your dogs mouth and fight future bad breath

Perks


We want everyone who believes in this project to get a better deal on Orapup than if you wait for it to reach stores.
Here is a list of all of our possible perks:
Orapup Starter Kit
Includes Orapup and 5 Flavor Packs (this kit will retail for at least $15). Everyone and their dog will have one ;)
I'll Cuddle UR Face Off — Doggy Hoody
This reward is part of the $45 and $95 backer packages: 

I Kissed My Dog and I liked It - Orapup T-shirt
This reward is part of the $95 backer package (American Apparel Womens model #2102, Mens #2001). OMD! Oh my Dog! What a delightfully inappropriate shirt!
 Orabrush Tongue Cleaners
We are giving away Orabrush tongue cleaners with every reward. That way you won’t feel left out when your dog has squeaky clean breath and you don’t.

Choose your own colors
If you contribute $30 or more, you get to pick any of 5 colors (hot pink, midnight black, sapphire blue, blaze orange or voters' choice). Orapup backers get to vote for the fifth color and in so doing, leave their mark on the world.
 

What We Need
We have finished the design, we have working prototypes and we even have a commitment from a national pet store to carry Orapup. WOOHOO! We have a local manufacturer lined up and now we just need your help to make our first run of product. Your pledge will:

Help us raise the $40k needed to move our prototype to production and make our first run.
Help us make sure we have a mold large enough to handle the demand.
Give retailers confidence to stock Orapup on their shelves.
Make us really super happy and thrilled. We will love you forever. No. Really. FOREVER!



Orapup is a Customer Created Product

Customers:

Bought and loved the Orabrush.
Requested a similar product for their dogs via Facebook and YouTube (some even used their Orabrush on their dogs; not recommended).
Submitted hundreds of name ideas for Orapup.
Overwhelmingly voted on their favorite name: Orapup.
Told us what worked and what didn’t as we tested different solutions. 
Are now funding the first production run of product!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
When will my Orapup arrive if I get one through Indiegogo?
We are planning to get Orapup shipped to Americans before Christmas! That means you can get them as gifts for the dog lovers in your family. Some other countriess may get them by Christmas, but we can't garauntee it.
How much will Orapup cost in stores?
The Orapup Starter Kit will retail for $15ish.
When will Orapup be in stores?
We expect to be in US stores in 2013. Other countries will come soon after. If you want one this year, you will need to back us on Indiegogo :)
Is Orapup Patented?
Yes. I already have one patent that applies to Orapup's bristle and scraper technology and I have others pending to protect the concept of letting dogs clean their own tongues.
Do all dogs like the flavor packs? Will it work on my dog?
We haven't found one dog that doesn't LOVE it. We tried literally dozens of different formulations until we found one that is universally loved. If your dog doesn't like it, please send us a note so we can work harder at the perfect formula.
Does it work on dogs of all sizes?

Does it really work?
Yes! It really works! FYI: It won't work on dogs who have bad breath being caused by gum disease or rotting teeth, but in almost all other cases it will eliminate the worst dog breath. NOTE: it won't make your dog smell like mint, it removes the rank odor from the tongue, leaving a clean healthy mouth.
 
If you are a member of the media and have additional questions, please contact press@orabrush.com

story:
Short Summary

Hey Kahunas & KahunaGirls! We all had a great summer and enjoyed seeing you wear your Johnny Kahuna tees and "Surf, Sand, Kahuna!" tanks.

Now it's officially Fall and heading into the holiday season. You guys let us know what you wanted and now they're here!

Feel free to email us with any questions at JohnnyKahuna@JohnnyKahuna.com

KAHOODIES!!!

HOW IT WORKS!

  • Choose your Pre-order level and Reward
  • Once you place your pre-order you'll receive a email from KahunaDrew (Andrew) with 4 questions.
    1.What Design would you like on your KAHOODIE  2.What Color KAHOODIE would you like  3.What size (we can help you decided on sizes if needed)  4.Would you like us to ship it directly to you or to someone else as a gift (FREE Shipping)
  • For every Johnny Kahuna "JK" logo beanies ordered we will donate one just like the one you ordered to SFA - Surfers for Autism to be handed out by KahunaGirl Jordan Ogden
  • Get excited knowing you're a part of the Johnny Kahuna brand and that you will be getting your KAHOODIE and or JK logo beanie to show it.
  • Relax and feel good knowing you also helped us donate 10% to the Domestic Violence Shelter and Services of Wilmington, NC the charity that we support. #BreakTheCycle

The Designs for you to choose from

  • These design choices for  the KAHOODIE of your choice, zip-up or pullover style.
  • JK logo and Surf, Sand, Kahuna! will be outlined in white on darks and colors (including mult-neon) and outlined in blue or pink (your choice)  on white and grey. The Surfer and name image will be the same color as the KAHOODIE

  • .

Zip-UP KAHOODIE Colors for you to choose from

zip-ups are in uni-sex sizes from XS-XXL (women may prefer to order one size down)

Black, Charcoal, White & Deep Pink----   60% cotton/ 40% polyester 30/1's fine knit jersey, side seamed, taped neck, ribbed bottom and cuff, flat drawcord, kiss zipper, Kangaroo pocket, Beach Hood.

Mult-Neon and Mermaid Green---- 50% Polyester / 50% Cotton Fleece construction, hooded with white finished polyester drawcord, side seamed ,with Kangaroo pocket.

Pullover KAHOODIE (Youth Sizes Available!)

pullovers come in unisex sizes XS-XXL AND Youth sizes!

50% cotton/ 50% dryblend polyester preshrunk yarn,Air jet yarn (softer feel and no pilling)DryBlend Wicking Performance,Double-lined hood with drawstring,Double needle stitching, with Kangaroo pocket



JK Logo Beanies!

100% Acrylic knit beanie, approximately 8½ inch long with the Official Johnny Kahuna fabric tag with the JK logo.

For every one you pre-order one will be donated to SFA-Surfers For Autism and handed out by KahunaGirl Jordan Ogden


Original Johnny Kahuna Tees

available now for re-order in new sizes &Youth sizes added

The Johnny Kahuna "Premium Surfer Tee " -- available in heather blue and heather red

65% polyester 35% combed ringspun cotton 40/1 singles (VERY SOFT) side seamed Unisex sizes XS-XXL Youth Sizing XS (2-4) - XL (18-20) in 100% combed ringspun cotton.

The Johnny Kahuna navy "Logo Tee" on (left) and caribbean "Superhero Tee" (right) YOUTH SIZES NOW AVAILABLE!!!!!

100% combed ringspun cotton for ultra softness 30/1 singles Unisex sizes XS-XXL Youth sizes XS-XL (2-4 to 18-20)


Johnny Kahuna vinyl decals

Show your inner Kahuna or KahunaGirl with these Johnny Kahuna vinyl decals 

Green Skulls beware Pink Sharks    &  Original JK logo and motto "Surf, Sand, Kahuna!"

Hitcase Pro KAHOODIE pkg.


$200 FREE Shipping the package includes

1- Hitcase Pro for iPhone 5/5s or 4/4s

1- KAHOODIE zip-up

1- KAHOODIE pullover

1 - Johnny Kahuna Original tee

1- JK logo beanie

1- JK logo Beanie donated to Surfers For Autism




Thank You!

You are the brand!

Surf, Sand, Kahuna!

story:
Have you every wished that you could take part in something really historic? You know, like having been one of a handful of people Bill Gates called on to help him launch a new idea he called Windows?  Well, this is your opportunity to take part in the launch of a New brand.  Not just any brand, but a brand that was created  specifically for the purpose of  helping to "end the killing of millions of healthy pets" around the world, every year.

CAMPAIGN MISSION  To wage a successful campaign to be able to divide a million dollars among animal rescues around the world and jump start "NO-KILL 2020" as a self-sustained income generator.  The need here is three-fold.

 (1.)  To launch the "NO-KILL 2020" Brand as a full fledged profit center to generate the financial, technical and material support desperately needed by pet rescues and animal shelters. 

(2.)  To raise, donate and divide $1,000,000 among 4,000 rescues and shelters with each member receiving a grant for $250.

 (3.)  To jump start a 5-1/2 year experiment to equip and enable thousands of organizations to migrate to progressive 21st Century fundraiser models designed especially for the economic realities of today. 

MATCHING FUND CREDIT  If the mission is successful, NO-KILL 2020 will match the acquired sum, dollar for dollar in credit up to $250 per member to enable each one to order up to $500 of product.  That is enough goods to earn between $2,000 and $2,500 at fundraising.  The success of this campaign would mean the global pet rescues and animal shelters communities would receive a badly needed infusion of $2,000,000.  More importantly, rescues and shelters will finally able to discontinue their over-reliance on obsolete fundraisers based on having to ask for donations.  

THE "NO-KILL 2020" BRAND  The NO-KILL 2020 Brand was created as a fundraising platform to specifically help underwrite the enormous costs associated with the rescue, physical rehabilitation and re-homing of sheltered pets.  NO-KILL 2020's evolving lines of high quality popular consumer products will be sold exclusively through pet rescues and animal shelters creating dedicated income streams for them.  The sale of NO-KILL 2020 Products will earn rescues and shelters commissions of between 10% and 40% at fundraising.

                                       The "NO-KILL 2020" Brand Website 

 THE "NO-KILL 2020" CLUB  NO-KILL 2020 is setting up a Global Network of 4,000 pet rescues and animal shelters to interactively engage in coordinate research, development and fundraising.  Their short term goal is to help discover best practices and procedures necessary to achieve 100% NO-KILL sustainability to support and teach other rescuers in their regions. The long term objective is to participate in propagating the new learned strategies to help move the world toward reaching 100% NO-KILL of healthy pets by 2020.  The NK-2020 Club membership is Free and open to all qualified pet rescues and animal shelters who are invited to complete an application here:  http://contactme.com/4f235b2ad6397f000101af57
 
                                         ***************************

A GLOBAL EPIDEMIC  Every year from 3,000,000 to 4,000,000 healthy pets are needlessly killed in the United States and Canada alone.  The failure of owners to spayed or neutered their pets contributes greatly to the excessive number of pets in shelters who are killed as a population control measure.  However, the number one cause of pets euthanized is that there is not nearly enough money to meet the escalating costs for the tens of millions of animals that enter shelters annually.  The problem is global with the number of healthy pets being killed numbering in the hundreds of millions every year.  

THE RESCUE & SHELTER FUNDRAISER CONUNDRUM  It is estimated that there are between 9,000 and 12,000 rescues and shelters in the United States and Canada.   They almost all conduct fundraisers where asking for donations is at the heart of their appeal for money.  The problem is that the donation seeking based fundraiser models are obsolete relics from the 19th Century when the animal welfare consciousness took root.   Over the past thirty year or so, donations have steadily declined in proportion with worsening economies and shrinking dollar. There will soon come a time when rescuers will reach the point of diminishing returns in seeking donations. That is, the point when the expense of staging a fundraiser costs more than what one can expect to pull in from the fundraiser.      

FUNDRAISING MODELS FOR THE 21ST CENTURY   NO-KILL 2020 fundraisers are fully compatible with all of the economic realities of today.  They are run 24 hours a day, seven days a week to coincide with the reproductive cycle of unaltered pets.  Most importantly, they are immune from the negative effects of the economy.  Fundraisers that are created by NO-KILL 2020 are done so in ways to ensure that rescues and shelters will earn commissions as high as 40% of sales. 

MEASURES OF SUCCESS  There will be several factors to measure the success of NO-KILL 2020's 5 1/2 year strategy.  First and foremost, every club member is expected to have been elevated to 100% NO-KILL status and continued to be so without ever reverting throughout the experiment.  Club members will have established themselves within their respective countries and communities as leaders in the quest to make NO-KILL of healthy animals the norm.  NK-2020's Club overall membership will have grown by 1,000 member annually as founding members engage themselves in recruiting new rescues and shelters.  Finally, success will be reflected by an ever increasing sales growth of NO-KILL 2020 Brand products resulting from rescues and shelters who migrate from seeking donations.  

IF TARGET SUM IS NOT RAISED  The project will continue moving forward at a reduced rate commensurate with the amount of money raised.  Recruited club members will still receive Grants for $250 to enable them to order their first fundraiser kits.  However, the dollar for dollar matching credits will have to be shelved.  Our not reaching the target sum will be disappointing because its size is  commensurate with the scope of the challenge taken on by this campaign.

Whatever the case, at its completion, we will kick-off NO-KILL 2020's 5-1/2 year quest to reach 100% NO-KILL.  On March 15th of 2020, we'll perform an audit of all that has been accomplished and publish our findings as NO-KILL 2020's Best Practices and Procedures to Reach & Sustain 100% NO-KILL.   


THANKS, HIGH 5's & PERKS  Of these methods of saying thanks and showing our appreciation for contributions, we believe you'd be most happy to receive a unique NO-KILL 2020 Perk that can only be gotten from us.  So, please take a moment to peruse our list of fine perks and choose the one that speaks to you.   


                                       THE PASSING OF "VINNY THE PUG"

                                               Jul 1, 2000 - Mar 15, 2013 
                                        
It was during the final weeks just before he was to strike out on Vinny the Pug's long awaited 100-City Pet Rescue and Animal Shelter Fundraiser tour of the U.S. and Canada.  We was very excited about jumping into the Jeep driving to cities to conduct fundraiser training seminars with pet rescue and animal shelters.  Then, out of the clear blue, a malignant tumor appear on his tongue and over-night, sapped Vinny the Pug of his vibrant, fearless appearance reflected io all of his pictures in the desert.
The tumor quickly robbed Vinny the Pug of his strength and vitality which caused me to make that dreaded decision. On March 15th 2013 I entered
the veterinarian's small examining room carrying Vinny as though he was a new born baby.  The tears streamed from my eyes but I didn't care about being seen that way.  Vinny assisted me with putting on his climbing harness one last time as he'd done hundreds of times in the Sonoran Desert.  I hugged him tightly, kissed him atop his head many times and pressed the tips of my fingers deep into his ribcage.  I did so that when he started slipping into unconsciousness, Vinny would continue feeling my presence until the final millisecond of his awareness.  The doctor pulled out two hypodermic needles filled with pharmaceuticals and inserted them, one after the other into the the hookup on Vinny's left paw which had been shaved and prepared to receive the deadly concoction.   Within a blink of an eye she'd done it, she had begun the death process.  I squeeze him even tighter and rocked Vinny back and forth while whispering in his right ear, "I Love You Vinny, I Love You Vinny, I Love You Vinny".  My tears flowed like rain drops but I didn't care about how I appeared, my best friend was leaving me.  As I felt his muscle begin to relax, I pressed my fingertips even harder against his ribcage until his body was perfectly still.  then, there was a very strange smell  that whipped through the air which left as quickly as it came.  I remember  thinking, "this must be the smell of death".  I cried even harder and louder because of an overwhelming feeling that I'd just participated in the killing of my best friend. 
The doctor was very kind and understanding.  She asked if I wanted to spend more time with Vinny.  I declined and kissed him on the head one last time.  She very gently scooped up his body with a thick folded towel and slowly left the room walking backwards so that I could maintain eye contact with his body.  I stared at Vinny the Pug until the very last millisecond, when the self-closing door swung back in place. 
It is now nearly 18 months since Vinny the Pug left me forever and the pain I feel  is every bit as fresh as that final moment I spent with him though not as intense.  To be perfectly truthful, I don't want to ever get over losing my best friend Vinny the Pug.  The one thing I have discovered since he left me is that, in time great  pain can turn into even greater love for a  furry friend who has crossed over. 
As for me, I'm continuing the unfinished, final journey Vinny the Pug and I were preparing to strike-out on.  My destination is "100% NO-KILL" with an estimated time and date of arrival of 3:O' Clock PM of March 2020.

                                             A Tribute to "VINNY THE PUG"
                                                    

                                                                                                           

                                                       "Vinny the Pug Enterprises"                                     

ABOUT US   I was the trainer, photographer, biographer and publicist to Vinny the Pug, the world's second best known of his breed after Frank of "Men In Black".  Upon Vinny coming into my life in 2001, I decided to photograph Vinny's entire life and faithfully did so.  I took the final image of Vinny the Pug a mere two minutes before he took his final breath.   This "NO-KILL 2020" Campaign is in Honor of  and to celebrate the memory of my best and closest friend "Vinny the Pug".

Fundraiser tour of the U.S. and Canada.  We was very excited about jumping into the Jeep driving to cities to conduct fundraiser training seminars with pet rescue and animal shelters.  Then, out of The tumor quickly robbed Vinny the Pug of his strength and vitality which caused me to make that dreaded decision. On March 15th 2013 I enteredthe veterinarian's small examining room carrying Vinny as though he was a new born baby.  The tears streamed from my eyes but I didn't care about being seen that way.  Vinny assisted me with putting on his climbing harness one last time as he'd done hundreds of times in the Sonoran Desert.  I hugged him tightly, kissed him atop his head many times and pressed the tips of my fingers deep into his ribcage.  I did so that when he started slipping into unconsciousness, Vinny would continue feeling my presence until the final millisecond of his awareness.  The doctor pulled out two hypodermic needles filled with pharmaceuticals and inserted them, one after the other into the the hookup on Vinny's left paw which had been shaved and prepared to receive the deadly concoction.   Within a blink of an eye she'd done it, she had begun the death process.  I squeeze him even tighter and rocked Vinny back and forth while whispering in his right ear, "I Love You Vinny, I Love You Vinny, I Love You Vinny".  My tears flowed like rain drops but I didn't care about how I appeared, my best friend was leaving me.  As I felt his muscle begin to relax, I pressed my fingertips even harder against his ribcage until his body was perfectly still.  then, there was a very strange smell  that whipped through the air which left as quickly as it came.  I remember  thinking, "this must be the smell of death".  I cried even harder and louder because of an overwhelming feeling that I'd just participated in the killing of my best friend.  The doctor was very kind and understanding.  She asked if I wanted to spend more time with Vinny.  I declined and kissed him on the head one last time.  She very gently scooped up his body with a thick folded towel and slowly left the room walking backwards so that I could maintain eye contact with his body.  I stared at Vinny the Pug until the very last millisecond, when the self-closing door swung back in place.  It is now nearly 18 months since Vinny the Pug left me forever and the pain I feel  is every bit as fresh as that final moment I spent with him though not as intense.  To be perfectly truthful, I don't want to ever get over losing my best friend Vinny the Pug.  The one thing I have discovered since he left me is that, in time great  pain can turn into even greater love for a  furry friend who has crossed over.  As for me, I'm continuing the unfinished, final journey Vinny the Pug and I were preparing to strike-out on.  My destination is "100% NO-KILL" with an estimated time and date of arrival of 3:O' Clock PM of March 2020.                                             A Tribute to "VINNY THE PUG"                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "Vinny the Pug Enterprises"                                      ABOUT US   I was the trainer, photographer, 
biographer and publicist to Vinny the Pug, the world's second best known
 of his breed after Frank of "Men In Black".  Upon Vinny coming into my life in 2001, I decided to photograph Vinny's entire life and 
faithfully did so.  I took the final image of Vinny the Pug a mere two minutes before he took his final breath.   This "NO-KILL 2020" Campaign is in Honor of  and to celebrate the memory of my best and closest friend "Vinny the Pug".

story:
WHY YOU NEED THIS

Who wouldn't prefer a nice hot, home-made, meal for lunch?

What you eat largely determines how your body grows, develops and performs every day.  Diet is one of the most frequently looked to factors when assessing performance issues like Attention Deficit, Fatigue, and Hyperactivity, and common aches and pains.  Bringing a hot lunch from home allows you to control your diet and benefit in many, many ways.

Save money. Over the course of a career you could save $100,000 by bringing a sack lunch every day.

Feel great.  Hot foods are healthier.  They are more nutrient dense, and more easily digested.  Turns out mom was right - have a nice hot lunch and you'll feel better.

Lose weight.  Hot foods trigger the satiety response, so you feel fuller, sooner. 

Enjoy lunchtime.  Hot foods have more flavinoids - so they taste better too.

Get ready to say goodbye to cold sandwiches forever.  Wouldn't you rather have some of last nights' lasagna, a burger, or a gooey grilled cheese sandwich? Wouldn't it be great if you could just heat it up quickly in the morning and just have it Stay Hot?  Well, now you can!

 

PROTOTYPES

Our prototypes have gone through multiple design cycles and we believe we've finally perfected the secret sauce.  The tote is comprised of two compartments.  The lower compartment is designed to preserve heat for several hours.  It accomplishes this through a combination of special insulation,  and our proprietary Heat Banks.  It is made of a neoprene-like material designed to keep heat in, and be cool to the touch.  The upper compartment is designed to allow the user to pack cold items such as a drink or fruit.  The temperatures from the two compartments will not mix or interfere with one another.  So go ahead and bring that hot, juicy burger and an ice cold drink!

 

 

KEY FEATURES

  • Heat management: Using the same technology that NASA uses in space suits, our proprietary blend will literally control the temperature of your food. 
  • Insulation:  preHEAT uses a proprietary blend of insulation that literally traps the heat in the lower compartment and prevents it from seeping into the environment or into upper compartment.
  • Lightweight:  preHEAT is light enough for even a small child to carry.
  • Easy to use:  Simple design includes an expandable upper compartment and removable pouches.  Both compartments zip closed.
  • Reusable & Sustainable:  preHEAT can be reused thousands of times.  preHEAT can be wiped clean, so you don't need any harsh cleaning chemicals.
  • Safe:  preHEAT uses organic, non-toxic, food-grade materials.  We don't use toxic chemical coatings.  All materials are phalate and BPA-free.

 

HOW IT WORKS

This amazing feat of thermodynamics happens thanks to a special non-toxic, organic material that is housed and sewn into the removable pouches. This is what we call the Heat-Bank. This material is designed to melt above 140 degrees Fahrenheit, and absorb a lot of energy as it does. While it's absorbing all of this energy it becomes soft. This is how you know your Heat-Bank is full. Once the interior of the compartment begins to fall below this temperature, this special material begins to harden again - releasing the energy it stored when it melted. Thanks to a specially designed insulation layer the heat that is released into the interior of the bag is trapped there. This is how preHEAT keeps your lunch hot for so long. The difference is noticeable and can change the way you think about lunch.

preHEAT is designed to be super easy to use. Simply place the removable Heat Bank pouches in your microwave oven. Microwave times required to fill the Heat-Bank will vary depending on the strength of your microwave, so instructions will be provided with your purchase. For most microwaves, 3 minutes does the trick.  Replace the pouches in your preHEAT lunch tote.  The Heat-Bank is full. It will begin to release its stored heat into the preHEAT at just the right time, keeping your meal hotter, longer. Next, heat your food as you normally would.  Transfer it to a travel-safe container, place the filled container in your preHEAT.  Add a cold drink, a snack, and some fruit to the upper compartment.  Close it up and you're done. That's it!

With your help we can release these totes and let you experience the next level in food transportation.

 preHEAT vs. thermos

Thermoses are limited by the size of the opening and the cylindrical shape.  They can only contain small foods that can be compressed inside.  They are also heavy, bulky, difficult to carry and manipulate.  preHEAT has no such limits! It is smaller, lighter, more flexible and allows you to carry any hot food you can imagine!

 

What can I do with my preHEAT?

preHEAT can be used for any occasion where you may want to bring a warm meal.  Bring it to sporting events, picnics, the beach, camping, traveling, commuting, long car rides to grandma's house - anywhere you might want a hot meal.

 

 

HOT ALL DAY

The outer shell is made of a thick Neoprene-like material designed to be highly insular and cool to the touch. Combine this with a layer of our special super-insulation and preHEAT delivers. Early testers have been consistently impressed with how long preHEAT remains hot. Lab tests indicate that preHEAT will keep its contents hot 4-6 hours, with the first 4 hours at or above 140 degrees Fahrenheit. That's off the stovetop hot!

Did you know that eating a hot meal is actually better for you?

  • Hot food is easier to digest, making it easier for your body to absorb vitamins and other nutrients.
  • Hot foods contain more flavinoids. So it tastes better too!
  • Hot food also signals that "I'm full" feeling to your brain faster than cold foods. So if you're worried about your weight, hot food is the way to go.

Unlike many lunchboxes PreHEAT is much more sustainable. It is made from food-grade, non-toxic materials. All items are BPA-free, Phalate-free materials and preHEAT never uses toxic coatings on fabrics or linings. The stainless steel food containers can be reused thousands of times, so there's no waste. preHEAT is wipe-clean, so there's no need for harsh cleaning chemicals.

 

 

I am not sure about it.  Why do I need a thermal regulating lunch tote?

"If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses." - Henry Ford

Technology has taken us forward by leaps and bounds.  It saves us time, money, and provides new and unique services.  We need to adopt them to give ourselves more time for other, and better, things in life.  If you're still confused about whether or not you need preHEAT then ask yourself this: Do you have time to prepare a fresh meal for each and every meal? Do you worry about what allergens or toxins might be present in yours or your child's food?  Are you still spending tens, hundreds, or even thousands of dollars every year eating out in restaurants or on school lunches when you could pack your own, better meal, for far less?

 

Who made preHEAT?

THE BACK STORY

When my oldest son was three he stopped growing! He couldn't look me in the eye, answer a direct question, or concentrate for any length of time. He made strange noises, covered his ears, and played in the dirt while the other kids his age were building with blocks and learning to write their names. We were told he might be Autistic and should seek the advice of a developmental pediatrician. After medical evaluation and testing, we found out that his problems were the result of food allergies and food intolerance. We quickly changed the diet for the whole family.

The result? Within one week my son's hyperactivity abated. Within six months he grew several inches. Over time his noises and other "quirks" disappeared. I'm happy to say that he is now an incredibly smart, funny, healthy, and very typical ten year old.

While the benefits of a more natural, healthier diet were very visible and obvious, a method for maintaining it wasn't. This new diet presented me with quite a challenge. Eating out? Forget about it. Almost every store or restaurant bought meal contains some allergen or other no-no food. Parties and treats provided by schools or daycare? Nope. These are usually made with gluten, dairy, and other allergens. Not to mention packed with preservatives, chemicals and dyes. School lunches? Not a chance. Highly processed mystery meat was definitely out. I ended up cooking all natural, whole foods at home, packing them in some sort of container and carrying it with us everywhere we went. But how to keep it from spoiling? Cooked foods need to be kept hot to prevent the growth of bacteria.

And so, preHEAT was born.

 

Where we are

The materials are ready.  Through over a dozen iterations/prototypes, we've found our secret sauce - and it's ready for production.

Further, we've mastered the manufacturing.  The pieces are all in place to make preHEAT a reality.

We're down to the final barrier.  We need your help to bring preHEAT to life. 

This campaign is for one Navy preHEAT.  As a stretch goal, if the preHEAT project takes off, we will grow our offering by adding additional colors and prints and even additional sizes.

 

So where does the funding go?

preHEAT is a multi-purpose design.  It requires the material for the Heat Bank, textiles, special insulation, and of course, the final construction.  We've put a lot of work to bring preHEAT to life; however, getting something robust enough to endure the elements, simple enough to use, light enough to carry, safe enough for children, and finally cheap enough so everyone can afford one, we have to professionally manufacture both the materials and the totes; which is an expensive proposition.  The funding we raise with your help will be used for purchasing the materials to build the Heat Bank, as well as, covering the production of the proprietary raw materials, along with fixed and variable costs of making the totes.  We know you will love to have the newest Hot lunch tote.

 

We'd love to talk to you.  Feel free to email us at mzimberg@elements-accessories.com

 

*PATENT PENDING

story:
Our Story

UNIBOT is one of the most progressive streetwear labels representing the underground surf, skate, art and music communities—from indie to established signed to unsigned, we are defined by an unapologetically everything goes fresh perspective, UNIBOT is the fashion and lifestyle of those inspiring the trends of tomorrow.


Our mission at Unibot is to continuously provide an innovating brand of clothing to compliment, enhance, and accent any lifestyle. To us "fashion" is about being different. We provide the opportunity of expression through the simplicity and the uniqueness found in each design. As we move into the future, Unibot will continue to create the style, continue the movement, provide the clothes, represent the lifestyle, set the trend, and change the world as we do it. We feel that our design aesthetic is unparalleled and has the potential to become a timeless collection.


If new products can come and go, why can't the stores that display them do the same? Mobile pop-up stores are a new spin on retail that we think will reflect our love for life and all it has to offer. We travel around posting to social media sites about where we will be and when - one minute we're there selling apparel out of our truck and the next minute we're dust in the wind. Remember doing scavenger hunts when you were younger and how much fun they could be? Well, think of Unibot as one big scavenger hunt except this time you're on a quest for exclusive threads.


The Impact

Our goal with this campaign is quite simple: making the dream a reality. This dream will go beyond us; we want to support other struggling enthusiasts too but to get there we have to get here first.


So, what if we cannot raise the entire amount in the duration of the campaign? We will be pan handling on Santa Monica Third Street singing All by Myself with a bottle of Boone’s Farm. Okay, so maybe it won't be that bad but let's hope we won't have to find out. Even if we make a quarter of this goal, we'll be satisfied because at least we'll know that someone out there believes in our dream.


Nothing great in the world has been accomplished without a little passion, right?


What We Need

We are trying to raise $20,000 for the follow: 


  1. To get the threads printed.
  2. To get our 1967 Chevy Pickup Truck (the Mobile Store) running, restored and customized in a way so it will be recognizable, approachable and memorable.
  3. To sponsor talented people in the world of action sports.

Break Down

$5200.00 will go towards the restoration and customization of our 1967 Chevy Pickup Truck, which will act as our Mobile Store. A new bed, paint job, and wheels are needed, plus marketing materials and graphics to make it look the part.


$1500.00 will go towards the production budget to shoot a professional promotional video for the Mobile Store.


$1500.00 will go towards a booth at the MAGIC Fashion Trade Show in February 2012.


$1800.00 will go towards the advertising and marketing budget.


$10,000.00 will go towards the first run of our clothing. We would like to produce a good amount of sealable products such as hoodies, shirts, jerseys, accessories and jeans to name a few. 


Another portion of this $10,000 will be used for sponsoring the athletes, artists, musicians and other dreamers that have a love and focus in the world of action sports. 





Thanks for your support!

Love,

The Unicorns & Robots

story:
A monthly subscription box geared specifically for sports fans!

Every month you'll receive a GearBoxx filled with sports related products -- Tailgating Gear, GameDay Party Gear, Fan Cave Gear, and more! Plus, each GearBoxx features officially licensed fan gear for your favorite sports teams!

You pick the teams! All teams in every professional league are available, plus more than 50 of the top colleges and universities!


The Play By Play

Join GearBoxx!
Select one or more of our awesome GearBoxxes... Pick the GameDay GearBoxx for Professional Sports, or choose the Collegiate GearBoxx for College Sports.

Select Options
Choose your favorite teams from each available league, and tell us your shirt and hat sizes.

Get Cool Gear!
Every month, you'll receive your GearBoxx (or GearBoxxes) filled with cool gear including officially licensed fan gear for one or more of the teams you picked!

The Playing Field

Everyone loves sports, and everyone has their favorite teams they're passionate about supporting. Sales of licensed sports merchandise exceeded over 16 billion dollars in 2013, and continues to grow!

Subscription boxes are the hottest trend on the market today, featuring everything from beauty products to socks to adult novelties, and have grown into a 4 billion dollar industry with hundreds of thousands of subscribers in just a few short years with no signs of slowing down!

Yet, there are no subscription boxes for professional or collegiate sports fans.

GearBoxx fills this void with GameDay GearBoxx and Collegiate GearBoxx, allowing subscribers to pick their favorite teams and receive officially licensed gear... Every month!


Any Team... Any Where... No Malls

One frustration experienced by sports fans around the country (and the world) is the lack of products in their area for out-of-town teams. Ever tried to find Eagles merchandise in Dallas? Or Arizona merchandise in Maine? Even fans of local teams still have to brave the hazards of mall shopping to get to the gear they want for the teams they love.

With GearBoxx, subscribers can pick their teams and receive officially licensed merchandise every month without the  frustration of navigating the mall parking lot or fighting the crowd only to find nothing for their favorite team.

Plus, the GearBoxx site will also host our easy to navigate GearShop where subscribers can find even more gear, often at discount prices!


Fan Guy or Fan Gal, We've Got Your Gear

Face it, guys... The ladies can be every bit as much of a sports nut as you are! When you become a subscriber and complete your profile, you'll let us know if you're a Fan Guy or a Fan Gal. When we send out GearBoxxes with gender-specific items we'll know who to send them to!


Your contribution to this campaign will help GearBoxx kick-off right! The funds raised will help pay for organizational costs, infrastructure including further development of our website, fulfillment systems & equipment, inventory & supplies, and marketing expenses.

According to Gallup, sixty-three percent of Americans describe themselves as sports fans. That's more than 150 million adults. You can't throw a baseball anywhere in the U.S. without a sports fan nearby to catch it! One tenth of one percent is more than 150,000 people! In the business world, they have a word for a market this size: Ginormous! 

From a business standpoint, this brings rise to some unique challenges which the funds from this campaign will help us address:

Meeting Demand: Inventory, Supplies & Equipment

We already have several thousand dollars invested in inventory, supplies and equipment, but need to be ready to scale quickly as our subscriber base grows. (Concern about potentially growing too quickly... What a terrible challenge to have, right?) 

Reaching the Audience: Marketing

Even in a market this massive, you have to get your name and service in front of your audience. We won't be dropping $4 million on a Super Half-Time ad spot any time soon, but marketing is a significant part of our operating budget.

Your contribution will help put us in scoring position!



We've put together some very cool perks to thank you for being awesome and contributing to our campaign:
GearBoxx Hall of Fame 2014 Decal
An exclusive for contributors to our Indiegogo Campaign, this static cling decal clings to almost any smooth surface, has a clear backround, and is removable & reusable.


GearBoxx Can Koozie
Keep your beverage cold, not your hands with this can koozie constructed of neoprene.


GearBoxx T-Shirt
Get this awesome GearBoxx T-Shirt featuring the GearBoxx logo as a pocket print.


GearBoxx Football Jersey
Get this super-awesome football jersey featuring the GearBoxx logo on the front... We'll personalize the back with your name above the number for an added contribution of only 20 bucks!

The Wall of Fame

As a contributor, your name will be listed on our Wall of Fame at getGearBoxx.com! Plus, if you send us a picture of yourself holding your GearBoxx, or wearing your GearBoxx T-Shirt or Football Jersey, we'll include it on the Wall of Fame too!

The Starting Line-Up

Be an "early adopter", or as we call it: The Starting Line-Up!
To be on the Starting Line-Up, simply select a contribution level that includes a premier GearBoxx or subscription. Not only will you be one of the first to get a GearBoxx, you'll be a part of a special group which will receive EXCLUSIVE discounts and special offers for life!
Is this preferential treatment, you may ask... Of course it is! You're helping us kick-off an awesome business. You deserve more than just a one time perk!


Spread the word. Create a buzz. Cause a stir... Cheer us on!

Use the links at the top of this page (right under the video) to share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, your website or blog, via email... It's easy, takes two seconds, costs nothing, and it really helps!

Help us reach our goal, and you could WIN an officially licensed jersey for your favorite team, personalized with your name!

No contribution necessary to win! So share the heck out of it!
story_txt:
A monthly subscription box geared specifically for sports fans!
Every month you'll receive a GearBoxx filled with sports related products -- Tailgating Gear, GameDay Party Gear, Fan Cave Gear, and more! Plus, each GearBoxx features officially licensed fan gear for your favorite sports teams!
You pick the teams! All teams in every professional league are available, plus more than 50 of the top colleges and universities!

The Play By Play


Join GearBoxx!Select one or more of our awesome GearBoxxes... Pick the GameDay GearBoxx for Professional Sports, or choose the Collegiate GearBoxx for College Sports.


Select OptionsChoose your favorite teams from each available league, and tell us your shirt and hat sizes.


Get Cool Gear!Every month, you'll receive your GearBoxx (or GearBoxxes) filled with cool gear including officially licensed fan gear for one or more of the teams you picked!


The Playing Field
Everyone loves sports, and everyone has their favorite teams they're passionate about supporting. Sales of licensed sports merchandise exceeded over 16 billion dollars in 2013, and continues to grow!
Subscription boxes are the hottest trend on the market today, featuring everything from beauty products to socks to adult novelties, and have grown into a 4 billion dollar industry with hundreds of thousands of subscribers in just a few short years with no signs of slowing down!
Yet, there are no subscription boxes for professional or collegiate sports fans.
GearBoxx fills this void with GameDay GearBoxx and Collegiate GearBoxx, allowing subscribers to pick their favorite teams and receive officially licensed gear... Every month!


Any Team... Any Where... No Malls
One frustration experienced by sports fans around the country (and the world) is the lack of products in their area for out-of-town teams. Ever tried to find Eagles merchandise in Dallas? Or Arizona merchandise in Maine? Even fans of local teams still have to brave the hazards of mall shopping to get to the gear they want for the teams they love.
With GearBoxx, subscribers can pick their teams and receive officially licensed merchandise every month without the  frustration of navigating the mall parking lot or fighting the crowd only to find nothing for their favorite team.
Plus, the GearBoxx site will also host our easy to navigate GearShop where subscribers can find even more gear, often at discount prices!


Fan Guy or Fan Gal, We've Got Your Gear
Face it, guys... The ladies can be every bit as much of a sports nut as you are! When you become a subscriber and complete your profile, you'll let us know if you're a Fan Guy or a Fan Gal. When we send out GearBoxxes with gender-specific items we'll know who to send them to!





Your contribution to this campaign will help GearBoxx kick-off right! The funds raised will help pay for organizational costs, infrastructure including further development of our website, fulfillment systems & equipment, inventory & supplies, and marketing expenses.


According to Gallup, sixty-three percent of Americans describe themselves as sports fans. That's more than 150 million adults. You can't throw a baseball anywhere in the U.S. without a sports fan nearby to catch it! One tenth of one percent is more than 150,000 people! In the business world, they have a word for a market this size: Ginormous!

Meeting Demand: Inventory, Supplies & Equipment

We already have several thousand dollars invested in inventory, supplies and equipment, but need to be ready to scale quickly as our subscriber base grows. (Concern about potentially growing too quickly... What a terrible challenge to have, right?) 
Reaching the Audience: Marketing
Even in a market this massive, you have to get your name and service in front of your audience. We won't be dropping $4 million on a Super Half-Time ad spot any time soon, but marketing is a significant part of our operating budget.
Your contribution will help put us in scoring position!

story:
PROBLEM

Traditional sneakers have almost zero cushioning.

SOLUTION

Inspired by cushioned marathon maximalist running shoes, MARATOWN developed a thick super cushioned sole made of very soft and bouncy materials. A new way to offer maximal comfort.

 

BOUNCELLS™ is the material used in the sole. It is a high dense closed cell copolymer EVA, exclusively developped for Maratown™. Similar to the cutting edge running shoe technology, Bouncells™ is:

-Super soft: around 20 ShA

-Elastic: rebound is as important as shock absorption. Without rebound after a step, it would feel like walking in the sand - exhausting. Rebound return energy to the step makes the walk more dynamic. 

-Resilient: it doesn't flatten before millions of steps.

-Lightweight: similar is used in running shoes where weight is essential.

MARATOWN put 33% less pressure on your feet at the pic impact with the ground (measured with pressure sensors insole), thanks to our highly-cushioned soles. 

Feel your feet can't handle any more pressure in your painful shoes? You are at the right place.

 

PODIATRISTS

B.Gaignot, podiatrist Paris, France : "Maratown offers a real, innovating, shock absorbing sole with modern style. Maratown also meets standards of comfortable shoes: wide room, lightweight, seamless inside, padded collar and tongue, and removable insoles for you to insert your personalized orthotic insoles. As a podiatrist, I would also say Maratown fits with most orthoses, especially for the diabetic foot"

 

 

 FIELDTESTERS

 

 

Lining : aniline calf leather

Upper : full grain calf leather

Lateral stitching

 

6 styles - unisex.

 

 

 

 

Klein blue lining.

 

 

 

Cushion is our focus. However, we worked with podiatrists and orthotists to address important comfort requirements, listed below.

DROP

The heel is 0.45 in higher than the forefront, to spread pressure throughout the foot:

BENDING  

Despite the thickness of the sole, the use of soft materials and a thinner front allows the shoe to the bend at the right point: at the base of the big toe where your feet articulate.

REMOVABLE INSOLE  

Are you using customized orthopedic insoles? In addition to offering the opportunity to remove the insole, you will keep 90% of the cushioning property in the middle sole, as opposed to traditional shoes where very little cushion is in the insole.

PADDED COLLAR AND TONGUE  

Maratown provide padding and cushioning at all pressure points, not only in the sole.

SOFT LEATHER  

No more stiff leather that hurts, even after breaking it in.

DURABILITY  

While you might understandably think that using soft material could cause on a short lifespan, the durability of MARATOWN is at least as long as normal shoe, thanks to :  

-A 3 mm rubber outsole  

-The high density and resiliency of our soft, non-flattening foam.

PRICE FOR ONE PAIR :

$159 (Indiegogo price)

$299 (retail price, after the Kickstarter campaign)

SHIPPING

Free shipping US and EU

$30 everywhere else (shipping worldwide)

TIMELINE

February - March : Kickstarter & Indiegogo Indemand

April - May : production

May - June : delivery

 

We all love the comfort of our sport shoes. Period. Have you ever tried the cushioning of a maximalist running shoe made for marathons? MARATOWN combines cushioned maximalist marathon running shoe with classy urban styles. They are perfect for your everyday marathons, at work or while standing and walking all day. With your MARATOWNs, you walk on clouds every day.

Maratown's founder Fabien Rosier running a half marathon with Maratown dress shoes, in 1h48min.

TEAM

Fabien Rosier, creator

And many experts, freelances and partners : shoe designers and producers, podiatrists and pedorthists, laboratory engineers, logistics and sales professionals, accountants, e-commerce developers, photographers...

SECOND CAMPAIGN

Maratown is a crowd funded shoe brand. We launched in 2015, thanks to a $30,000.00 successful campaign on Kickstarter and Indiegogo to finance and launch the first production.

HANDCRAFTED IN PORTUGAL

MARATOWNs are made in Portugal, in keeping with European standards of worker health and safety conditions. We use premium materials, especially naturally soft leather. MARATOWNs are stored and shipped from our warehouses in the USA and France.

CONTACT US

Nancy, chief evangelist at Maratown : nancy(at)maratown.com

MARATOWN™ US INC. 244 Fifth Avenue, Suite F272 New York - N.Y. 10001 - USA

Please let us know your size by email at nancy@maratown.com.

1-Measure your feet  

Please take the extreme back end of your heel.

2-Convert 

 

3-At home

Use our innovative fitting kit for internet purchasers (photos of our first dress shoes collection!).

In each shoe box we include volume adjusters and heel liners to use if your MARATOWNs fit a little too large or long.

-SIZE- Where I pick my size?

Please let us know your size by email at nancy@maratown.com.

-SIZE- What is the width? How do they fit? 

Maratown™ fit true to size. All our forms have been studied by specialists to offer the best fit. Even purchased on the internet, you will get the perfect sized shoe, thanks to our easy size guide and to our innovative fitting kit, including volume adjusters and heel liners. We also use soft leather uppers which will get used to your feet more easier than usual shoes. Please refer to the size guide to find your exact size. 

-SIZE- If the shoe fit too small or too large? 

We do accept exchanges. Before inquiring for an exchange, please our innovative fitting kit included in each shoe box, made up of volume adjusters and heel liners. 

-ORDER- How do I pick my size ? 

Once you have ordered on Indiegogo, please send us an email with your shoe size at nancy@maratown.com.

-ORDER- How do I change my shipping address? 

Please send us an email at nancy@maratown.com.

-SHIPPING- What about taxes and duties? 

Duties or taxes are included in the price for USA and EU. Shipping outside USA and EU may be subject to taxes and customs duties. If there are any such fees, these must be paid by the person receiving the package when it reaches its destination -not on Kickstarter-, e.g. via the carrier. 

-EXCHANGE- Do you accept exchanges? 

Yes, we'll gladly exchange your shoes for another size - but not another style. Since we are a start-up and are offering Maratown™ shoes at highly discounted prices, you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. Please note that due to our limited inventory, exchanges are not always possible. Shoes you exchange must be in their original package and be in perfect condition (please try your shoes at home). Shipping fee for return per pair: $15 in US, €15 in EU, $40 for the rest of the world. Please check our size guide to avoid the need for exchanges. 

-EXCHANGE- How many times I have to exchange? 

Returns are accepted up to 30 days after delivery. 

-EXCHANGE- Do you accept returns? 

We won’t be able to accept returns on this project. However, we will change the size of the shoes if necessary - but not the style.
