story:
Peren Son of the Dragon is the ultimate perennial timepiece manufactured as a tribute to the greatest Transylvanian Prince, Vlad Dracula, Son of the Dragon.

DISCOVER THE UNTOLD STORY

After the amazing success of the first Kickstarter campaign when I manage to raise more than 500% of the initial goal.

I teamed up with a Swiss Manufacturing Company with over 30 years in the watchmaking industry to produce the ultimate perennial watch developed and individually assembled In-House in the watch capital of the world Biel/Bienne, Switzerland.

 ''There is something about Peren watches that I like, the idea of direct purchases from the company right to your wrists, simply fantastic''

 wristreview.com

We bring to the next level the trendiest ‘’Direct to you’’ feature of the most Kickstarter watches.

IN HOUSE DESIGN AND ASSEMBLING

At Peren Watches we exercise control over all the aspects of the manufacturing process. This particular approach confers us the possibility of producing unique products unmatched quality-wise at the selected price level.

The design of the watch has its inspiration from the Transylvanian tradition and mythology combined with the distinctive legacy of elaborate craftsmanship preserved throughout generations.

 After spending more than one year in the designing process under the guidance of Red Dott award winning Swiss designers.

 We managed to integrate a revolutionary moon-phase indicator at 6H inspired by the astronomical phenomenon of Blood Moon.

 The SOD Logo is inspired by the same representation of a Dragon at the house where Vlad Dracula was born in the city of Sighisoara, Transylvania.

The special elements that define the Transylvanian design of the watch are the two hemicycles at 12H and 6H with holes for both the Date window as well as the Moon-phase indicator. This particularity has its inspiration from the medieval Transylvanian castles.

 Another key aspect of the design is the double layered dial with red indexes on the first layer and fangs shaped excisions on the upper layer. The center of the dial is built to emphasize the bat shape of the embossed inner dial carved with wooden horizontal lines pattern and inspired by the Transylvanian mythology.

 Because we pay the utmost attention to the details, we choose to print our dials at the same Swiss Company as renowned brands such as Omega, Zenith, and Tudor.

The Swiss Made ISA 8171 Movement with its patented double rotor motor and central chronograph trotteuse with five steps per second, it operates similar to an automatic or mechanical movement, giving a smooth motion to the unique chronograph central hand with the counterweight logo harmoniously aligned with the Peren, Transylvania inscription.

WITNESS THE WATCH IN ACTION

 If a certain level of the funding process will be overpassed every perennial timepiece will be individually engraved with the production number on the side of the case.

Emphasizing a distinctive quality expertise within the watches, it is achieved by using only premium quality raw materials and only after conducting a various number of tests throughout the complete manufacturing and assembling process.

  • Case: Surgical Grade Stainless Steel 316L 
  • Water Resistance: 5 ATM 
  • Diameter: 40 mm, Thickness: 10 mm 
  • Crystal: Doomed Scratch resistant Sapphire Crystal 
  •  Dial: Two Layered Black Metal Dial 
  • Round Date window at 12H 
  • Round Moon Phase Indicator at 6H 
  • Hands: Dark Gun PVD plated 3D hour and minute Hands 
  • Movement: Swiss Made ISA 8171 - 204 Patented double rotor motor
  • Chronograph functions: Center hand stop 1/5 sec 30 minutes counter 
  • Strap: Genuine Black leather strap with red stitches and red leather inlay. 
  • Hand Made Transylvanian Black calf leather with red stitches and red leather inlay. 
  • Bracelet: 316L Stainless Steel
  • Buckle: Surgical Grade Stainless Steel 316L 

PEREN SOD BLACK

PEREN SOD GRAY

PEREN SOD STEEL S

PEREN SOD BLACK S

PEREN SOD STEEL

PEREN SOD GRAY S

Peren is a distinctive Transylvanian brand producing perennial timepieces. 

The name of the brand originates from the Latin word perennis, meaning perennial, everlasting, perpetual. 

 The logo of the brand represents a watch strap buckle with fangs and it is the depiction of Transylvanian mythology combined with the art of watchmaking. 

Son of the Dragon is the signification of Dracula and originates from Vlad The Second also known as Vlad the Dragon, member of the medieval chivalric Order of the Dragon 

SOD is an acronym for Son of the Dragon and it is also known in medical terms as an enzyme within the red blood cells  

 We have the prototypes and packaging ready and we are here on Kickstarter to raise the capital that we need for our first run. We believe that we can change the process that you have to do in order to have a hand assembled, Swiss Made perennial timepiece on your wrist. We know it's a tough goal, but with your support, together we can succeed

 Our factory partner is ready to start production and we are ready for assembling, packing and shipment immediately after our Kickstarter campaign ends. Having already a short lead time with the prototypes, we strongly believe that this will be available also for the first production. We aim to start shipping watches to our backers by June 2016.

Risks and challenges

At this point, we are in the final stages of our project and have overcome many of the difficulties related to the manufacturing and assembling process. We have an amazing manufactory partner and a professional Swiss team working alongside us. 
We don't expect any major problems, but we do understand that there is always the possibility of occurring some small delays in the coming months. We will notify all the backers about our progress so far with updates, photos and videos.

PEREN SOD BLACKPEREN SOD GRAYPEREN SOD STEEL SPEREN SOD BLACK SPEREN SOD STEELPEREN SOD GRAY SPeren is a distinctive Transylvanian brand producing perennial timepieces. The name of the brand originates from the Latin word perennis, meaning perennial, everlasting, perpetual.  The logo of the brand represents a watch strap buckle with fangs and it is the depiction of Transylvanian mythology combined with the art of watchmaking. Son of the Dragon is the signification of Dracula and originates from Vlad The Second also known as Vlad the Dragon, member of the medieval chivalric Order of the Dragon SOD is an acronym for Son of the Dragon and it is also known in medical terms as an enzyme within the red blood cells   We have the prototypes and packaging ready and we are here on Kickstarter to raise the capital that we need for our first run. We believe that we can change the process that you have to do in order to have a hand assembled, Swiss Made perennial timepiece on your wrist. We know it's a tough goal, but with your support, together we can succeed Our factory partner is ready to start production and we are ready for assembling, packing and shipment immediately after our Kickstarter campaign ends. Having already a short lead time with the prototypes, we strongly believe that this will be available also for the first production. We aim to start shipping watches to our backers by June 2016.Risks and challengesAt this point, we are in the final stages of our project and have overcome many of the difficulties related to the manufacturing and assembling process. We have an amazing manufactory partner and a professional Swiss team working alongside us. We don't expect any major problems, but we do understand that there is always the possibility of occurring some small delays in the coming months. We will notify all the backers about our progress so far with updates, photos and videos.

story:
Nimb is a ring with a panic button that allows you to send an emergency alert to preset contacts from the mobile app with just the touch of a thumb.
 

 

Emergencies can be scary, but Nimb provides vibration feedback to let you know that a message has gone out and help is on the way. Whether you’re in trouble, experiencing a health issue or being attacked, Nimb is there to call for help when you need it most.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Nimb will track your location in real-time and the response team will always know exactly where you are. Stay connected to your loved ones with Nimb, when using other devices for communication is not possible. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You can join communities to help and empower people with similar values and views. If you belong to an organization, a movement or a team, now you are able to support your fellow associates, should they happen to be in urgent need.

 

 

We see Nimb as a movement towards safer environments, where people combine efforts to help someone in trouble, whether they are authorized officials, close ones, sympathetic neighbors or just passersby.

The key to a safer world is in your hands, literally.

 

 

 

It can wash your parental anxiety away — you will always know if your kids need help. Your senior relatives can rely on Nimb if they have troubles using a cell phone or other devices.

 

Have a younger daughter or a sibling in college? You can both wear Nimb and know that you’ll never miss an alert from them. Whether you’re at the movies, napping or out for dinner, as long as you both wear Nimb rings and an alert goes out, your Nimb will vibrate to let you know that she or he needs help.

 

Doing extreme sports or like traveling? Nimb will become your most trusted companion. It works everywhere in the world where cellular networks function. Nimb will help you to explore new places or limits while feeling safe and secure.

 

If you have entrepreneurial ambitions and are running your own business, Nimb can protect your employees and valuable equipment.

 

If your health condition creates some limits for using traditional communication means, Nimb can provide you with an easy and reliable way to call for help.

 

We understand that the older you are, the more attention you might need. Many senior citizens feel uncomfortable about wearing panic buttons on their necks, as these devices draw unwelcome attention and make them feel old. Nimb is a stylish ring that is not only more convenient than the neck piece but also elegant. 

 

 

 

 

Nimb is beautiful and comfortable on your finger. The future shines on its metal moldings, and matt surface — Stealth Black and Classic White — complements your sense of taste. The ring is available in US ring sizes 4-12, you can wear it on any of your fingers!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Eight incredibly intelligent engineers that comprise our technical team have an average of 10 years worth of experience in developing both consumer and non-consumer wearables. This team has previously developed products for Epson and LG. Our technical team also has extensive experience working with Chinese manufacturing companies.

 

We have selected only the most reliable parts, which can be easily mass produced. To make sure we deliver on time we have already started the negotiation process with factories in China and Taiwan. The device is a product of a rigorous development process: we are offering you the second version of the device, which has been vastly improved. For example, the ring size was decreased by 20% from the original version.

 

We care about reliability and usability. We are confident in the components we have selected. The button is located in such a way that it is intuitively easy to press in emergency situations. All the materials we used are hypoallergenic.

 

The engineering design is simple and very reliable. The battery provides a long work cycle. The vibration motor and light source provide feedback and allow not only to send but also to receive signals.

Our intellectual property is protected by eight utility and design patents, some of them currently pending.  

 

 

 

As of today, we have developed our second version of Nimb prototype and are currently working with several factories, getting ready to start mass production. This very design that you see in photos throughout the campaign page are, in fact, working prototypes, so the ring you receive will look just like it does in the photos!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Nimb team eventually met Kathy, who experienced a life threatening attack of her own.

In 2000, Kathy was violently attacked by a complete stranger and was on the brink of death. She suffered multiple stab wounds and lacerations in a safe neighborhood, just a few feet from the police station. Her saving grace wasn’t just her fight and drive to survive, but the call for help. Since then, she has been searching to find a way for others to have a voice when they’re in need of help.

 

When Kathy met the Nimb team, she was eager to join in. Not only is Kathy now our Communications Director, she has since then become an activist and one of the driving forces behind this project. Thus, the team empowered by personal experiences brought Nimb to life. To us, the journey to achieve personal security is just that, personal. With Nimb, everyone can feel safe in almost any situation. 

 

Nimb Inc. is a team of bright-eyed enthusiasts who have united to launch this campaign. Our team spans multiple disciplines including hardware, software, finance, marketing, communications and product design.

 

Honestly, we’re far beyond the chaos of a startup, while other teams may prove to be ineffective and unmatured. By attracting the best managers and directors, we are making Nimb the coolest wearable to complement your style and help you stay safe and protected on the go.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Your voices mean a lot to us, and we would love to hear your suggestions and personal stories. 

 

Please help us bring our product to life in order to save lives. Together, we can make it happen!

 

FAQ

 

 

  • What are the materials of the ring?

    Nimb is made of high quality glossy metal and matt plastic. All the materials are hypoallergenic.

     

  • Is Nimb waterproof?

    Currently, the ring is protected against dust and splashes of water. We are working to make it water and dust resistant according to the IP67 class of protection.

     

  • Is there any warranty?

    We offer a one-year warranty for the ring. The warranty and replacement policy will be finalized after we choose out production facility.

     

  • Who can be included in the pre-set list of alert receivers?

    Nimb users decide whom to alert in case of emergency. She or he manages the list of alert receivers in the application. The list can include relatives and friends, local authorities, law enforcement agencies, private security organizations and other receivers from different safety circles. The user can pre-set an option when the alert is available for passers by and/or members of communities who have our application installed and volunteered to provide help.

     

  • How does the ring alert the police?

    Nimb user chooses whom to alert and sets the list of receivers. In the app settings she or he can activate the option to alert your emergency contacts. When you press the button on either the ring or the app, our system creates a robotic call option — the call goes to the nearest emergency dispatch center (the system makes a decision based on your GPS coordinates) and contains all crucial information about you: your name, gender and location. This message explains to the operator, that the call is automatic because you are in an emergency and you could't make a personal call.

     

  • What if I press the button accidentally?

    It's nearly impossible to press the button by accident, because (1) we concealed it in the ring design and (2) you would have to keep pressing the button for three seconds to start the alert process. The ring starts vibrating immediately once you press the button, so you will definitely notice it and be able to stop pressing the button if sending an alert signal wasn’t your intention. Also, the system provides an additional 20 seconds to cancel the alert in the application if you press the button by mistake.

     

  • Is there a subscription fee?

    Our alert system is very flexible. You can use our application for free to send and receive Nimb alerts. You can purchase the ring and use it without any subscription fee. Only if you choose to alert private security services, you may have to pay a subscription fee depending on such service and your location.

     

  • Will Nimb work if my phone is dead?

    You need your smartphone operational with Bluetooth® on to send alerts from the ring. That said, we’re going to introduce the next generation of rings in about a year. The next generation will perform independently. We are working very hard to make sure that the new technology is stable before implementing it in such an important wearable device as a safety ring.

     

  • Can I pair the ring to two smartphones?

    You can pair the ring only to one smartphone. Should you choose to, you can reconnect your ring to a different smartphone.

     

  • What kind of notifications does the system send?

    It can be push notification in the app, text message, a call, an email or a vibration signal to the ring or a combination thereof.

     

  • Do alert recipients also need a ring to receive alerts or do they only need to download the app?

    You do not need the ring on the receiving end. Your emergency contacts will get a push message in the app if they have downloaded the app and also receive an SMS with a link to our website, where they can get info similar to the one in the app: your location, your information card, chat to communicate with others who have responded, etc. However, if they do have a Nimb ring, the ring will vibrate when there is an emergency message coming in. Even if their phone is in a purse, or is otherwise not easily accessible, they won't miss your call for help.

     

  • How I can be sure it doesn’t track my location all the time?

    Your privacy is our highest priority. We respect your right to privacy and treat your personal information with strict confidentiality. You profile information and location become available to your safety circles only after you send out an alert. You only activate the tracking feature by pressing the button for three seconds.

     

  • Will you ship internationally?

    Nimb works everywhere in the world, as long as the ring is paired with a compatible smartphone that has an active cellular and data connection. We will be happy to ship Nimb to your location anywhere around the world.

     

  • What is crowdsource security?

    Crowdsource security is a system where individuals are connected via Nimb devices and the app to provide help to those in trouble and in need of help. While we have a lot of faith in official law enforcement agencies we can add value to such services — by empowering communities to protect themselves.

     

  • Do I have to wear Nimb on a certain finger?

    We have a wide range of sizes for your convenience — you can wear Nimb on any finger of your right or left hand.

     

  • How long does the battery last?

    Nimb is functional for up to two weeks without recharging. The charger is included with your purchase of the device.

     

  • Why did you decide to make a device as a ring?

    Only with the ring you can send an alert quickly and quietly, even if both of your hands’ movements are immobilized or restricted.

     

  • Would an attacker take the ring off if he or she knows of the ring?

    To begin with, we view the wide exposure and adoption of our product as an advantage, because attackers tend to avoid those who protect themselves. We have all seen those signs "Protected by such and such" or even "Beware of dog". Moreover, it would be quite challenging to have your Nimb ring removed in under three seconds, the time you need to keep pressing the button and sending out an alert.

     

  • What is the maximum operating distance between a smartphone and Nimb?

    We use Class 2 Bluetooth® module with a range of up to 100 feet/30 meters. The range of 100 feet/30 meters is the best achievable range under perfect conditions. In real life situations, the device usually provides a range of 15 to 30 feet/5 to 10 meters, and we prefer to provide you with actual factsand not create unrealistic expectations so that you can act accordingly. Since we are talking about emergencies where every second counts we recommend keeping your phone within 15 feet/5 meters from the ring, where the connection works well in most situations. You should also know that the range depends not only on the transmitterand the mobile phone which is receiving data, but also depends on weather, geographic and local conditions. 
    We are constantly working to improve Nimb's features and functionality. We plan to have the next version of the ring to be completely independent from smartphones. Until then, we are confident in the ring’s stable performance within the specified range and hope to provide our backers with the best available technical solution.
story_txt:
Nimb is a ring with a panic button that allows you to send an emergency alert to preset contacts from the mobile app with just the touch of a thumb.

 

 
Emergencies can be scary, but Nimb provides vibration feedback to let you know that a message has gone out and help is on the way. Whether you’re in trouble, experiencing a health issue or being attacked, Nimb is there to call for help when you need it most.
 

 
 

 


 

 
 

  When in trouble, press the button and hold it for three seconds — the message with your profile info and your location reaches your safety circles. Sending an alert message takes only three seconds. After that you can call 911 or other emergency service, if the situation allows you to do so. 


 
Nimb will track your location in real-time and the response team will always know exactly where you are. Stay connected to your loved ones with Nimb, when using other devices for communication is not possible. 
 

 

 
 

  When you use the Nimb mobile app, you’re free to choose and set up your safety circles however you like. You can set it up to alert only the emergency services, just your best friend, your entire family or people nearby — the power is in your hands.


 


 

 
 

  We believe that society is ready to provide its members with peer-to-peer help even in extreme situations. Communities have a role to play in bringing better practices to different areas of life. Personal security shouldn’t be an exception.

You can join communities to help and empower people with similar values and views. If you belong to an organization, a movement or a team, now you are able to support your fellow associates, should they happen to be in urgent need.
 

 
We see Nimb as a movement towards safer environments, where people combine efforts to help someone in trouble, whether they are authorized officials, close ones, sympathetic neighbors or just passersby.
The key to a safer world is in your hands, literally.
 

 
 

  Nimb helps to create a safer environment for yourself and those around you, from caregivers to health scares.

It can wash your parental anxiety away — you will always know if your kids need help. Your senior relatives can rely on Nimb if they have troubles using a cell phone or other devices.

 
Have a younger daughter or a sibling in college? You can both wear Nimb and know that you’ll never miss an alert from them. Whether you’re at the movies, napping or out for dinner, as long as you both wear Nimb rings and an alert goes out, your Nimb will vibrate to let you know that she or he needs help.

 
Doing extreme sports or like traveling? Nimb will become your most trusted companion. It works everywhere in the world where cellular networks function. Nimb will help you to explore new places or limits while feeling safe and secure.

 
If you have entrepreneurial ambitions and are running your own business, Nimb can protect your employees and valuable equipment.

 
If your health condition creates some limits for using traditional communication means, Nimb can provide you with an easy and reliable way to call for help.

 
We understand that the older you are, the more attention you might need. Many senior citizens feel uncomfortable about wearing panic buttons on their necks, as these devices draw unwelcome attention and make them feel old. Nimb is a stylish ring that is not only more convenient than the neck piece but also elegant. 

 

 
 

  Nimb is very efficient in emergencies, but it’s cool, too. We played with colors and forms to come with a simple and polished design that you would totally like, whatever style you prefer: city chic, smart casual, luxury glam or health-gothic. 


 
Nimb is beautiful and comfortable on your finger. The future shines on its metal moldings, and matt surface — Stealth Black and Classic White — complements your sense of taste. The ring is available in US ring sizes 4-12, you can wear it on any of your fingers!
 

 
 

  Reliable performance of a safety ring is an absolute must — we took it very seriously and conducted hundreds of tests. We made sure that Nimb’s ergonomics is optimal and sending the signal is easy. Then we worked thoroughly to prevent accidental alerts, bringing this possibility to a feasible minimum. We tested the stability of Bluetooth signal, application responses, applied pressure of different force and duration to the button. It copes with shower rain and routine work around the house. We’ve taken the ring through almost every relevant testing to help our product live up to the promise. 


 

 

 

 
 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 Give the ring to your loved ones and wear one yourself, and you’ll always know when they need your help: your ring will vibrate if they press their panic button. 


 
 

 If you cannot reach your loved one, you can send a vibration signal to her or his ring to attract their attention.


 

  With Nimb you are less likely to forget your phone in a taxi or a restaurant. The ring will vibrate as soon as the distance between the phone and the ring exceeds preset limit.


 

 Not only does Nimb give you the chance to alert friends & family when you find yourself in an uncertain or threatening situation, it also offers an audio recording function that automatically collects evidence from your smartphone once the panic button has been pressed.


 

 Your privacy means as much to us as it does to you. We want you to know that Nimb is not a tracking device. Your location and information will only be shared after you press the panic button. We make sure to keep your info private and secure. In case of an emergency, we have the ability to provide your info to response teams, but only to save your life. 


 

 
 

 
 

 

 
 
 
 

 
 

  We have been working tirelessly to improve the design for well over a year now. Not only is the design of the ring important to us, but we also gave a lot of thought to how Nimb can fit into your daily life. We want Nimb to be there for you when you need it most.

Eight incredibly intelligent engineers that comprise our technical team have an average of 10 years worth of experience in developing both consumer and non-consumer wearables. This team has previously developed products for Epson and LG. Our technical team also has extensive experience working with Chinese manufacturing companies.

 
We have selected only the most reliable parts, which can be easily mass produced. To make sure we deliver on time we have already started the negotiation process with factories in China and Taiwan. The device is a product of a rigorous development process: we are offering you the second version of the device, which has been vastly improved. For example, the ring size was decreased by 20% from the original version.

 
We care about reliability and usability. We are confident in the components we have selected. The button is located in such a way that it is intuitively easy to press in emergency situations. All the materials we used are hypoallergenic.

 
The engineering design is simple and very reliable. The battery provides a long work cycle. The vibration motor and light source provide feedback and allow not only to send but also to receive signals.
Our intellectual property is protected by eight utility and design patents, some of them currently pending.  
 

 
 

  Our team has worked vigorously through more than 100 different designs of Nimb and asked more than 2,000 women to choose which they love the most. 

As of today, we have developed our second version of Nimb prototype and are currently working with several factories, getting ready to start mass production. This very design that you see in photos throughout the campaign page are, in fact, working prototypes, so the ring you receive will look just like it does in the photos!

 

 
 

 

 

 
 

 

 Everything started when our founder Leo found out that his female friend had been attacked while walking down the street. She had her phone and a can of pepper spray in her purse, but no time to reach in and grab either one of them. The outcome is what you see now. We decided that this horrific experience would become more than a staggering statistic.


 
The Nimb team eventually met Kathy, who experienced a life threatening attack of her own.
In 2000, Kathy was violently attacked by a complete stranger and was on the brink of death. She suffered multiple stab wounds and lacerations in a safe neighborhood, just a few feet from the police station. Her saving grace wasn’t just her fight and drive to survive, but the call for help. Since then, she has been searching to find a way for others to have a voice when they’re in need of help.

 
When Kathy met the Nimb team, she was eager to join in. Not only is Kathy now our Communications Director, she has since then become an activist and one of the driving forces behind this project. Thus, the team empowered by personal experiences brought Nimb to life. To us, the journey to achieve personal security is just that, personal. With Nimb, everyone can feel safe in almost any situation. 

 
Nimb Inc. is a team of bright-eyed enthusiasts who have united to launch this campaign. Our team spans multiple disciplines including hardware, software, finance, marketing, communications and product design.
 

 

 

 Leo, Nimb’s CEO and founder, previously started an online educational project that partnered with more than 50 famous actors. That company received grants from Google in AdWords advertising for its technology and unique ideas. At the same time Apple featured this mobile application on the main App Store banner for three weeks. Leo now devotes his undivided attention to Nimb’s development. You can reach him at leo@nimb.com.


 Nick is Nimb’s CMO and founder with an entrepreneurial zeal that invariably defines his character. While still in college, he founded several online stores, chats and blogs. Nick currently owns a successful marketing agency. His major clients include Unilever, Ford, Heinz, BAYER, LVMH, and Philips. He also launched a mobile and social media game development studio, which achieved one of the highest rates of installs and has kept its reputation even after 7 years on the market. The total amount of game installations skyrocketed from 0 to 100,000,000 in just one year. If you’re interested in knowing his secret, just send him a message to nick@nimb.com.


 Alex is our CTO and co-founder. He has over 10 years of experience in engineering and computer programming. As a college student, Alex created algorithms of human palm recognition, then developed algorithms of picture recognition for robotic hand control. He has taken part in commercial software creation as a senior developer and project lead. If you’re interested in knowing more about our technology, product design and app, just contact him at alex@nimb.com.


 Kathy, our Communications Director and co-founder of Nimb. She had 1.5M twitter account followers. We could stop here, but there's a lot more about her that makes us absolutely sure that Nimb communications are in very skilled and talented hands. Kathy has twenty years of experience in public and investor relations. She developed communications strategies for major IPOs and M&As on emerging markets, contributed to GQ and Forbes as an interviewer and a columnist and has been cast in TV projects in Europe. For any media inquiries, you can contact her at kathy@nimb.com. 

Honestly, we’re far beyond the chaos of a startup, while other teams may prove to be ineffective and unmatured. By attracting the best managers and directors, we are making Nimb the coolest wearable to complement your style and help you stay safe and protected on the go.
 

 
 

 

 


  


 
 
 

 
 
 
 

  
 

  While we’ve been developing Nimb for quite some time now, we felt it was the right time to open it to the community to help receive feedback and raise the funds to get our project off the ground. We have the team to get the job done, now it’s up to you.

Your voices mean a lot to us, and we would love to hear your suggestions and personal stories. 

 
Please help us bring our product to life in order to save lives. Together, we can make it happen!
 
FAQ
 
 


What are the materials of the ring?
Nimb is made of high quality glossy metal and matt plastic. All the materials are hypoallergenic.

Currently, the ring is protected against dust and splashes of water. We are working to make it water and dust resistant according to the IP67 class of protection.

story:
Help us bring you amazing steampunk fashion. Help us bring you the fantastically fashionable steampunk style Tea Room Jacket.

What is Verillas?

At Verillas, we strive to bring you artisan quality, hand made clothing and boots. We travel the world looking for the best materials, the best craftsmen, and the best quality. We strive to give you clothing and boots that you can proudly wear 10, 20, even 30 years from now. We care about what you wear and we want you to look great and to confidently know that the pair of boots you have on can and will last you for your epic travels and grand adventures.

We at Verillas want to invite you to take part in our creative process by helping to fund the next run of Tea Room Jackets. Our Tea Room Jackets are stylish, comfortable, and flattering, designed to help you look and feel great while displaying your own unique style. By taking part in this campaign, you get special rewards and discounts on our products while at the same time helping us order a new line of Tea Room Jackets made by Red Queen. Without your support, we won't be able to order any more of the garment and you won't be able to enjoy it.

This is the Tea Room Jacket in all its glory, which you can own with a pledge.

The Tea Room Jacket is an elegant vintage-style garment made with a flattering cut, comfortable fit, and decorated with Victorian-style embroidery and buttons. 

Available in Black in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL

What do you get? Your perks for helping us are...

A $5 pledge gets you a $10 gift card for Verillas.com, which you can use on any item at checkout. Gift card good toward anything on Verillas.com


$15 Pledge gets you the Steamlace Choker

$15 Pledge gets you a pair of Steamlace Gloves

$30 Pledge gets you a Fairy Fossil Necklace

$50 Pledge gets you the Steamvial Holster and the Fairy Fossil Necklace 

$89 Pledge gets you the Tea Room Jacket and the Fairy Fossil Necklace

A  Pledge  of $169 gets you The Lady Adventurer, including:

Tea Room Jacket + Ruffle Steam Skirt in black + Fairy Fossil Necklace 

A Pledge of $249 gets you The Grand Empress collection, including:

Your Choice of Steampunk Goggles + The Tea Room Jacket + Ruffle Steam Skirt + Fairy Fossil Necklace + Steamlace Glove

     The Rufflesteam Skirt with a elastic waist and layers of flowing black lace.

Help us bring you the Steampunk Fashion you want

You help us make our goal, we help you look great in the best clothing out there. Take advantage of the fantastic deals we are offering you here in this campaign to save money and look great. You help us fit the bill so we can order more of the products you love. We help you by saving you money and making you the style icon and envy of wherever you go. Sound good? Will you help us? Will you take advantage of this deal and make yourself look the best you can?
We have stretch goals as well, so if we make more than what we need, those of you who have pledged will end up with even more goodies.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help but don't feel like ordering anything, please share this campaign with as many people you can. Not only will your support and encouragement help make the Tea Room Jacket possible, but you might help someone else find that garment they've been looking for.

story:
Discover ASB Perfect Blend

 

                     What is ASB Perfect Blend?

                            

                                        

The ASB Perfect Blend 2-in-1 dual-ended foundation stick is paraben-free and made with an aloe-based formula and comes in six shades packaged in a compact chamber that provides coverage, contour, highlight, lift and balance to your complexion. The ASB vegan brush allows for smooth application and helps to remove all the guesswork that comes with putting on concealer – giving you that matte finish for that youthful look that we all love.

                                                      

With ASB Perfect Blend you get to enjoy the benefits of Ashunta Sheriff's 16 years of experience working with some of entertainment's most beautiful women in your home, while traveling, or wherever you need to be while looking your best!

                                     

                                         

                                      

         Before                                                                            After

                                    Who is Ashunta Sheriff?

           

I have been a Celebrity Makeup Artist for 16 years.  My clients include Alicia Keys, Rhianna, Janelle Monàe, Molly Sims, Kerry Washington,  Zoe Kravtiz, and Emmy Rossum. I hope to add you to that list! 

I am also a mother of four who understands the pressures of a busy schedule and how little time there is to take care of one's self.  Looking beautiful doesn't need to take a lot of time, but it does require a quality line like Ashunta Sheriff Beauty!

 I’ve captured media attention as a Celebrity Makeup Artist:


I come to you today...

 

To get your support as I use my years of experience to develop a line of beauty products that are celebrity-quality.  All support directed to this campaign will go toward growing and creating Ashunta Sheriff Beauty products.  This is an absolute passion of mine.  I can't wait to see it grow!

With your help, I can take the industry on by not only providing that Perfect Blend but products that continue to help the everyday woman.  After all, don't you deserve to look as good as an actress or singer?

Thank you from the bottom of my heart for visiting my page and letting me share why this is so important to me! Please SHARE this page with all of your friends on your social media pages!

story:
Nude Barre's Beginning

I truly have been fortunate to pursue my passions of performance arts and entertainment. As a teenager I trained with Dance Theatre of Harlem and Alvin Ailey. As a college student, I majored in Ballet and minored in Business Management at the prestigious Marymount Manhattan College in New York City. Finally as a young adult, I gained professional experience as a model, commercial actress, and Knicks City Dancer.  Ten years of experience in the entertainment industry has afforded me an acute understanding of the needs and demands that performers face throughout their careers. Interestingly, one reoccurring challenge was the need for proper undergarments. Two qualities that entertainers look for when purchasing products are transparency and skin color match. Of the two, certain brands offer transparency, while color matching remains in high demand.

In all stages of my dance career, I have experienced the hardships of not finding hosiery that matched my skin tone. We were required to wear nude undergarments as part of our uniform and therefore spent hours dying/spray painting tights and shoes as most hosiery brands did not produce the appropriate shade of nude. This too was a common complaint of the wardrobe departments of many castings and productions that I have been a part of. Sadly, the dying method was a luxury not often afforded to projects due to budget constraints and the laborious process. As a result, many women, of all races, were left feeling uncomfortable and unprepared to perform. This was the origin of Nude Barre in 2009.

Nude Barre offers 16 different shades of color matching undergarments by utilizing the foundation makeup colors. Nude Barre has addressed both customer concerns of transparency and color matching. Though the genesis of Nude Barre came from the entertainment world, I quickly learned during the seed and start-up stages of the company that my product was in high demand by all women and had applications not only for the stage, but also for everyday wear by business women, teachers, mothers, entrepreneurs, socialites, etc.

Currently in its 5th year of operations, Nude Barre has a strong customer base that enjoys a high quality product at a very affordable price.  As we enter the growth phase of our business, I am extremely excited for the of increased sales and customers, new employees, and other infrastructural upgrades. Your support through Indigogo will be a critical component to the continued success of Nude Barre.


The Campaign:

Nude Barre is a specialty line of eco friendly undergarments made in 16 shades of nude to match all women's skin tones. I'm asking for your help in raising $50,000 to grow Nude Barre. Over the past few years, Nude Barre has enjoyed some great success. Celebrities such as Wendy Williams, Mya, and Melissa Gorga have fallen in love with Nude Barre fishnets. Various dance schools, professional dance companies, and productions have also become Nude Barre customers.

Additionally, Last spring I was accepted into the Workshop at Macy's Inc. program which selected 20 minority/women owned businesses that have potential to sell in Macy's stores nationwide. The workshop taught participants how to sell to department stores like Macy's and I was given an opportunity to pitch Nude Barre to the buyers.

But now I need your help to take Nude Barre to the next level. We are in need of hiring more employees for the day to day operations. Given inventory and sales growth, Nude Barre needs to move from my home office to a commercial office space and showroom. I also need to become EDI compliant so that we can do business with major department stores such as Macy's. Furthermore, we have redesigned the Nude Barre packaging (as requested by some of our buyers) and your donation will help us manufacture the new design.



Nude Barre plans to grow into a full undergarments brand that makes all things underwear in 16 shades of nude. I am so excited to have completed the samples for the Nude Barre panties. This campaign will help provide the capital needed to launch the underwear line this summer.  Nude Barre has a proven model and track record of success. With your support, we will be able to provide more women with a much needed solution to their undergarment challenges. Nude Barre is reinventing underwear. It's where great fashion meets solution. Nude Comes in all shades—what's your color? 


Messages from Ms. Wendy Williams


Nude Comes in All Shades

Color: Almond Joy fishnets

Color: Brown Sugar fishnets

Color: Almond Joy Convertible Opaque Tights

Color: Brown Sugar Convertible Opaque Tights

Children's Fishnet and Convertible Opaque Tights


Color: Tapioca Cream Crystallized Fishnets

Color: Licorice "Dazzling"

"Wish" Gold/Silver back seamed Tights

"Celestial" Crystallized Tights

There is also XXL Fishnets 5'8" - 6'3" 160 - 290 lb


Recent Press

http://www.wendyshow.com/?s=nude+barre&submit=Search

http://shop.ouchmagazine.com/fashion-trend-review-nude-barre/

http://bit.ly/1iCx1vK

http://pynkmag.com/%3Fp%3D10394

http://www.thefatandskinnyonfashion.com/nude-barre-pantyhose-are-for-all-shades-of-nude/

http://www.examiner.com/article/nude-barre-offers-16-shades-of-nude-tights-for-all-women

http://Intimateguide.com/hosiery/nude-hosiery/

http://www.tightsfashion.co.uk/html/nude_barre_crystalized_fishnet.html


Even if you cannot contribute, you can always help by sharing with friends. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word!

story:
CLIQUEZ ICI POUR LA VERSION FRANÇAISE

REVELE - As seen on : 

 

>>> FOLLOW US <<<

Facebook // Instagram // Twitter

 

>>> DEMANDES SPECIALES POUR LES EQUIPES <<<

Si vous avez des demandes particulières de package pour votre équipe (15 personnes minimum) : contactez nous par email : hello@reveleactivewear.com

 

>> Frequently Asked Questions <<

How can I choose my sizes and colors ?
At the end of the campaign (end of March) , we will send you a backer survey. This will also come with a detailed sizing chart !


Is the REVELIA IRB certified ?
We are completing the certification process! Be sure that we have designed and developed the REVELIA following all rules and personal recommendations from the IRB.


If Révèle does not reach its goal, what happens to my order ?
If we do not make our goal, the campaign will not be validated. You will be reimbursed and will not receive your product or orders.


When will the Breast Health medical study be officially published ?
Research studies of this caliber take time in order to complete and to be validated! It will be published by the end of 2017. We will definitely let you know when it is out !

What is the refund policy?
Due to the nature of Indiegogo as a crowdfunding platform, we cannot offer refunds to backers once the campaign  ends. Once the campaign ends, your "perks" are immediately turned into a hard production order. We don't want to let anybody down on our anticipated delivery dates, therefore we cannot offer refunds once the campaign has ended at the end of March.

Can I pay extra to get an earlier delivery?
This is unfortunately not possible. It is not so much a matter of extra costs, but a matter of making sure that we produce the collection in the best way, to ensure superior quality of each order.

Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my perk?
We will do our upmost to prevent this from happening! However,  any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer, and not our team. We have absolutely no control over the additional duties/VAT that may or may not be charged within your country. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your perk, please get in touch with your local post office.

What if something is wrong with my order upon receiving it?
In the very exceptional case of this happening, we will of course offer you the best service to find a suitable solution for you. We are available through mail: hello@reveleactivewear.com  !

 

VERSION FRANÇAISE

REVELE - Vue dans :

 

>>> SUIS NOUS <<<

Facebook // Instagram // Twitter

 

>>> DEMANDES SPECIALES POUR LES EQUIPES <<<

Si vous avez des demandes particulières de package pour votre équipe (15 personnes minimum) : contactez nous par email : hello@reveleactivewear.com

 

>> FAQ <<

Comment puis-je choisis mes tailles et coloris ?

Une fois la campagne terminée, nous vous enverrons un formulaire de choix accompagné d’un tableau des mesures et des tailles. Vous pourrez choisi en toute tranquillité.

 

La protection du buste est-elle certifiée par l’IRB ?

L’armure est en cours de certification. Cependant aucune inquiétude à avoir ! Nous l’avons conçu en respectant scrupuleusement le cahier des charges de l’IRB.

 

Si Révèle n’atteint pas son objectif de campagne, que se passe-t-il pour ma commande ?

Si le projet n’atteint pas l’objectif demandé, la campagne n’est pas validée. Vous serez remboursés de la totalité de votre contribution et ne recevrez pas vos produits.

 

Quand sera publiée l’étude médicale sur l’impact des chocs sur la poitrine ?

La publication est prévue pour fin 2017, nous vous tiendrons au courant dès qu’elle est consultable.

 

Puis-je payer plus cher pour être livré plus tôt ?

Ce n’est malheureusement pas possible, nous lancerons la production à la suite de la campagne et nous souhaitons assurer la meilleure qualité possible pour l’ensemble de nos produits.

 

Comment me faire rembourser après la campagne ?

Indiegogo est une plateforme de crowdfunding donc nous ne pouvons pas proposer des remboursements après la fin du projet. Une fois la campagne terminée, vos contreparties se transforment immédiatement en commandes pour nos fournisseurs.

 

Si les produits que je reçois ne sont pas conformes, que puis-je faire ?

Si cela arrive exceptionnellement, nous trouverons toujours une solution pour vous satisfaire.  Vous pouvez nous écrire à hello@reveleactivewear.com pour faire une réclamation.

Vous serez remboursés de la totalité de votre contribution et ne recevrez pas vos produits. Quand sera publiée l’étude médicale sur l’impact des chocs sur la poitrine ? La publication est prévue pour fin 2017, nous vous tiendrons au courant dès qu’elle est consultable. Puis-je payer plus cher pour être livré plus tôt ?Ce n’est malheureusement pas possible, nous lancerons la production à la suite de la campagne et nous souhaitons assurer la meilleure qualité possible pour l’ensemble de nos produits. Comment me faire rembourser après la campagne ?Indiegogo est une plateforme de crowdfunding donc nous ne pouvons pas proposer des remboursements après la fin du projet. Une fois la campagne terminée, vos contreparties se transforment immédiatement en commandes pour nos fournisseurs. Si les produits que je reçois ne sont pas conformes, que puis-je faire ?Si cela arrive exceptionnellement, nous trouverons toujours une solution pour vous satisfaire.  Vous pouvez nous écrire à hello@reveleactivewear.com pour faire une réclamation.

story:
Welcome to the RESTRICTED Underground!

 

Restricted Clothing is a fashion brand featuring designs of the german artist Dirty-Six, and was started in 2010, selling exlusive fashion over spreadshirt.

Now is the time to take it a step further and produce collections on a professional base for fashion shops.

 

Why RESTRICTED is different?

Our approach with this brand is to provide you with cool and artistic everyday clothing which stands out from the masses.

Our influences in the designs come from graffiti and streetart as well as from classy and elegant fashion design.

 

 

RESTRICTED - The perfect outfit for the party or for starting a riot!

 

We need YOU for starting the revolution!

 
Our Background:
 
  • Producing exclusive fashion prints since 2010
  • making underground art & design for more than 10 years
  • professionals in digital and printdesign

Why we need your pledge?

 
  • producing collections in high quality and higher unit numbers to keep it affordable for everone
  • producing promotion material for fashion shops
  • creating a website and online shop for international selling
 

What you get?

We always want to have a close connection to our fans, as a backer you get exclusive limited materials and if you stay with us as part of the RESTRICTED Undergound you will be a valued member of our movement.

 

Revolutions can't be started alone!

Of course pleding gives us a lot support so we can produce products for you, but there are a lot of ways to spread the word, it will also be a big support for us when you share the idea through social media and blogs.

story:
UPDATE: Get yours today at  bangasunglasses.com

 

UPDATE: Bangas are in and prepped for delivery! Thanks for your patience! 

 

UPDATE:Our campaign is over, but our mission to still going strong! Thanks to everyone who contributed to the cause! 

 

 

Banga Sunglasses is on a mission to impact the world. We want to pair consumers’ love of sunglasses with their desire to help others.

                                                       

For our launch, we've identified four social issues and partnered with charities that are dedicated to make a difference in those areas. For each purchase made, one charity will be able to further its efforts to change lives.

Here’s the thing, we realize that you want to rock your favorite color shades while supporting your cause. So rather than associating the frame colors to each cause, we decided to change our logo color for each one instead! Our logo is merely a representation of the social impact that we all can have on the world, and we want it to reflect that. 

This design allows you to express your style, while making your wave of impact. The logo variety also allows for multiple color combinations if you decide to support more than one cause.

                               

Banga is the Lithuanian word for  “wave”. For us, it embodies the idea that even a small gesture of kindness can make a difference in someone’s life. We want to empower our consumers to make waves, so we’ve partnered with four charities and researched the projects that best align with the causes we have chosen to tackle first.

For each cause, we’ve measured the wave of impact, so you can see how you are making a difference!

                       

                     

                     

                      

   

Malnutrition contributes to 2.6 million deaths of children under five each year - one third of the global total.  Convoy of Hope has feeding initiatives all over the world and are dedicated to helping this cause. It also provides clean and safe water, teaches community leaders agricultural techniques and helps provide healthy living environments and education. For every two Banga’s purchased, Convoy of Hope can feed a child for 1 month.

 

Limited access to clean drinking water, insufficient sanitation and poor hygiene kill more people than wars, famine, and AIDS combined. Generosity Water is committed to providing villages with access to clean drinking water. Two Banga’s purchased, provides 1 person with access to clean water for 20 years.

 

For many children around the world, education is limited by poverty. Lack of finances for school fees, transportation and supplies keeps countless students from graduating, while others drop out early to help support their families. As a result, many earn low wages throughout their lives. Children International established the HOPE (Helping Overcome Poverty through Education) Fund to help fight this tragic cycle. Each year, over 2,000 youth earn HOPE scholarships to complete secondary school or continue their education in vocational schools and universities. For every 20 pair of Bangas purchased, we will fund one HOPE scholarship.

 

Four million pets are euthanized each year in animal shelters instead of adoption. Best Friends is home to the nation's largest no kill animal sanctuary, where they rescue the abandoned domestic animals care for them for rest of their life whie trying to find them a home. For every Banga purchased, eight abandoned animals are fed and cared for.

 

Each pair of Bangas is made with high quality materials for long lasting durability. Our launch includes two different collections, the Classics and the Aces. The Classics line features a spring temple that allows the sunglasses to conform to the width of your head for added comfort. The Classics come in six colors with a rubberized coating for a sleek look and non-slip feel.The Aces line features front frames made from chrome, ensuring that your favorite pair of Bangas will last for many years. The Aces come in 3 colors, Black , Red, and Navy.  Both styles are fitted with high quality polycarbonate lenses. 

                

 

 

 

 Black                                                                   White 

 

Lime                                                                       Navy 

  

Teal                                                                         Wine                           

 

 

Banga Sunglasses began as a desire to combine a compassion for those going through hardship with the ability to implement change. We knew that we wanted to provide an avenue for people with the same passion as we have to affect the world around them. We also happen to LOVE sunglasses and noticed that they are many consumer’s favorite accessory. For some, sunglasses finish off the perfect look, and for others they provide a chill retreat from the elements around them.

Our goal is to use Banga Sunglasses to manifest a vision for a better world and help those who may otherwise feel hopeless.  After months of working with manufacturers and charities, we are finally ready to invite you to join us on this journey.  We need additional funds to have more Bangas produced, and to invite others to join the movement. It takes the collective power of many to create the sweeping wave of impact that we hope to achieve, and with your help, through telling your friends via word of mouth, social media, and every other means possible, we can make this journey an epic one.

                     

 Ride the Wave of Impact!

There are a few ways you can help:

1. Buy a Banga!  

Each Banga purchased makes a difference in someone’s life!

2. Tell everyone your know!  

Share the link to this site on all your social media platforms and help others join the movement!

3. Follow our progress!

Each week, we will post updates and stories on our Facebook and Instagram about the lives being affected by your decision to get involved. Stay tuned for new opportunities to make an impact and change the world!

Click to like us!

  

 

Follow us!

 

Any Questions?

When will I receive my Bangas?

Estimated shipping date for all campaign orders is July 2013. The goal of our campaign is to raise funds to get more Bangas produced and out to you!

So, I can order any style/color Bangas regardless of the cause?

That’s right! It’s our logo color that represents each cause, not the frame colors. You can mix and match any style or color to show your personality! For example, you can get red Aces with a yellow logo for hunger, or white Classics with a blue logo for water.

How do I select my style/color of Bangas after I back the campaign?

Upon receiving your order, we will send out a survey allowing you to select which style/color of Bangas you want and which cause you would like to support. We will also confirm your shipping address.

How do I pay US shipping costs?

Please add $5 shipping cost to your total upon checkout. Some perks cover US shipping, so make sure to read closely!

How do I pay international shipping costs?

We are excited to spread the Banga movement worldwide! For international shipping, please add $15 to your order upon checkout, so we can make sure your receive your Bangas! If you checkout, and forget to add it in, no worries, we’ll email you a link to pay the shipping separately later on. Feel free to email us if you have additional questions.

How can I help?

The biggest way that you can help the spread the wave of impact is by telling your friends and family about Banga Sunglasses and encouraging them to back us at any level. We’d really appreciate it!

More questions? Email us at info@bangasunglasses.com and we will be sure to answer!

story:
MUKISHOES are sophisticated barefoot shoes , which are comfortable and healthy. They simulate the feeling of walking barefoot without natural movement restrains or pressure.

 

 

 

The shoes are designed and assembled entirely in Portugal under fair conditions and with natural and recycled materials sourced from Europe.

 

 

Two years ago we had the idea of making a barefoot shoe entirely with natural materials, since then we are working on it. We designed and changed, we chose materials and questioned every step, we tested the shoes and improved - now finally we are at the point where we can present you our shoes and we need YOU to help us in the last phase in supporting our campaign to help finance the missing moulds and our first production. 

 

 

Support us to make this project happen and get sustainable barefoot shoes. Use the chance now, as they will be only available here on Indiegogo for a special price.
As environmental aspects are important to us, you will not only get MUKISHOES, we decided to donate with each pair sold a tree to the association "Reflorestar Portugal".

 

 

                                                                     

 

 

 

 

IMPACT ON HEALTH

Walking barefoot is healthy and natural, but not always possible. A good barefoot shoe simulates the feeling of walking barefoot as well as protects your feet from injuries.

 

 

 

 

 

CONSCIOUS STEPS 

Our style is for urban and nature people, who enjoy an active lifestyle, love to travel, explore the world, but do it with conscious steps. MUKISHOES are unisex, casual and versatile.

 

 

OUR SHOES

We have eight different options for you. The high-cut option includes the models raw leather brown, raw leather black, stone, moss and obsidian. The low-cut option includes the models sand, cloud and obsidian low.

MUKISHOES will be available from size 36 to 47. 

 

 

 

MATERIALS & PRODUCTION

MUKISHOES use natural materials, such as hemp, cotton, linen, burel (felted wool) vegetable tanned leather (chrome-free) and cork. The fabrics are dyed with GOTS certified pigments and a technic, which reduces the amount of water spent during the process. 

 

 

Together with the natural and recycled rubber soles, the MUKISHOES are entirely produced and assembled in Portugal, a country with generations of knowledge of shoemaking. In the traditional family business, where the MUKISHOES are produced, high quality and fair working conditions are standard. All materials are supplied from Portugal or Europe. 

 

 

 

SPECIALLY FOR THE CAMPAIGN

Here you have the unique chance to buy the first MUKISHOES collection.

Pre-order now selected colours specially for the campaign on Indiegogo!  

 

 

 

CHOOSE SIZE & COLOUR 

 

For right now you just need to choose the model you want, after the campaign we
send you an email with a size chart (with cm measures) and we will collect your colour choice and size for making your MUKISHOES.

Buying shoes online isn't always easy. With the measurement list we try to make it as easy for you to choose your pair, but in case they don't fit you, you can write us a message and we will find a personal solution for exchange or return.

 

OUR TIMELINE 

 

 

ABOUT US 

 

 

We are Marta and Madlen, the designers, founders, faces & forces behind MUKISHOES. We are happy we managed to come to this point to present and finally share our product and vision with you! And we are happy for every support we get from you all! We are thankful for all the believers and supporters of this project that helped us on our path.

We want to give our best to deliver a top quality product, so please don't forget we aren't supporting the fast disposable fashion. We believe in quality and fair working conditions, our production place is a small family business. Still we will do what we can so that as soon as possible you have your pair of MUKISHOES on your feet! Until then and also after we will be here to answer your questions and help with whatever comes.

story:
Every dress tells a story

At Symbology, we envision fashion as a platform to empower women, preserve traditional artforms and promote sustainable development. We fuse handmade artisan textiles with trend-forward design to create apparel with an authentic global connection--one that creates a sense of shared humanity between our customers and artisan producers.

I'm Marissa, the founder of Symbology, and I have been dreaming of launching a fashionable yet ethical line since my first trip to India in 2006 visiting craftswomen. While a fashionista on the outside, I'm a hippie at heart. I believe it is my true calling in life, and I can't wait to see what the future holds!

I have fused my background in Anthropology and Journalism from UNC with a deep passion for designing apparel with meaning.

We want you to take part in our first production trip to India!

We are very excited to be launching our first-ever collection, Peacocks & Paisleys, for Fall/Winter 2012. We are asking for at least $7500 via our Indiegogo campaign to help cover our production trip to India, in which Marissa will visit our artisan groups first-hand to be able to bring our collection to the market for the Fall shopping season. She needs to get there before the monsoon season hits in July, when the artisans aren't able to block print due to the moistness in the air. Plus being drenched is just not a good look for her.

With your support, she will be able to visit groups in Jaipur, Varanasi and the Himalayas and provide real-time coverage of the collection's development...and your very own Indiegogo rewards! Take a gander at our collection: http://issuu.com/mheyl/docs/symbology_lookbook

We also hope to bring our new designer Tiffany with us to visit the groups and take part in the development of our next collection. Tiffany has dedicated years to serving Virsa Punjab Da, a South Asian nonprofit that provides aid for orphans, widows, and the elderly. She is very excited about the prospect of visiting with artisans and learning more about traditional crafts from her parents' native India. 

We also plan to allocate funds this summer to build an e-commerce website, which will cut down on overhead costs and allow us to not only reinvest in our artisan partnerships, but form more personalized relationships with our new customers.

With each Symbology contribution, you are investing in a style-forward, one-of-a-kind label that empowers women across the globe. And we thank you kindly for it! Please check out our awesome rewards--all handmade, one-of-a-kind pieces connected with centuries of artistic tradition.

Even if we don't reach our goal, we will use all of the funds towards this production trip. 

Our philosophy

True art is evidence of happiness, contentment & purity of its authors.

-Mahatma Gandhi

Our goal at Symbology is to alleviate the effects of poverty and improve the livelihoods of artisan producers and their families in developing countries. Artisan enterprises have great potential for spurring economic growth and often provide a vital income source for families in the poorest segments of society. 

The textile traditions we source in our collections are embedded in Indian culture. Yet as demand drops and industrialization drives younger generations to pursue jobs in the cities, many century-old traditions are struggling to survive.

There are 1.3 billion people living on less than $1 a day, 70% of whom are women. When given the opportunity to earn an income, women overwhelmingly invest in their children’s education and health, as well as the overall community.  We view women's empowerment as a way to reverse the cycle of poverty and promote sustainable development.

Over the next 5 years, Symbology will have a team of 10-15 full-time employees based in North Carolina. Our production will take place both locally and globally, fueled by purchasing fabrics with artisan groups in India, Africa, and Latin America. We aim to employ a local garment co-op to construct our pieces as a way to bring our story of sustainability full circle.

Please check out more on our facebook page at www.facebook.com/symbologyclothing
 

Help us spread the word! 

Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, chatty grandma...it all works for us :)

We want you to take part in our first production trip to India!
We are very excited to be launching our first-ever collection, Peacocks & Paisleys, for Fall/Winter 2012. We are asking for at least $7500 via our Indiegogo campaign to help cover our production trip to India, in which Marissa will visit our artisan groups first-hand to be able to bring our collection to the market for the Fall shopping season. She needs to get there before the monsoon season hits in July, when the artisans aren't able to block print due to the moistness in the air. Plus being drenched is just not a good look for her.
With your support, she will be able to visit groups in Jaipur, Varanasi and the Himalayas and provide real-time coverage of the collection's development...and your very own Indiegogo rewards! Take a gander at our collection: http://issuu.com/mheyl/docs/symbology_lookbook


We also hope to bring our new designer Tiffany with us to visit the groups and take part in the development of our next collection. Tiffany has dedicated years to serving Virsa Punjab Da, a South Asian nonprofit that provides aid for orphans, widows, and the elderly. She is very excited about the prospect of visiting with artisans and learning more about traditional crafts from her parents' native India. 
We also plan to allocate funds this summer to build an e-commerce website, which will cut down on overhead costs and allow us to not only reinvest in our artisan partnerships, but form more personalized relationships with our new customers.
With each Symbology contribution, you are investing in a style-forward, one-of-a-kind label that empowers women across the globe. And we thank you kindly for it! Please check out our awesome rewards--all handmade, one-of-a-kind pieces connected with centuries of artistic tradition.
Even if we don't reach our goal, we will use all of the funds towards this production trip. 
Our philosophy
True art is evidence of happiness, contentment & purity of its authors.
-Mahatma Gandhi
Our goal at Symbology is to alleviate the effects of poverty and improve the livelihoods of artisan producers and their families in developing countries. Artisan enterprises have great potential for spurring economic growth and often provide a vital income source for families in the poorest segments of society. 
The textile traditions we source in our collections are embedded in Indian culture. Yet as demand drops and industrialization drives younger generations to pursue jobs in the cities, many century-old traditions are struggling to survive.
There are 1.3 billion people living on less than $1 a day, 70% of whom are women. When given the opportunity to earn an income, women overwhelmingly invest in their children’s education and health, as well as the overall community.  We view women's empowerment as a way to reverse the cycle of poverty and promote sustainable development.
Over the next 5 years, Symbology will have a team of 10-15 full-time employees based in North Carolina. Our production will take place both locally and globally, fueled by purchasing fabrics with artisan groups in India, Africa, and Latin America. We aim to employ a local garment co-op to construct our pieces as a way to bring our story of sustainability full circle.

Please check out more on our facebook page at www.facebook.com/symbologyclothing

 


Help us spread the word! 
Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, chatty grandma...it all works for us :)

story:
Brief History

Back in the early 2011, we, an online community of photographers on social network Google+ thought it might be a fun idea to get together and publish a photography book containing some of our favorite photographs taken in the year just ended. As the idea of Plus One Collection book was born, it evolved into a project for a good cause, with all net proceeds from the sale of the book donated to charity. 

As a result, we published two beautiful photography books in print and ebook formats containing photographs from hundreds of photographer from 50+ countries around the world. Both volumes of the book shipped to 60+ countries. More importantly, we raised over $20,000 and donated that money to charitable organizations. The first volume of the book supported Kiva. The second volume of the book supported The Kilgoris Project.  

Plus One Collection Volume III

It felt great to publish this book before and we're doing the next volume this year. The rules were the same - anyone can contribute an image. We will then publish a print book and an ebook which will contain all contributions.

To learn more about the book, and how you can contribute your photography, please visit our website. 

Book Content

The book will contain 200-300 photographs. The theme for this year’s volume is “Our World” and the book will be split into three sections - “Our Planet”, “Our People” and “Our Creations.” 

Contributing Artists

The names of the photographers who's work will be included in Volume III of the Plus One Collection will be announced in early September on our website and through our mailing list. 

Charitable Cause We're Supporting

This year we are raising funds for a specific individual, Eliza O'Neill. Eliza is a happy 4-year-old who, because of a degenerative genetic disease called Sanfilippo syndrome, may not live into her teens. If she doesn’t get the treatment she needs, she will lose the ability to speak within 6 months and suffer irreversible brain damage within a year and a half.

The idea to have photographers help raise funds for Eliza came from Benjamin Von Wong, who created this wonderful video about Eliza, her family and what they are facing. Through their efforts with the print sale they already raised over $30,000. 


We can do more than that and hope to raise at least $15,000 more throught the sale of the book. 

However, before we sell the book, we need to raise funds for its publication. 

What We Need 

We're doing the fundraising campaign because for this year's book we've teamed up with Oddi Printing, a professional publisher who will print the copies of the book. Here are the details - 

  • We will print 500 copies of the book
  • Each copy of the book will be hardcover 11x11.8" in size
  • Paper used is 150 gr UPM Finesse Silk 

We need $25,000 to pay the fees for fundraising, print the book, and ship it to early contributors. Any extra funds raised will go to our charitable cause. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • We would love for you to get the word out and make some noise about our project
  • You can easily share the news about our project using social tools provided right here on Indiegogo.

What Others Said About Plus One Collection

In the past there was a lot of excitement about what we were doing. Here are some of our favorite quotes. 

"A huge group of very talented people decided to use their talents to help others, all with a big doze of a Silicon Valley technology" - NBC Bay Area

"While the collection includes work from some of the who’s who in professional photography, it has a definite democratic feel." - Forbes

"Within two months, working entirely through the online community - a book designer in London, a Web designer in Switzerland, an engineer in Germany, and a law office in Washington, D.C., all donated services - Makarov has self-published a visually stunning coffee-table book called "Plus One Collection," with 200 full-page photos." - San Francisco Chronicle

"I’ve loved seeing this project come together as photographers from all over the world have contributed (literally only 65% of the photographers are from the US/Canada, the rest are from all over the world including Europe, Asia and as far away as Oceania!). The book shares a love for photography and fine art along with a way that we have been able to give back to the world that we all find beauty in and photograph every day" - Thomas Hawk

Contact

Any questions about the project? Feel free to send Ivan an email (ivan[at]ivanmakarov.com) or ping him on Google+.

story:
Short Summary

I started Sins 'n Needles a few years back as an artistic outlet for myself. Since then I've done numerous craft shows and would really like to get back in to designing and creating apparel. Not only that, but I would like to be able to purchase goods from local artists to resale in addition to my current offerings.

What We Need & What You Get

I have already purchased a screen printing press, now I just need to buy everything else that goes along with that (screens, drying racks, wash out tank, inks, blanks, etc.). I would also like to buy a small embroidery machine!

Everyone that donates will receive a super awesome gift of your choice. I have already place a few wholesale orders and will be adding tons of stuff to the store over the coming weeks!

The Impact

I've already invested quite a bit of my own money in to this project and anyone that knows me, knows I don't mess around. I'm ready to push this as far as I can but need a little help from you guys!

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends! Word of mouth is the best way to get any project going.
