story:
Let’s Talk About Belts

Take a look at the belt section of any clothing or fashion store, and you will instantly notice that they all have the same mundane look, almost like the industry is completely bereft of any unique ideas. If you didn’t know better, you would hastily conclude that fashion brands came together and agreed on a single design, refusing to innovate or try anything new. This is indeed very sad because like any other accessory, belts are amazing ways to express your personality and sense of fashion. You put on a pair of shoes, you pick out some new glasses, and then what – you grab a belt out of the many similar and mono-styled designed ones from the clearance shelf? As if the lack of creativity wasn’t devastating enough, most belts are grossly over-designed, unnecessarily ornate to the point that they fail at their basic function and essentially become a burden to carry around the waist.

 

 

 

MIN BELT…is a break from the uninspiring norm.

We were tired of the conventional and needlessly sophisticated style of belts that have long overstayed their welcome. Therefore, we decided to engineer a truly simple but yet stylish and never before seen kind of belt. A belt you can comfortably wear for years, a belt you can wear with any outfit, and a belt that will finally complement your personality.

 

 

Troubled by the direction the belt fashion was headed, we decided to stop the distressing trend by designing a new and ingenious kind of belt called “ACTION BELT” for an active lifestyle and a wide range of activities. The idea was to build something new, durable, and versatile; a belt that will stand the test of time and come to mean more than just a belt, but also your everyday companion. Whether you are rocking a professional look, a casual appearance, or dawning a sporty look, MIN BELT will do wonders to your overall outfit. When you wear MIN BELT, you instantly feel the connection; you should feel like the belt is part of you and the belt should complement you and what you stand for.

 

Belts can make or break your dressing. Worn for both style and function, this small accessory can have a tremendous impact on the impression you make.

We created the MIN BELT to make you stand out from the crowd. The minimalistic design that sets you apart from everybody else with a blend of both a classic and contemporary look all meshed together to give you that dapper look and allow you to freely express your personality.

 

 

 

MIN BELT is a simple, adjustable buckle design that completely removes all the unnecessary and complicated features that you have come to associate with everyday belts. MIN BELT does away with belt holes, flap and unnecessarily ornate belt designs by providing a refreshing, unique and personalized experience that conventional belts can neither match nor offer.

 

 

Most people have between three to six belts for various occasions (casual, formal, sporty) and in numerous colors, occupying limited space in your wardrobe. But, imagine if you had just one belt for every occasion, one belt that looked good with every dress, one belt that was perfect for any activity? With MIN BELT, Less is really MORE.

 

 

Unlike other belt designs, MIN BELT allows you to design and wear it how you want to fully express your personality and style based on several wearable styles and choices. We believe in freedom of style and versatility in use, so there is no right or wrong way to wear the MIN BELT. Add variety to your daily style with 4 strap colors from two reversible color straps and 4 buckle colors; giving you plenty of color combinations that you can mix and match with your outfit to match your style.

 

The belt is the dirtiest wearable item on our body. It is an abundant house of germs and fungi since most belts can not be washed. No surprise that most belts smell bad. MIN BELT is waterproof and not absorb moisture. It is also a washable belt. That's why MIN BELT is the most hygienic belt you can live with. 

The PVD MIN BUCKLE is free of any form of Nickle allergy, while the MIN STRAP is made from a premium fine-grade material. Besides, the manufacturing process is strict and carefully monitored to ensures that there are no dangers of skin allergies while providing an easy-to-clean surface and washable feature.

 



 

 

Our first crowdfunding campaign generated more than $52,000. It is more than 10 times of our target. There and then, we knew that we were on to something amazing. The support and faith we received were tremendous from plenty of positive feedback from users. We were finally going to make a belt that would appeal to many, a belt that would break the mundane cycle of poorly designed belts.

MIN BELT was a novel product. Despite selling thousands of the original version, we knew we could do better … and so we did!

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

We have drawn inspiration from both your valuable feedback and our hunger to innovate and design an all-new and improved MIN BELT. While fans of the original MIN BELT will instantly recognize the minimalist design, this is an entirely new product.

 

 

 

The NEW MIN BUCKLE has an ergonomic curve, making the belt even more comfortable to wear.

MIN BUCKLE has the most efficient mechanism without moving parts. It is created out of a single piece of stainless steel and transformed through Laser cutting, forming, sandblasting, and a jewelry-grade PVD (Physical Vapor Disposition) finish. MIN BUCKLE will last forever with a lifetime warranty.

 

 

Also, the NEW MIN STRAP has The Seamless 2 in 1 Color Reversible Strap Technology, allowing you to juggle between colors based on your outfit or preference.

MIN STRAP is a 35mm wide premium-grade polymer-based webbing reinforced structure that is designed for all environments. The strap has a great look and touching feel with a similar texture to leather but a lot more durable.

 

 

 

At this point, you may be wondering, oh, what makes a ‘perfect belt’? What’s wrong with the current belt I own? And how can this new belt be any different? Well, since you asked, we will be glad to explain. Allow us to intimate you on some of the main reasons why the NEW MIN BELT is nothing like your regular belt.

 

 

 

 

The MIN BELT features a new buckle mechanism that allows for a seamless buckling and unbuckling experience. Want to quickly remove your belt to pass security? Simply remove the buckle in less than a second and breeze through. This patent-pending buckle design was engineered with versatility and functionality in mind.

 

 

The curve buckle design blends well on your waist feels like wearing nothing.

 

 

Want to rock a brown belt instead of a black one? All you have to do is swap the sides of your MIN BELT.

 

Want to change your look, just swap your silver buckle with the black one.

 

 

Those belt holes may feel strong on the first day, but never after the first week of wearing a new belt. The flap? Needless and ugly. The loop? Just an excuse to make you pay more. MIN BELT wants you to do away with holes, loops and flaps that ruin your appearance.

 

Did you put on or shed some weight recently? Well, that shouldn’t be one of your reasons for changing a belt. The MIN BELT can be fitted and adjusted as precise as you want without hole limitation, adapting perfectly whenever you gain or lose weight.

 

 

Unlike most traditional belts, the durability of the high-grade material of a well-constructed strap ensures that kinks do not appear over-time, like with the MIN STRAP. This means that your MIN BELT will outlive most of your trousers and remain as good as new.

 

Every MIN BELT is handmade and crafted with precision. We pay close attention to detail by using only premium grade stainless steel and refined polymer-based webbing reinforced strap material with the help of some of the finest craftsmen. The result? A durable, top quality and premium product that is definitely one of the best currently in the market. MIN BELT ... Premiums ... you can feel.

 

 

The unique buckling and unbuckling system allow you to take off just the buckle instead of the entire belt when you have to go through a security scan. With the MIN BELT, you never have to deal with the hassle of completely removing and wearing back your belt. In extreme situations, this can be the difference between catching and missing a flight.

 

 

 

If you are a traveler or frequent flyer, especially on business trips, then you must appreciate the convenience of traveling light. The MIN Buckles are easy to pack, and you can fit multiple buckles into a tiny cabin suitcase, giving you unlimited styles to choose from.

 

 

Caught in the rain? Or want to toss it into the laundry machine? Feel free, because the MIN BELT is made from water-resistant, rust and corrosion-resistant materials that hold well against any wet situation.

 

Grab your belt then smell it. You will know what a belt not supposed to be. The belt is the bacteria and germ crowded house cause of the unpleasant smell, but not with MIN BELT. All dirt, germ, bacteria, fungi can be wash out like your cloth without ruining the belt.

 

 

No Animal was harmed, whether directly or indirectly in the production of MIN BELT. Our durable stainless-steel buckle is made from pure materials and high-end PVD process without the use of any harmful chemicals. Also, our durable strap is synthetic and completely replaces leather which create pollution. MIN BELT production is short and consumes low energy. This ultimately makes this belt an eco-friendly and cruelty-free wardrobe accessory.

 

 

 

The MIN BELT was built with ample longevity in mind. This belt will not wear or tear even you use it regularly. In fact, make it your everyday belt and watch it retain the same shine and appeal it had when you first bought it.

 

The "M-I-N" typographic design buckle, symbolizing the minimalistic design that sets you apart from everybody else.

 

 

If your belt is dirty, just wash it. MIN BELT is the cleanest belt ever.

 

 

Thanks to the Seamless 2-1 Color Reversible Strap Technology, The stitch-free one-piece strap becomes handy without a worry in any situation.

 

 

The only belt that the user is allowed to wear in their own way. There are limitless styles and methods to wear your MIN BELT. Innovate your style by matching buckle and strap colors or even wearing it in reverse, short tongue, upside-down, double, and more. Your imagination is the only limitation.

 

Wearing MIN BELT is easy and quick.

 

 

No other belt is well-organized in a unique way like MIN BELT.

 

 

 

 

 

* Available in four buckle colors 

(Silver, Black, Pink Gold, and Blue)

 

* Available in two strap choices 

(USUAL: Black and Brown, CASUAL: Blue and Grey)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

UNLOCKED $100,000 STRETCH GOAL - THE MIN SNAP

The MIN SNAP is a fun idea of transforming the MIN BUCKLE into something new playing with the negative space on the buckle. We design the MIN SNAP to turn the Minimal belt into the Magnificent belt. The simple MIN BELT can be turned into luxurious in just one SNAP. It is a great feeling and a complete MIN BELT experience with the SNAP action!

With the MIN BELT, you never have to deal with the hassle of completely removing and wearing back your belt. In extreme situations, this can be the difference between catching and missing a flight.Quick and easy to use   If you are a traveler or frequent flyer, especially on business trips, then you must appreciate the convenience of traveling light. The MIN Buckles are easy to pack, and you can fit multiple buckles into a tiny cabin suitcase, giving you unlimited styles to choose from.   Caught in the rain? Or want to toss it into the laundry machine? Feel free, because the MIN BELT is made from water-resistant, rust and corrosion-resistant materials that hold well against any wet situation.Water-Friendly, Able to Clean
  Grab your belt then smell it. You will know what a belt not supposed to be. The belt is the bacteria and germ crowded house cause of the unpleasant smell, but not with MIN BELT. All dirt, germ, bacteria, fungi can be wash out like your cloth without ruining the belt.   No Animal was harmed, whether directly or indirectly in the production of MIN BELT. Our durable stainless-steel buckle is made from pure materials and high-end PVD process without the use of any harmful chemicals. Also, our durable strap is synthetic and completely replaces leather which create pollution. MIN BELT production is short and consumes low energy. This ultimately makes this belt an eco-friendly and cruelty-free wardrobe accessory.
 
MIN BELT is eco-friendly.   The MIN BELT was built with ample longevity in mind. This belt will not wear or tear even you use it regularly. In fact, make it your everyday belt and watch it retain the same shine and appeal it had when you first bought it. 

  The "M-I-N" typographic design buckle, symbolizing the minimalistic design that sets you apart from everybody else.   If your belt is dirty, just wash it. MIN BELT is the cleanest belt ever.   Thanks to the Seamless 2-1 Color Reversible Strap Technology, The stitch-free one-piece strap becomes handy without a worry in any situation.
   The only belt that the user is allowed to wear in their own way. There are limitless styles and methods to wear your MIN BELT. Innovate your style by matching buckle and strap colors or even wearing it in reverse, short tongue, upside-down, double, and more. Your imagination is the only limitation. 
  Wearing MIN BELT is easy and quick.   No other belt is well-organized in a unique way like MIN BELT.     
 * Available in four buckle colors (Silver, Black, Pink Gold, and Blue) 
Four Buckle Colors
 * Available in two strap choices (USUAL: Black and Brown, CASUAL: Blue and Grey)   Four BUCKLE Colors, Two Strap Choices - Plenty of Combination
 

Mix and Match Outfits with MIN BELT Colors 
    UNLOCKED $100,000 STRETCH GOAL - THE MIN SNAPThe MIN SNAP is a fun idea of transforming the MIN BUCKLE into something new playing with the negative space on the buckle. We design the MIN SNAP to turn the Minimal belt into the Magnificent belt. The simple MIN BELT can be turned into luxurious in just one SNAP. It is a great feeling and a complete MIN BELT experience with the SNAP action! 
 


 

 
 
 
UNLOCKED $60,000 STRETCH GOAL
 

 

The campaign has reached $60,000 goal, we will have The Mesh Pattern Kickstarter Limited Edition MIN BUCKLE as an add-on. Every backer with at least one belt pledge can order this add-on for a Special Price of $33 after the campaign end.
The idea behind this Mesh Pattern is the power of us, the gathering of the individual. Each Y-alike symbol represents each of "You" who is a part of this new creation. The engraved pattern on the black buckle will enhance the luxurious look with the hidden meaning. Every buckle will have the K-Kickstarter symbol with the running serial number underneath engraved on the back of the buckle. The number of produced buckles will be limited for only this special occasion with no commercialized later on. The serial number can not be chosen. We hope this collectible item will always remind you of the origin of the NEW MIN BELT that you are proud of. 
We can reach the stretch goal faster if you tag and invite friends who might like NEW MIN BELT and bring them on board. We still have some stretch goals ready to line up.
 

 

 
 

 

 

 
 

Our original Kickstarter backers have constantly been using the MIN BELT for two years now and it has remained as efficient, new and stylish as it was on the first day we got it.
 

 

 

MINism's Essence 
The most stunning innovations that make you say "Wow!" are the ones that solve the problems that we face in our day to day lives – from a vantage point that is entirely out of the ordinary. The best innovations, of course, are simple. This is the belief that has inspired and guided our sense of design and style at MINism. Our Principles
Simplicity is both surprising and awe-inspiring because it comes out of nowhere. This description epitomizes MIN BELT. We have created a belt for you that is both new, classic, refreshing and better than what is obtainable. MIN BELT is the definition of creativity and ingenuity. It is a break from the norm; it is a vanguard in its own right. We strive to continue to push the limits and think outside the box for the right reasons. We believe that there can never be an end to innovation and that is what drives us at MINism. We are not just a fashion company; we are an evolutionary company.

story:
A GROUP OF WATCH ENTHUSIASTS

BEHRENS ORIGINAL is a group of watch enthusiasts gather and create a brand that is based in Hong Kong. We specialized in watchmaking and watch modification, in which we take pride in what we do. Our founder, B.Q.Jack, has more than 15 years in watchmaking - which we genuinely called him the watch factory master. With a group of designers and engineers works perfectly, interesting ideas and developments come out every day!

We want our watches to be well-made and with a high-end quality, which has been acknowledged and proven by 600+ backers and customers all over the world. We are being discussed on many forums and groups organised by watch lovers.

Our three successful Kickstarter campaigns:

THE MOONPHASE: LINK HERE

THE ALL-ROUND: LINK HERE

THE SPACESHIP: LINK HERE

WHAT IS NEW THIS TIME?

THE MOONLIGHT = affordable price + in-house regulator + moon indicator + day-night indicator + miyota9015 + sapphire crystal + premium watch case

We always want to be the game-changer in the watchmaking industry. Last time we have the very own time-telling mechanism aka wandering hour watch - THE SPACESHIP. It was a huge success and you can hardly find a microbrand having a complete unique module watch at this price point. And this time we would like to dive into another watchmaking category - Regulator.

 

AN IN-HOUSE REGULATOR

Regulator is a watch that has all of its time registers separated. In fact, some movement like Miyota 8217 offers “already-made” regulator function which is used on many other brands. However because it is subject to the movement itself and thus, the function and the location of the hands are almost the same.

We make our own regulator module based on Miyota 9015 and we make changes based on what we want. The perfect balance of the minute and hour hands and a big display of the moon indicator are what we want to achieve.

A Brief History of Regulator Watches:

https://www.timepiecechronicle.com/features/201...

Spec

 

HOW IS IT DONE? IS IT STABILE?

We modified the movement by adding a module with 7 gears onto it. All the parts including the gears and the top plate are manufactured by our own factory. Modifying a watch movement is not easy as a little error on gears will ruin the movement. We tested it as usual for more than 9 months for maximum reliability and stability.

HOW TO TELL THE TIME? WHAT IS THAT MOON?

We relocated the hour hand to the bottom left and the minute hand to the bottom right. It makes a perfect balance together with the centred second hand. We also modified the movement to have a day-night indicator at the bottom of the watch.

Moreover, as our first Kickstarter project - THE MOON PHASE is still very popular and widely discussed in many forums and pages. We decided to make a lume “moon-indicator” at the top of the watch which gives you an idea if there is an observable moon in the sky.

*Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9 is used for numerals which emits a Blue-Green glow in the dark and looks white in the daylight condition.

*More about Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9

https://luciusatelier.com/blogs/news/learn-abou...

*The moon indicator display system is based on a 31-tooth driving wheel, it makes a full rotation over the span of 31 days

MULTI-POLISHING CASE 220% MORE COST

The excellent case design is one of the significant symbols of our watches. It is also widely loved by 600+ BEHRENS ORIGINAL customers. This time, we decided to provide the highest standard case we can get for you all.

The premium watch case we used on THE MOONLIGHT is exactly the same as we use on the premium standard on THE SPACESHIP. There isn’t any bad or tier 2 cases in BEHRENS ORIGINAL. All of our cases are the top tier ones which is more than 220% of the cost of normal watch cases.

In order to make it more sharper and smoother, the watch case is manufactured independently into 3 parts- the two lugs; and the body itself, so as to polish them independently. It then gives out a new level of polishing and exquisite than a normal case. Such costly production method could only be found in luxury watches production.

The case is made of 316L stainless steel which is widely used in high-end watches. Multi-polishing methods are applied: including mirror polished on the bezel and the edges of the lugs, horizontal brushed on the sides, vertical brushed on the lugs and circular brush on the back. And for this time, we redesigned the dome-shaped sapphire crystal in order to have its smooth and clear curve.

Although these production methods are long and costly, and sometimes it is unnoticeable until you have a closer look, we aim to give you the best, attractive, durable, and elegant watch cases.

*Every watch is individually numbered.

 

 

SLIM WATCH - 7.9MM REGULATOR MECHANICAL WATCH

Slim appearance is the iconic design element of Behrens Original. Our slim design is adored by 600+ Behrens Original backers and supporters.

In order to have a nice mechanical watch with a thin design, we provide the best we can: With the well-designed cutting of the case and the super-high quality redesigned dome-shaped sapphire, our watch provides an incredible slim appearance. The thickness of the watch is only 7.9mm, exclusively the dome shape sapphire. With the dome-shaped sapphire, the total height is only 10.5mm.

Every part of our design is uniquely made for reaching our goal: a thin mechanical watch. We have gone under many tests on making a thin, durable watch. Our design team remade the dial part more than five times to remove 10-30C each time. There are no words can fully describe the hardship we had in the process, but we have put our efforts wholeheartedly in making this unique yet slim mechanical watch.

OUR MOVEMENT - MIYOTA 9015

We modify the regulator and the day-night indicator from Miyota 9015.

Movement is the soul of all watches and that is exactly what attracts all watch collectors. Our factory has more than 10 years of experience in the Swiss and Japan movement watchmaking and watch modification.

This time we selected the Miyota 9015 for our movement, which is well-known for its slimness, reliability and stability. This Japan movement functions with a frequency of 4Hz (28,800 A/h), 24 jewels, 42-hour power reserve, automatic winding, and a sweep second movement. With a movement of height 3.9mm and 26mm overall diameter, it is super slim. Combining both thin body and functionality, this movement is only used in high-class watches. Although the price of this movement is very high, we persist to provide the best we can.

*the first sample comes out 9 months before to test the reliability and stability. It is running very great for months.

SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL ONLY - 3.8MM THICK

For producing luxurious watches, we persist to use only sapphire crystal for both sides of the watches. Due to the remarkable hardness of sapphires - 9 on the Mohs scale, our watches can hardly be damaged by plain scratches. Thus, we believe that sapphire crystal is the most suitable material for daily wear.

Dome-shaped sapphire crystal is used to give an ultimately slim appearance to the watch. As sapphire is a hard material (A 5mm thick raw sapphire material is used to craft into a 3.8mm dome-shaped crystal), it is beyond difficult to make the dome-shaped sapphire. Since it is costly and time-consuming (our machine can only produce 3 pieces of dome-shaped sapphire crystal max. per day), the yield rate is low.

ACCURACY - 7 DAYS, T0, T24 TESTS

Watch modification and movement tuning are our central focus. As such, absolute accuracy is always on our important checklist. We ensure the quality of every part by using strict control testing standards before assembling the watches.

The testing procedure lasts 7 days

Day 1 Before assembling the watches, the movement is fully wound (also known as T0) mechanically. The movement is tested in five positions, crown left, crown up, crown down, dial-up and dial down. Then given a rest period of 24 hours(also known as T24) , the movement is tested again in the five positions.

Day 3 After assembling all the parts together, the watch is put into an auto-winding machine for 1 day. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.

Day 5 The watch keeps putting into an auto-winding machine. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure on Day 1.

Day 7 Before packing, the watch is fully wound(T0) and is tested in five positions again.

All our watches have to pass all of the above procedures before delivery. We make sure that the accuracy of our watches is highly maintained in -20~+20 seconds/day. We tested the watches in more positions than the normal quality checkups do - we tested the watches in 5 positions while the others tested in 3 positions only.

We need to ensure the watches are adequate in every situation. We then on-wrist tested the sample watches for more than 9 months before we started our Kickstarter campaign. The stableness of BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches is highly guaranteed.

ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAP -  INTERCHANGEABLE CATCH

We are all perfectionists, we see the pairing of the best leather strap and BEHRENS watches is an obligation. We provide a high quality fine crafted Italian calf leather strap as usual to give you the most comfortable and pleasant wearing experience. The strap with an interchangeable catch on the lugs side allows you to change your strap without any special tool.

You can also pick our Horween Leather strap; an American leather producer with high recognition in the watch strap industry, has more than 100 years heritage in hand-craft manufacturer technique. This Horween Leather Brown/Honey Brown achieve an aniline finish with a rich and oily texture, widely used in luxury leather goods.

2-YEAR WARRANTY + 1(UNLOCK IN STRETCH GOAL)

We are confident about the quality of our watches - BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches. Each watch is backed by a 2-year warranty. We have our own factory and watch masters performing quality checks and maintenance everyday before shipping. So rest assured, your precious watches are well taken care of and are ready to give you the most comfortable wearing experience!

FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

TIMELINE

THE MODEL(ALL REAL PHOTOS)

 

THE STRAPS

PRESS RELEASE

We provide a press release and a set of promotional materials for journals and ambassadors. If you want to feature us, please kindly download them at the link below:

Promotion kit

You are always welcome to contact us for more marketing support.

email: info@behrenswatches.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/behrenswatches

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/behrenswatches

We appreciate every each of your support!

COOPERATION OPPORTUNITY

We are one of the best watch manufacturers you can find in the world. Our watch modification specialists are welcome to tailor-made any time-telling systems and modules based on what you want. We specialized in:

✓Watchmaking

✓Watch modification

✓Watch module

Feel free to email us for a quotation.

info@behrenswatches.com

DECLARATION

Please note that it is our company policy not to  lower the declaration value of the goods or mark as gift/sample, as it  is illegal in most of the countries, we may be blacklisted and charged  by the customs. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

PROMOTED BY

story:
We've designed an ingenious new kind of belt...  First - no more belt holes. Instead a modern, hidden track system and a unique, patent-pending buckle create a  perfect fit every time you put it on - no matter what your waist size is at the moment.  

                                     WHAT MAKES OUR BELTS SO UNIQUE ?

1. PERFECT FIT:   In this ever-changing world, you need a belt that adapts with you, every1/4 inch of the way. Trakline belts conform to your exact waist size, every time you put it on.

2. ADJUSTABILITY:   It's true, Trakline belts are 8X's more adjustable than traditional belts. That's because they offer over 40 sizing positions to choose from. Traditional belts have only 5.

3. NO HOLES:   That's right.  No more worn-out, stretched-out, augmented, poor-fitting belt holes to deal with. Instead a modern, hidden trak system that lasts longer and conforms to your precise waist size. 

4. QUALITY:   We only make products that we want to wear >> and we like quality stuff. The buckles are high-grade alloy and the belts are full-grain leather (best available leather).

5. GUARANTEE:   If you don't love your belt, just return it within 30 days and we'll refund your money. Why are we doing this ? Because 99% of folks love their belts - they tell us so. So we're confident you will too.

 

SO HOW'S IT WORK ? Trakline belts lock firmly at your exact waist size - every time you put it on. To remove or adjust, pull the small tab under the buckle. It's that simple. Not only do Trakline belts fit a lot better than traditional belts, but they're easier to take on and off, and no belt holes to wear out. Watch the video and see for yourself - because seeing is believing... 

OUR STORY About two years ago my wife bought me an expensive, designer belt for my birthday. She wanted to upgrade my wardrobe. Unfortunately for me, the belt holes didn't line up with my waist size that day.  So I did what a lot of guys have done, I added a couple holes.  But in the process >> I ruined the belt.  Needless to say, my wife was not happy. 


YOUR WAIST AND YOU  Consider that as you work, walk, eat, sleep, play - your waist fluctuates. Unfortunately, traditional belts only offer a few 1 inch spaced holes. Who's waist fluctuates 1 inch at a time?  Not mine, and I doubt yours does either. So I made it my mission to find a better fitting belt with style. But when I scoured the marketplace for a product that could adapt to my ever-changing waist size AND look good doing it... I came up empty. That's when I got inspired to create a whole new kind of belt.

WHAT'S THE SECRET ?  Using a clever, hidden trak system, and our spring-loaded, patent-pending buckles, Trakline belts offer you 40+ sizing positions in 1/4" increments. A regular belt has just 5. Sorry old belt. 

TRAKLINE 2.0  Last summer we launched our first line of Trakline on Kickstarter and were fortunate enough to attract over 4,000 backers who believed in us and the product ! So why are we crowdfunding again ? Simple. To launch Trakline 2.0.  We took your suggestions and comments, and created a NEW, IMPROVED line of STANDARD Style buckles and belts (3.5 cm / 1.4") - AND - new line ofSLIM Style buckles and belts (2.5 cm / 1" belts). To do all this we need your support to fund our first production run and get them into stores. 

             >> INTRODUCING OUR NEW TRAKLINE 2.0 BUCKLES << 

Buckles are high-grade alloy / belts are full-grain leather (highest available grade of leather) and come in your choice of black, medium brown and white.

 

 

THE BOTTOM LINE   It's a fact we all know - belt holes stretch-out, wear-out, need supplementing and rarely seem to fit right. In this age of technology >> don't you think you deserve a belt that not only looks great, but fits great too - every time you put it on ? >> We think so.

WHAT ABOUT QUALITY ?  In a world where the word "quality" is tossed around like a cheap suit - this is "authentic" quality. That means we manufacture Trakline belts using the best available materials. Our buckles are constructed using high-grade metal alloys and our belts with full-grain leather. Full-grain is the best leather available.

                visit us online at >>  http://www.KoreEssentials.com

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE Last summer we shipped over 4,000 Trakline belts worldwide to our 1st Kickstarter campaign backers. The response was overwhelmingly positive >People loved the belts !specifically the fit and the quality. So we feel like we can say with confidence >> this is the best belt you'll ever own and you're going to love it. But don't just take our word for it >> read the customer reviews - http://koreessentials.com

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT  We're ready to take our Trakline belts to the next level, with improved functionality, more buckle designs and more belt choices, but we need your support to do it. Specifically, we need the funds to pay for our first production run.  With this we'll be able to get our belts into the marketplace. 

BACKER REWARDS  In return for your support, we want you to be one of the first to own one (or more) of our new line of Trakline 2.0 belts ! Check out the Rewards column for the styles and backer pricing. In addition, We're offering FREE SHIPPING to all U.S.A. orders and just $15 for International destinations outside the U.S. 

-  CLOSET HANGER (fits Standard and Slim)

BUCKLE & BELT DETAILS  Our 4 standard style belts are approx. 3.5 cm (1.4") wide and fit all jeans and most slacks. The slim style belts are approx. 2.5 cm (1") wide and fit ALL jeans, pants & dress slacks. See the photos for the buckle style names before backing. All of our belts fit waist sizes from 24" up to 44" (118 cm).  We will have larger sizes available on our website in the near future at http://www.KoreEssentials.com. 

PERFECT FIT  On the back of each belt we printed waist size markings to show you precisely where to trim your belt (with scissors). The trimmed end then snaps securely and easily into the buckle receptacle. The purpose for trimming, is to get your belt length within your "waist range", then the trak system can create your perfect fit every day, no matter what your waist size is.

THE TEAM:  Steve> Manufacturing & Quality Control. Max> Product & Web Design.  Karl > Sales & Marketing  The three of us have been good friends and business associates for over 10 years. For the past 12 years Steve has overseen the manufacturing of a wide variety of high-quality apparel and accessories products. Max on the other hand, is an all-around talented designer, who's been crucial in creating our product designs, drawings and the website. My background has been in business management and sales. Over the past 20 years, I've successfully launched, grown, managed and sold several companies. Together, the three of us make a great team.

PRODUCTION PLAN  Once we complete the Kickstarter campaign we will immediately commence production. Based on the factories estimate, the manufacturing process should take approximately 30 days to complete. To save money, we're making the belts at a responsible overseas factory that we've employed before with great success. Once the production is completed, we will ship the belts to our warehouse in San Diego, California, and then repackage individual orders to ship out to backers within about 2 weeks. It's that simple and that's how we did it before with success.

Trakline's unique buckles & accessories are Patent Pending.  Trakline belts are manufactured by Kore Essentials, Inc. (our company). Trakline is a registered U.S. trademark.

What a few popular blogs & media outlets said about us:

"Trakline banished the meager five, 1"-spaced holes of traditional belts from their full-grain leather strips, and replaced them with a secure Trak system boasting 40 sizing positions at 1/4" increments. The result: a perfect fit at my precise waist size, whether it's Liquid Diet Monday or Chicken & Waffles Saturday." -Dude I Want That.com !

"What we love about Trakline belts is that each belt fits to your exact waist size, every time you put it on. So if you are having a fat day, there is no need to punch an extra hole to give you a little more breathing space, just pop on a Trakline belt and fit it to your exact waist size." -ShoppersBase.com

"Never again worry about being between belt holes. Trakline Belts are on Kickstarter, reinventing the wheel for men’s belts. They fit your exact waist size every time with over 40 positions!" -The Crowdfund Mafia
story_txt:
We've designed an ingenious new kind of belt...  First - no more belt holes. Instead a modern, hidden track system and a unique, patent-pending buckle create a  perfect fit every time you put it on - no matter what your waist size is at the moment.                                        WHAT MAKES OUR BELTS SO UNIQUE ?1. PERFECT FIT:   In this ever-changing world, you need a belt that adapts with you, every1/4 inch of the way. Trakline belts conform to your exact waist size, every time you put it on.2. ADJUSTABILITY:   It's true, Trakline belts are 8X's more adjustable than traditional belts. That's because they offer over 40 sizing positions to choose from. Traditional belts have only 5.3. NO HOLES:   That's right.  No more worn-out, stretched-out, augmented, poor-fitting belt holes to deal with. Instead a modern, hidden trak system that lasts longer and conforms to your precise waist size. 4. QUALITY:   We only make products that we want to wear >> and we like quality stuff. The buckles are high-grade alloy and the belts are full-grain leather (best available leather).5. GUARANTEE:   If you don't love your belt, just return it within 30 days and we'll refund your money. Why are we doing this ? Because 99% of folks love their belts - they tell us so. So we're confident you will too. "Intrepid" nickel buckle [standard width 3.5 cm / 1.4"]SO HOW'S IT WORK ? Trakline belts lock firmly at your exact waist size - every time you put it on. To remove or adjust, pull the small tab under the buckle. It's that simple. Not only do Trakline belts fit a lot better than traditional belts, but they're easier to take on and off, and no belt holes to wear out. Watch the video and see for yourself - because seeing is believing... OUR STORY About two years ago my wife bought me an expensive, designer belt for my birthday. She wanted to upgrade my wardrobe. Unfortunately for me, the belt holes didn't line up with my waist size that day.  So I did what a lot of guys have done, I added a couple holes.  But in the process >> I ruined the belt.  Needless to say, my wife was not happy. "Eclipse" gunmetal [standard 3.5 cm / 1.4"]INSPIRATION   I learned 2 simple lessons that day.  First, never puncture any gift from your wife and second >>  belt holes don't work all that well. Not much of a surprise, considering they were introduced during the "Dark Ages" (1,000+ years ago) and haven't changed much since. YOUR WAIST AND YOU  Consider that as you work, walk, eat, sleep, play - your waist fluctuates. Unfortunately, traditional belts only offer a few 1 inch spaced holes. Who's waist fluctuates 1 inch at a time?  Not mine, and I doubt yours does either. So I made it my mission to find a better fitting belt with style. But when I scoured the marketplace for a product that could adapt to my ever-changing waist size AND look good doing it... I came up empty. That's when I got inspired to create a whole new kind of belt."Intrepid" nickel [standard 3.5 cm / 1.4"]
WHAT'S THE SECRET ?  Using a clever, hidden trak system, and our spring-loaded, patent-pending buckles, Trakline belts offer you 40+ sizing positions in 1/4" increments. A regular belt has just 5. Sorry old belt. TRAKLINE 2.0  Last summer we launched our first line of Trakline on Kickstarter and were fortunate enough to attract over 4,000 backers who believed in us and the product ! So why are we crowdfunding again ? Simple. To launch Trakline 2.0.  We took your suggestions and comments, and created a NEW, IMPROVED line of STANDARD Style buckles and belts (3.5 cm / 1.4") - AND - new line ofSLIM Style buckles and belts (2.5 cm / 1" belts). To do all this we need your support to fund our first production run and get them into stores.              >> INTRODUCING OUR NEW TRAKLINE 2.0 BUCKLES << Buckles are high-grade alloy / belts are full-grain leather (highest available grade of leather) and come in your choice of black, medium brown and white."Eclipse" gunmetal [standard 3.5 cm / 1/.4"]

"Inception" nickel [slim 2.8 cm / 1.1"]
"Indigo" gold [slim 2.8 cm / 1.1"]
"Indigo" nickel [slim 2.8 cm / 1.1"]
THE BOTTOM LINE   It's a fact we all know - belt holes stretch-out, wear-out, need supplementing and rarely seem to fit right. In this age of technology >> don't you think you deserve a belt that not only looks great, but fits great too - every time you put it on ? >> We think so.Gunmetal Buckles [standard 3.5 cm / 1.4"]

That means we manufacture Trakline belts using the best available materials. Our buckles are constructed using high-grade metal alloys and our belts with full-grain leather. Full-grain is the best leather available.                visit us online at >>  http://www.KoreEssentials.comMONEY BACK GUARANTEE Last summer we shipped over 4,000 Trakline belts worldwide to our 1st Kickstarter campaign backers. The response was overwhelmingly positive >People loved the belts !specifically the fit and the quality. story:
Made for the woman on the go, we created a premium bag - without the premium markup; a bag that keeps up with you so you can use it All Day. Every Day.

We asked over 1100 backers of the All Day Bag why they pledged for this project. Here are some of their answers ( and all the reasons why we created this bag):

 

THE ALL DAY BAG can be worn as a handbag, backpack, or a tote. Simply pull the straps to turn it into a whole new bag.

 

Crafted from full-grain premium leather and designed to flatter the female silhouette, the ALL DAY BAG was made to elevate every outfit for any occasion.

 

 

Now you can do what you want with a bag that does it all. Our morning to moonlight ALL DAY BAG is a true multi-tasking masterpiece.

 

Made for motion. Adjust the versatile straps to a luggage strap to maximize your bag's safety in transit. Wherever you’re headed this year, THE ALL DAY BAG has your back.

 

 

Available in both soft pebbled full-grain leather or structured croc print full-grain leather, our ALL DAY BAG wears beautifully over time and feels memorably soft to the touch.

 

 

Built around the busy woman’s day THE ALL DAY BAG is intuitive to use. A secret phone pocket on the back and a thoughtfully curated interior ensure functionality remains chic.

 

 

A clip for keys, a 13” laptop sleeve, a notebook sleeve, pockets for your wallet, hand cream, sunglasses, a roomy zip pocket for valuables or chargers, a water bottle holder with an elasticated top, and two leather pen loops, two leather lipstick loops, ensure your everyday necessities stay organized and accessible.

The main compartment is spacious enough to hold a 15” laptop, a cardigan, and even your to-go lunch.

 

 

THE ALL DAY BAG was designed for ease of access on-the-go with a fold-in top flap and a leather-covered magnetic closure.

For a little peace of mind, we added a silver zipper closure underneath that’s as sturdy as it's striking.

 

Ready to take the plunge? Click Back This Project, and pick a reward.

 

Add-Ons

These add-ons can only be purchased if an All Day Bag has been pledged. You will have access to add-on any of the items below in the survey once the campaign ends.

Passport Wallets: $45

The passport wallets fit any sized passport. They come with 4 card slots (credit cards, ID, green card, driver license), 2 SIM card slots (for international travel), a slot for the passport on the right and 2 slots on the left for your boarding pass and/or any other document.

Zip Around Wallet: $45

Our 2nd generation zip around wallet has been upgraded. It includes 4 card slots on the left. A place for cash fitting Euros, USD, Pounds, CAD and everything in between. On the right is a coin pouch and a few hidden slots underneath.

 

Travel Pouches - $45

Our classic travel pouch is the perfect companion for keeping your essentials within reach during your travels or for a night out.

 

Bi-Fold Card Wallet - $35

With 4 slots on the inside and 1 on the outside, this is the perfect minimalistic cardholder.

The adjustable strap works like a wonder. Find your optimal strap length to easily switch from a handbag to a backpack, to a tote in one quick pull.

Fold-in side gussets and a fold-in top flap allow for freedom to switch silhouettes and allow for further storage space.

 

Lightweight and easy to clean. Our wipeable technical nylon offers a luxe look and feel. It even looks good after a spill.

Metal feet on the bottom to protect the All Day Bag.

Wool & Oak is an adventure between husband and wife and co-founder duo Johnathan and Gizem. Their passion for travel, as well as their love for design and fashion, inspired them to create Wool & Oak in 2016 so they never again have to choose between style and comfort.

"We launch our product innovations on Kickstarter because it gives us the freedom to run our business exactly how we want. The funds we generate on Kickstarter make it possible for us to continue developing products without seeking venture capital. That means we're not burdened by profit margins, growth goals, revenue targets, or product timelines imposed by other people. Instead, we focus on doing what we love doing at our own pace: creating the best products that improve the way we travel and enhance our travel experiences. Wool & Oak would not exist without the support from the crowdfunding community."

"This is our 5th Kickstarter project. From the beginning, our backers have steered the direction of Wool & Oak. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for letting us continue on this incredible adventure. We very much appreciate your contribution and promise to continue delivering the best possible products."

story:
Who's CAPUMON?

We're CAPUMON! 
We started about 2 years ago, creating unique designs inspired by video games, anime and cosplay.

We only create things that don't already exist.

We run on votes. We want to make what you want to see (of course with our own flair!).

We've done over 10 successful pre-orders within a year and attended over 20 events so far!

It's really inspiring seeing you all represent our hats. 

We hope you can join us on our third pre-order on INDIEGOGO!

So Here's The Deal!

We need at least 40 pre-orders (by the campaign end date) for this to happen.

This is a fixed campaign, you will only be charged if we reach our goal.

(So if you believe in this please pledge! This is extremely limited edition.)

This is not a donation. You will receive the hat as soon as it's produced and shipped.
The price includes FREE SHIPPING. (Usually $6 USD domestic and $10 USD international.)

This hat is LIMITED EDITION (just like our other hats),
meaning there will only be 96 TOTAL for sale in the WHOLE WORLD! 

This campaign will end July 26th, 2018 at 11:59 PDT.

Simple as that! 

This design was created by us to celebrate the release of Pokemon: Sun & Moon. Similar to our previous Mimikyu inspired hat, this hat flaunts the shiny monochrome color scheme variant of Mimikyu. Everything from the intricate embroidery and pointy ears give this hat a heightened sense of dimension. This will be our 3rd shiny hat we've ever created. 

This Isn't Easy TBH!

We've already taken care of organizing, designing, preparing manufacturing, shipping/handling, marketing, and the list goes on.

100% of the funds collected go towards making these hats! 

We do this because we love it, and we want to spread the love! 

You Don't HAVE to Pre-Order... 

But... sharing this pre-order link does wonders!

https://www.indiegogo.com/campaigns/fake-mascot-shiny-mimikyu-inspired-snapback-hat

Like us on Facebook! Tell your friends and family about us! 

http://www.facebook.com/capsulemon

We're on everything else too, Instagram, Tumblr, Twitter, you can see it all on our homepage!

http://www.capumon.com


Thanks for the support guys!

CAPUMON

story:
Thank you for taking a look at my campaign!  I really appreciate your time and consideration!

Background

Hi, my name is Susan Pfeiffer and I live in Colorado with my wonderful family - my husband, 3 kids and Hoover.  I've been in the Computer Software industry for over 20 years although currently I'm a stay-at-home mom.  I volunteer at my kids schools and I've been a leader for my daughter's girl scout troop for the past 7 years.  I'm an inventer at heart as I'm always coming up with new ideas for inventions. Recently I invented a multifunctional dog leash that allows you to easily hook up your dog to any structure without unhooking the leash from your dog's collar.  I currently have a PATENT PENDING on this leash.

How the Idea was Born

I took my dog Hoover to the dog park one day in our van.  I had him tethered to a bracket on the floor of the van so he was secure on the ride there.  When I went to take him out of the van, he was jumping around with excitement because he knew we were at the dog park.  Once again, I had to hold him by the collar as I unhooked the leash with the other hand and fed the leash back through the bracket so I could hook him back up to walk into the dog park.  I thought "THERE HAS TO BE A BETTER WAY!"

My Multifunctional Dog Leash

I researched what was out there and came up with an idea that solved all my issues with my traditional leash.  Not only is it multifunctional, but it looks cool with the grommets!  There is a clasp at each end and grommet holes throughout the entire length of the leash.  Also at each end of the leash, there is double webbing so you can grab that "handle" while you're hooking or unhooking your dog from any structure.  

Features

Clasps at each end so either end can be the handle

Grommet holes throughout the length of the leash so you can hook it around small or large structures

Double webbing at each end of the leash so you can securely grab the leash while you are hooking or unhooking your dog to the structure.

Can be hooked in the middle grommet to another leash so you can walk 2 dogs

Can be hooked around your waist for hands free walking

Grommet holes are strong enough to support the clasps

Grommet holes will not rust

The grommet holes lay flat so it is easy to roll up the leash

How Will I Use the $5000

Buy an industrial sewing machine so I can make the leashes myself to keep down costs.

Buy a grommet machine which will easily secure the grommets (instead of pounding them by hand)

Buy a variety of webbing - different colors, materials, widths, thickness, etc...

Buy a variety of grommets - metal, brass, colored, etc...

Buy a variety of clasps - metal, brass, trigger snaphooks, round eye snaphooks, carabiners, etc...

Develop a website

Marketing materials

Fees for Pet Expos

Trademark my name (which I'll update you on when I come up with my final decision)

Perks

I appreciate any support you can give so you'll get a big THANK YOU from me and Hoover no matter what!  If you contribute $25 or more, you'll receive a custom leash - you pick out the leash color, grommets and clasps.  As the contribution goes up, so do the number of leashes I will send you.  My highest perk is for a $250 contribution.  I've limited that perk to 8 because along with receiving multiple leashes, I will name a leash model after your special dog and include his/her picture and a short bio on the sales tag!

THANK YOU AGAIN FOR TAKING A LOOK AT MY CAMPAIGN!!

PATENT PENDING
story_txt:
Thank you for taking a look at my campaign!  I really appreciate your time and consideration!
Background
Hi, my name is Susan Pfeiffer and I live in Colorado with my wonderful family - my husband, 3 kids and Hoover.  I've been in the Computer Software industry for over 20 years although currently I'm a stay-at-home mom.  I volunteer at my kids schools and I've been a leader for my daughter's girl scout troop for the past 7 years.  I'm an inventer at heart as I'm always coming up with new ideas for inventions. Recently I invented a multifunctional dog leash that allows you to easily hook up your dog to any structure without unhooking the leash from your dog's collar.  I currently have a PATENT PENDING on this leash.
How the Idea was Born
I took my dog Hoover to the dog park one day in our van.  I had him tethered to a bracket on the floor of the van so he was secure on the ride there.  When I went to take him out of the van, he was jumping around with excitement because he knew we were at the dog park.  Once again, I had to hold him by the collar as I unhooked the leash with the other hand and fed the leash back through the bracket so I could hook him back up to walk into the dog park.  I thought "THERE HAS TO BE A BETTER WAY!"
My Multifunctional Dog Leash
I researched what was out there and came up with an idea that solved all my issues with my traditional leash.  Not only is it multifunctional, but it looks cool with the grommets!  There is a clasp at each end and grommet holes throughout the entire length of the leash.  Also at each end of the leash, there is double webbing so you can grab that "handle" while you're hooking or unhooking your dog from any structure.  
Features
Clasps at each end so either end can be the handle
Grommet holes throughout the length of the leash so you can hook it around small or large structures
Double webbing at each end of the leash so you can securely grab the leash while you are hooking or unhooking your dog to the structure.
Can be hooked in the middle grommet to another leash so you can walk 2 dogs
Can be hooked around your waist for hands free walking
Grommet holes are strong enough to support the clasps
Grommet holes will not rust
The grommet holes lay flat so it is easy to roll up the leash
How Will I Use the $5000
Buy an industrial sewing machine so I can make the leashes myself to keep down costs.
Buy a grommet machine which will easily secure the grommets (instead of pounding them by hand)
Buy a variety of webbing - different colors, materials, widths, thickness, etc...
Buy a variety of grommets - metal, brass, colored, etc...
Buy a variety of clasps - metal, brass, trigger snaphooks, round eye snaphooks, carabiners, etc...
Develop a website
Marketing materials
Fees for Pet Expos
Trademark my name (which I'll update you on when I come up with my final decision)
Perks
I appreciate any support you can give so you'll get a big THANK YOU from me and Hoover no matter what!  If you contribute $25 or more, you'll receive a custom leash - you pick out the leash color, grommets and clasps.  As the contribution goes up, so do the number of leashes I will send you.  My highest perk is for a $250 contribution.  I've limited that perk to 8 because along with receiving multiple leashes, I will name a leash model after your special dog and include his/her picture and a short bio on the sales tag!
THANK YOU AGAIN FOR TAKING A LOOK AT MY CAMPAIGN!!
PATENT PENDING

story:
Dimmed Lights, Fun Music & The Best Instructors

For the past two and a half years, with two locations in San Diego, The Rush has been delivering the cardio experience Southern California has been waiting for. Our studio proudly delivers the endorphin high you crave in a boutique atmosphere that is unparalleled throughout the fitness industry. Whether you are a beginner or an elite athlete, The Rush provides the local community with the most efficient cardio workout while maintaining a premium level of quality, intimacy, and convenience. Our upbeat instructors will lead you through high intensity, low impact classes as you pedal through your fitness goals. Riding with us at The Rush energizes your mind, body, and soul and provides you with the perfect workout for a balanced lifestyle.




"We wanted to create an enjoyable workout experience in a non-intimidating environment." 

From day one our main focus at The Rush has always been to build a tight-knit community of riders within our studios. We have accomplished something very special where our riders and instructors push and inspire one another to reach their personal goals, whether it be in fitness or in their lives outside of our studio. 




Why are we doing this campaign?

We want to extend our Rush brand / philosophy outside the studio walls and in to the community. There is no better way to do this than by wearing what you believe in - this is why we have decided to launch our official apparel line! We want to spread our energy, passion, vision and inspiration throughout the local community. 

Tested in the field.

For those of you who ride regularly at The Rush,  you may have noticed our Rockstar Instructors wearing our apparel prototypes. We wanted to ensure that not only is the apparel beautiful, but it is functional and comfortable to sweat in. Our instructors have given us the official two thumbs up, so we have decided to finally make it available to our community.  

We have spent endless hours curating, designing and testing our apparel to make sure we provide quality pieces that our clients would love. We created this line of apparel so that you could wear it to your next spin/yoga class, or wherever you decide to get your sweat on, and at the same time wear it out to the local coffee shop or farmer's market. 



Challenged Athletes Foundation

By purchasing your pre-order today you will not only be helping us at The Rush, but you will also be making a difference in your community. With every purchase, we will donate 5% to our good friends at the Challenged Athletes Foundation. 
The Challenged Athletes Foundation® (CAF) is a world leader in helping individuals with physical challenges get involved - and stay involved - in sports.



We need your support to launch.

Help us to inspire our community and be the first to wear our apparel by pre-ordering today. Plus it will ensure you get the pieces of apparel you want before they run out! 
HOW IT WORKS:
1. View photos of the apparel below
2. Select a "Perk" on the right-hand side to start your pre-order
3. Please enter your shipping information and payment details. We will email you a follow up to get the style, color and size you would like. 
This will help us reach our goal so we can bring our apparel to both studios and the surrounding communities. 


Photos of apparel and style names.


1. Stacked RUSH - Burnout Tank
  • Orange (seen below)
  • Pink


2. Heart Logo - Burnout Tank

  • Tahitian Blue (seen below)


3. Heart Logo - Tri-Blend Tank

  • Heather Gray (seen below)


4. I Cycle SD - Wide Neck T-Shirt

  • Neon Heather Green (seen below)


5. Ride The Beat - Wide Neck T-Shirt

  • Neon Heather Orange (seen below)


6.  Rush Logo - Burnout V-Neck

  • Heather Pink (seen below)


7.  The Rush - Mens V-Neck

  • Heather Gray (seen below)


8.  The Rush - Mens Crew Neck

  • Vintage Black (seen below)


9.  Rush Logo - Yoga Pants

  • Heather Gray (seen below)





Q: How do I get my apparel?
A: When you pre-order from this campaign we will get in touch with you through email. You will give us the style, size and color of the apparel corresponding with the "Perk" you purchased. In that same email, you can also notify our team if you would like to pick it up at one of our studios. 
Q: When do I get my apparel?
A: We are running this campaign for 30 days, at the end of the 30 days we will order all of the apparel, then send it to our printer. Once we pick up all of the orders from our printer we will distribute them as fast as we can, we will RUSH the order. ;)

Q: What if the size I ordered does not fit?

A: Customer service is #1 at The Rush. We will do everything possible to make sure you get exactly what you want (Even if it means trying different sizes on in our studio.)



We are here for you!
If you have any questions or comments please contact us at apparel@therushstudio.com or visit us at www.therushstudio.com

THANK YOU TO EVERYONE WHO HELPS US ACHIEVE OUR CAMPAIGN GOAL. WE LOVE YOU.
PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS!

story:
______________________________________________

I believe that in our modern world, sewing has become a lost art. As a passionate seamstress and simplistic fashionista, I want to help change that. That’s why I need your help with starting a sewing school here where I live in Salt Lake City, Utah, called Made. 

This school will be set up like a gym—where anyone can buy a membership, take individual classes, or bring in their own projects. It doesn’t matter if you have advanced sewing skills or if you’ve never even touched a sewing machine, anyone can come and learn stitching, mending, alterations, clothing construction, accessories, or home decor. Whatever you want to make — we’ll make it happen. 

About Me

My name is Sarah Burroughs. I grew-up in Virginia Beach, Virginia taking dance lessons, piano lessons, attending various art schools, participated in church and school choirs, and picked up sewing along the way. 

I'm practically a self-taught seamstress, initially out of frustration with tacky clothes and bags. I found that I enjoyed designing bags the most because I could make them my style statement piece. Then I began to consult with friends to design bags that fit their personal needs, taste, and style as well. I loved seeing how excited they got realizing they were essentially the designer—I just made the sketches and final product. 

Fast forward to 2014, after many years and many fails, I've developed anne b (middle name + last initial) into an authentic handbag brand that has experienced international sales and creditable local media recognition.

The MADE Inspiration

I was first inspired to create this sewing school while volunteering in Uganda last summer with HELP International. While there, I taught women and children skills like sewing, paper bead making, and marketing. Seeing how quickly they picked up these skills and their creativity was truly inspiring. When I got back to the States I knew I wanted to bring that same spirit of teaching, creativity, and innovation to the people around me.

Rewards

To show my appreciation for your support of Made, you will receive a bag from a special collection under my label anne b appropriately called - The Made Collection. These cosmetic bags and folded clutches are made from 100% leather, bold kona cotton prints, bright colored lining, leather trimmed pockets, and durable brass zippers. And be your own designer by selecting your outer print and lining color!

In staying true to the initial inspiration for this project, I have worked with local LDS and Catholic refugee organizations to identify skilled seamstresses who will then manufacture the bags and will be employeed through donations to this project. I will provide personal training and mentoring for the refugees to ensure quality craftsmanship.  This opportunity will empower the refugees with enhanced sewing skills for a greater chance at receiving full-time employment with anne b or with another employer. 

Choose Your Bag


Choose Your Print

Choose Your Lining

WORKSHOP REGISTRATION

Those of you who live in northern Utah, you can reserve your spot in a sewing workshop to learn the basics, make a bag, skirt, or whatever it is you've been dying to make! Materials and machines provided for the workshops. Make a pledge and then I'll organize the various workshops according to your interests, skill level, and location. Invite your friends to register too!


HARRISON DOPP KIT

We did it! We made it to $7,500 and I've now released a reward level to claim anne b's first official men's product - Harrison Dopp Kit. Made from men's tweed coats, this bag provides the sophistication and durability needed for any of your travel needs. 

Also, there are only 5 dopp kits available in authentic Harris Tweed!

TWSS

"I'm so in love with it! I always shop for my boys so when I saw this.. I had to have it! Quality is amazing!" Susan @susiescustom // Maker of custom babies clothing

"It's the perfect size and the craftsmanship is fantastic. I'm not a big shopper and don't buy many new things, but I'm so glad I ordered this - totally worth it :)" Megan // First time buyer

"She is incredibly personable and has the creative vision needed to accomplish just what you want! I am a fan of all things anne b!" Laura  // Owner of an anne b custom bag

Funds

Your funds will go directly to the Made school to help pay for sewing machines, rental space, sewings tools and materials, and promotion throughout the valley.

Timeline

Funding campaign: June 26 - July 25

Initial training for refugees: June 30 - July 25

Customize your bag: July 26 - August 3

Materials purchased: August 4

Manufacturing begins: August  11

Rewards delivered by: September 30 

**Once we've reached $7,500 in pledges, I'll release anne b's first collection of men's dopp kits** WOOHOO!

Thank You!

I strongly believe that everyone has a spark of innovation and creativity in them no matter who or where they are. By supporting Made, you can help others realize their potential and maybe even help it come alive in you!

Thank you so much for all of your support! I’ve put everything into this project and even quit my job to make this idea come to life. Any sort of contribution through sharing and donating that you can make means a lot. Thanks everyone!

_________________________________________________________________________

Risk and Challenges

After trying to balance anne b and the dream of the Made school with a full-time marketing job, I left that position last month to dedicate everything to opening this school. And now, I've had the privilege of receiving help from several genius friends from my advertising days at BYU contributing their talents to this campaign.

I'm fully confident in this idea and with the quality and design of my products. If you experience any trouble with the products, I'll offer a complete refund, replacement or repair.

Our goal is to fulfill all orders 4-6 weeks after they're placed. If by chance there is a delay, we will keep you posted on the progress of your item.

And of course, after you receive your bag, come into Made and make your own!

______________________________________________

My video was made by Kickstarter Video - to learn more about getting your own crowdfunding video made, check out their site here: Kickstartervideo.net

_________________________________________________________________________

Featured In


Sold At

Connect with Me and anne b

Instagram

Facebook

Twitter

Tumblr

YouTube

anne b shop

In the beginning...

In college, I created instructional YouTube videos. Enjoy -

story:
Yokozuna Futabayama relaxing with his Yoko-neko-zuna Futuba-nya-ma pin

Instead of counting sheep when I can’t sleep, I like to think of things that don’t go together but should go together. I mean that’s how peanut butter and chocolate got started - right?

One particular evening, not that long ago, the combination that came up was Sumo + Cats. It was obvious at that moment that these two things had to go together in the form of an enamel pin. So, I am running this pre-order campaign to gauge interest in this project and get these little pins into the world where I feel they clearly belong.

Since that fateful night, Sumo + Cats became an obsession for me and I would spend hours each day going down the rabbit hole of Sumo trading cards - called Menko online. I found the most fascinating information at an incredible SumoCards blog  run by Ryan Laughton, who has been instrumental in helping me design the cards.

Menko which means "small object with face"  goes all the way back to the 1700’s when they started with small circular discs of clay depicting favorite personalities of the day. They were first replaced by lead disks then were wisely replaced by paper in the early 1900’s due to awareness of lead poisoning! In the 1920’s Menko experienced another change, moving from woodblock printing to half-tone bromide printing and taking on die cut shapes of animals and airplanes. And, slowly as the quality of the printing improved over time, instead of destroying their Menko in battle, kids found value in collecting them. Sumo trading cards started appearing in the 1930's and enjoyed a huge boom in popularity in the 1950's and if you see vintage Sumo Menko it's likely from this period.  As you can see already - the history is so fascinating and rich. I encourage you to visit Ryan’s SumoBlog if you want to learn more.

Vintage Menko courtesy of SumoCards Blog

 

Each pin will approximately be 0.75" tall.

 

Yokozuna Taiho with Yoko-neko-zuna Tai-kawai-ho pin

I am particularly fascinated by Menko in the 1940’s which my packaging is based on. I like that’s when there was that magical collision between the ability to create and manufacturing processes being advanced enough to support that creativity. To stay true to the period, instead of creating the art on the computer, I sketched and painted each of these designs and then put them through a half-tone filter to mimic the printing processes.

I also want point out the Chonmage, the original man bun, on the kitties. Initially I incorrectly drew these as little bumps on the cat’s heads but I was soon directed to draw these properly in the shape of a Gingko leaf.

I used this a Blackwing Pencil (which I highly recommend, the lead is like velvet), my favorite Staedtler eraser and Gouache paints to create the art for the kitties.

Based on Ryan’s expert suggestions, I focused on these three top Sumo wrestlers:

1. Futabayama who popularized the sport of Sumo.

2. Taiho who became a Yokozuna at 21, the youngest ever at the time.

3. Chiyonofuji who was considered as one of the greatest yokozuna of recent times and known as "the Wolf" for his ferocity and masculine facial features.

I took some liberties to spin the names a little - adding NYA (meow in Japanese), NEKO (cat) and KAWAI (cute). Although I am Chinese, I am told by my Japanese friends that these are in fact playful renditions of the names. Futabayama has become Futaba - nya - ma, Taiho Tai-Kawai-ho (be sure to draw out the word Ka-wai to make it sound extra cute) and Chiyonofuji is Chiyo-Nya-Fuij.

On the back of each card, you will see the name of the wrestler, their actual height and weight, their traditional fighting number and a phrase in Japanese - which I will let you figure out. The little paw in the bottom RH corner, that’s a kitty version of rock, paper, scissors a traditional game that kids used to play with the cards. And that little empty box, why that’s where my signature will be! Yes, I am going to hand sign each card - and in the spirit of collectible cards, any pre-sale pins purchased with this campaign will be autographed in a gold ink. All others will be in black.

Why the red line? That is the die line and I create it on the computer.  I like to do it in another color so the printer knows not to print the "red" line.

 

Yokozuna Chiyonofuji with Yoko-neko-zuna Chiyo-nya-fuji pin.

You will receive a lovely enamel Sumo Cat pin (or pins) depending on your perk. Shipping via US first class mail is free anywhere in the US and each and only pre-sale card will be autographed in gold ink!

Production will start when I have raised base funds and it takes 4 - 6 weeks to produce these little guys. So expect your pins in the mail in about 7 weeks around MAY 2017.

Let me know if you have any questions!

MEOWS!

Lynn
