story:
⛰CHANGEABLE PATCHES. INFINITE POSSIBILITIES ⛰

Collections Growing Daily

 

CURRENT PATCH COLLECTIONS (w/ More Drops Constantly)

 

 

We have backpacks too and other apparel coming soon!

 

AS FEATURED ON

 

                                                         
             
    

                        

                                                                

        

LOVE SPORTS? GOT CITY PRIDE? WE HAVE YOU COVERED

 

LIVE BEYOND THE BRIM 

For over a year, we've endeavored to bring you the best-damn-looking hats on the market. Hats made with sustainable materials that allow you to express yourself in whatever manner you please. Our hats and every single one of our patches are made with a commitment to detail that all of us at Canopy try to imbue in all important aspects of our life. We've come to Indiegogo not only to raise funds to finish design and put our goods into production, but also to continue to grow the community of folks who influence our collective growth as a company through their support, creative insights, and feedback. Get a hat, grab some patches, and go push the envelope in the single most comfortable, most aesthetically versatile piece of headwear on the market. 

                                                      

 

                       

MINIMALISM AT ITS FINEST

Canopy's hats are ultra-minimalist, yet adaptable to your evolving passions; they're designed to be the last hats you'll ever need to buy. Our creations feature a low profile, velvety loop on the crown of the hats as well as two strips that go around their entirety so you can place large and small patches anywhere you want. The combination of our unique, Cushfit sweatband fastener means our hat will fit perfectly regardless of head size. 

 

Trucker

Dad Hat

 

 

Flat Brim

 

           

                                                              

FEATURED PATCH COLLECTIONS 

 

1st Row: Coastal Vibes // 405

2nd Row: Word On The Street // Houston, Philly, Atlanta

3rd Row: California Spirit Animals // Dallas, Texas, Denver, Colorado, Miami

4th Row: Outdoor Adventure // Los Angeles, New York, Chicago

5th Row: Marilyn // Oakland, Boston, San Francisco 

COMEDY INTERLUDE WITH JULIEN AND TIM!

(our patches may get you into trouble . . .)

 

 

 

 

HOW TO BUY

1. Pick Your Perk   

2. Pick One of the Hat Styles: Trucker, Dad, OR 5-Panel Flat Brim 

3. Checkout 

4. We’ll Send You A  Form to Pick The Patches You Want, Including the featured collections above, below, and many more to come!  

 

                    

5. Perks Ship August 2019

 

WE MADE A LOT OF FREAKIN PATCHES

 

 

 

LOOKS GREAT ON GUYS AND GIRLS

 

                                  

 

CHANGE A PATCH, MAKE A DIFFERENCE

The fashion industry is putting the world in a tough spot. 

 

 

The smog, the polluted waterways and oceans, the foam lattés, the mounds and mounds of clothes piled up in apparel graveyards around the world, and we're bummed about all of it.

The business of fashion produces 10% of the world's annual carbon emissions, and will soon eclipse the oil and gas industry to become the largest contributor to worldwide pollution.

When you think of fashion, you might not think of hats, but headwear is an $7B market that's built on unnecessary and excessive consumption and production. Where do your old hats go? Trash heaps. Why buy thirty hats when you can have just one? Enter Canopy.

 

RESPONSIBLY SOURCED WITH MATERIALS GOOD FOR YOU AND THE PLANET 

We’ve scoured the globe, tapped all of our resources, and knocked on every door we could find, all with a commitment to bring you beautifully designed hats made from the best materials out there. We are obsessed with finding and making our goods with materials that leave the lightest footprint, last long, and are super comfortable.

 

We’re fighting the fashion's industry polluted tide by incorporating eco-progressive materials that keep our footprint as light as possible.

What’s in…

*  Organic eco twill brim

*  Remnant (leftover) materials wherever we can find them

What’s coming…

*  Snapbacks from recycled plastic bottles

*  Mesh from recycled plastic bottles

What’s out…

*  Poor working conditions

*  Unnecessary waste

*  Uninformed material sourcing

Hazardous working conditions and careless sourcing have no place in the production of your clothing. After all, there’s nothing more personal than what you put on your body. Our materials are comfortable and clean, and the makers we work with meet international standards for exceptional working environments.

 

Additional Hat and Patch Details

*CushFit™ stretch sweatband/snapback combo

*Micro-loop fabric crown for easy, flush patch swapping

*Micro-loop fabric strips for wear of patches on hat sides/back

*One size fits most

*Fully to partial patch embroidery & dye-sublimation for detailed designs

*Low snag micro-hook patch backing to attach flush to Canopy hats

*Patches fit anywhere on Canopy micro-loop fabric                            

 

WHY A BLACK HAT? BECAUSE EVERYONE, AND EVERYTHING LOOKS GOOD IN BLACK 

                                              

 

LOOKS GREAT PATCHLESS TOO

COLLABS

TOP ROW:  WALLSPACE LA // PAUL RENNICK  // SEBASTIAN WALKER

MIDDLE ROW: MELISSA SPENCER // TLC 

BOTTOM ROW: GUERILLA ONE GRAFFITI // SCOTT FROSCHAUER //ADELE JACKSON

CLOCKWISE LEFT TO RIGHT:

ADELE JACKSON // SEBASTIAN WALKER // TLC //SCOTT FROSCHAUER // MELISSA SPENCER

Also special thanks to our partners at:

 

 

THE PERFECT LIFESTYLE COMPANION

Canopy provides you with shade while you ball, skate, eat, or stare longingly into the distance!

 

THE PEOPLE ARE WITH US!

GIVING BACK // billionBricks

Every Hat Purchased Helps to Provide Shelter for Those in Need 

At Canopy, we don't believe that the climb towards success and the act of being philanthropic are mutually exclusive. Furthermore, we don't believe that one need precede the other. To that end, we've made giving back an integral part of our job. 

Our first non-profit partner - billionBricks - is a nimble, innovative organization that provides a variety of shelter solutions for the world's homeless. From transportable shelters built to withstand the harshest of mother nature's environments, to permanent homes with showers, insulation, and wi-fi, billionBricks has taken on the task of ridding the world of homelessness through its creations. A portion of all Canopy hat sales will help to support billionBricks in its mission. For more information on billionBricks and how you can help in the fight against homelessness, please visit www.billionbricks.org.

 

WHO IS CANOPY?

"Our mission is to provide ground-breaking, sustainable, beautifully designed apparel and accessories with modular patches that allow people to share their greatest passions with the world."

We're a small, tight knit family that we hope to see grow along with our collection. We believe in finding joy in both life's triumphs and its struggles, and we're hungry not only for knowledge and experience, but also for continued adventure. We push as far as the line will take us, and, if necessary, we break that line whenever it separates us from we were are and where we're determined to go. For all the athletes and entrepreneurs, free spirits and wild childs, for the kids that grew up, and the adults gazing out that office window, we're here to motivate you and inspire you to grab life by the neck and go beyond the brim.  

JEFF KELLEY, INNOVATION & DESIGN

Jeff is a seasoned entrepreneur and investor focused on catalyzing game-changing ventures.  A West Point grad and former Army officer, Jeff honed is operations and logistics chops while leading troops as part of the 3rd Armored Cavalry Regiment in deployments to Bosnia & Egypt between 1997 and 2002. Thereafter, he sharpened his finance game in the Washington, DC real estate world by way of the Yale School of Management, and he continued to lead people in achieving lofty goals with a meaningful impact on communities. This experience coupled with his passion for building great products let him to various consumer-facing projects, including experiential marketing and helping to pioneer the DC food truck movement, including the largest, ongoing food truck festival called Truckeroo.  He went on to be Co-Founder and COO at the prepared foods company Territory leading several acquisitions and the company’s expansion into 5 major metropolitan markets. He has deep, full circle experience from conception to exit with a knack for leading teams through complex environments to crush their goals.

JOSH KRIGER, GROWTH

Josh is also a veteran entrepreneur with a track record of success creating and scaling startups. He has coached B2C and B2B startups and larger organizations to successful outcomes. As co-founder at Territory Foods, Josh built out the team, decentralized culinary architecture, performance management approach, and supply chain enabling production in over 30 kitchens in 5 metropolitan regions with consistency, quality and taste on the forefront.  He has diverse public and private sector experience, fostering innovation through business development, product development, online growth, partnership strategy, and engagement ranging from event planning to social media. A grad of the College of William and Mary’s business program, he has studied and applied innovation theory and lean startup thinking across many industries and takes a data-driven approach to customer discovery and relationship management.

DELON DE METZ, MARKETING & BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT

Delon de Metz is a strategic marketer with a background in entertainment, technology, and crowdfunding, through which he has taken many successful products and startups to market. His extensive social media, brand identity, digital content creation, and business development experience includes building communities for organizations like IVY and launching crowdfunding campaigns for artists like TLC and e-commerce brands like Keep Pursuing.  Prior to beginning his career in the startup world, Delon studied economics at Harvard University, from which he graduated with honors.

ANDREA BROCKSON, DESIGN ADVISOR

•Hat architect & sourcing expert

• 20 years experience crafting superior headwear & clothing

• Global network of top ethical manufacturing facilities and eco-friendly suppliers

DAVID MELTZER, BUSINESS ADVISOR

David is the CEO of Sports 1 Marketing one of the world’s leading sports & entertainment marketing agencies, which he co-founded with Hall of Fame Quarterback Warren Moon. Prior to S1M, he was CEO of the world’s first smartphone, the PC-E Phone, and later became CEO of the world’s most notable sports agency, Leigh Steinberg Sports and Entertainment.  He is an award-winning humanitarian, an international keynote speaker, best-selling author, Chairman of the Unstoppable Foundation, and is profiled by national publications such as Entrepreneur, Forbes, ESPN, Bloomberg, CNBC, Yahoo, SB Nation and Variety.  


WE’RE ON TRACK TO DELIVER 

 

SHIPPING

U.S. (all 50 states + DC) will be offered $5 shipping unless otherwise noted.  For Canada, a $20 charge applies. 

Orders placed now have a target ship date of August 2019. Actual ship dates may vary.

By backing now, you'll be among the first to experience the comfort, style, innovation and fun that the Canopy’s hats and patches offer.  

 

SHARE #CANOPYHATS WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY!  

 

Still have questions?  Send a message to info@canopyhats.com or post a comment on the page here, if you're a backer, and we'll be happy to help!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Meet the Rouncer SPIRALINA

A Vegetable Spiraliser with 4 settings blade tool to make Spaghetti / julienne & spiral cuts of vegetables for stir-fries, salads or pasta dishes. A spiraliser taken to a whole new level. A must have kitchen gadget for all cooks that want to experience the new vegetable spiralising phenomenon.

With Spiralina, make endless courgetti slices, julienne/spaghetti like strips of vegetables and swirls like round stair cases, ideal for a gluten-free / low-carb / paleo / vegetarian / vegan diet or even just as a creative cooking tool. 

Sturdy design with 2 razor sharp Japanese stainless steel blades. The spiralizer can create two styles of slices from one tool. One setting mode to create julienne/spaghetti like strips or spirals, comes with two tools to, one to make thin and the other to make thicker cuts; and second tool type to create a spiral stair case like swirl or roses of fresh vegetables that look like ribbons. This too comes in two tools enabling thin and thicker cuts.

The Spiral/Spiralizer Slicer enables you conjure up endless Julienne/spaghetti strips and swirls of carrot, zucchini, radish, cucumber, squash and all kinds of other firm vegetables. You can even spiralise Cheese!

Compact and Easy to use with large storage container. This tool is easy to use, clean and stow away. 4 NEW High grade IRON cutting blades provided to make thin or thick swirls/ribbons OR spaghetti / courgetti.

IT'S AS EASY AS SHARPENING A PENCIL, LITERALLY!

A cooking enthusiasts dream to prepare fruits or vegetables in extraordinary presentation, cooked or uncooked. 

About the Product:

With Spiralina, make endless courgetti slices, julienne/spaghetti like strips of vegetables and swirls like round stair cases, ideal for a gluten-free / low-carb / raw food / paleo / vegetarian / vegan diet or even just as a creative cooking tool. 

Sturdy design with 4 intechangeable razor sharp japanese stainless steel blades (In a special secure, no hand cuts design). The spiralizer can create two styles of slices from one tool. Two blades to create thin or thick julienne/spaghetti like strips, and two blades to create thin or thick spiral stair case like swirls or roses of fresh vegetables.

The Spiral/Spiralizer Slicer enables you conjure up endless Julienne/spaghetti strips and swirls of carrot, zucchini, radish, cucumber, rutabagas, turnips, sweet potatoes squash and all kinds of other firm vegetables.

Compact and Easy to use with large storage container. This tool is easy to use, clean and stow away.

Comes with 2 spaghetti like cutter blades 3mm and 6mm, and 2 spiral staircase ribbon like cutter 3mm and 6mm.

NEXT GENERATION SLICER, BIGGER, LESS WASTAGE: This slicer is bigger and more durable than other traditional slicers, bigger size means it can accommodate vegetables up to 5.5 CM in diameter, compared to only 4 - 4.5 CM in the normal spiralizer. 50% less vegetable wastage due to the new deep-penetrating cap design. Use a simple turning motion (just like sharpening a pencil) to instantly turn boring vegetable into irresistible veggie spirals. User friendly and Ergonomic Design

Non-toxic: Built from first-grade, BPA-free ABS food-safe plastic, and 4 ultra-sharp Japanese premium stainless steel blades, guaranteed not to rust or lose sharpness over time. Super easy to use & clean.

A cooking enthusiasts dream to prepare fruits or vegetables in extraordinary presentation, cooked or uncooked. This is Newtonstein's latest design protected and patented kitchen innovation.

Dimensions:  7.7cm Diameter x 18.8cm height.

How to Use:
- Select one of four blade tool inserts and place it in the slot of the tool cover.
- Place the spiralising tool ontop of the storage container, twist to lock.
- Hold a firm vegetable like a carrot, courgette, cucumber or even aubergine vertically over the blade V groove and push down until it is slotted in.
- Rotate the vegetable clockwise to begin pushing it through the blades like a pencil sharpener and that is it!

Within seconds, obtain spaghetti like cuttings or endless spirals of ribbons depending on your choice of blade including whether you chose the thin or thick slicer.  

Contents:
- 1 Spiralina tool
- 1 Large storage container
- 4 Spiral blade inserts, 2 spaghetti blades (3mm & 6mm), 2 spiral blades (3mm & 6mm)
- 1 Hand guard tool
- Recipe booklet,
- Instruction Manual (5 languages, EN, DE, FR, ES, IT)


This is Newtonstein's latest design protected kitchen innovation.

The team that brought you the very successful ROUNCER:https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1593175966/rouncer-no-peeling-5-seconds-onion-dicer-slicer-14/description

The Product:


The art of Spiralising

Spiralina– Form, Function and High Quality

We have designed the Spiralina with quality in mind, a uniquely designed product like nothing else available in the market, a real problem solver and one we believe that will make the world a better place!

The Spiralina was a Rouncer Spin off (our blockbuster kickstarter project that took in over £45,000 in funding).

It will be constructed of the finest materials and created with precision quality. There will also be a money-back guarantee against defects or cancellation. Home and kitchen products have become very popular with consumers looking for new cool and useful products to add to their kitchen gadget list. The Spiralina will become a must have tool for every kitchen just as a knife would be, the ability to save you time and stop tears has been very well accepted by reviewers. 

The Newtonstein Team

Priyesh is the founder of Newtonstein, and is one of the two inventors for this small business. He has run commerce operations and designed bespoke ecommerce systems for marketplace selling. His success came from Retailing before embarking on Newtonstein.com 

Snehal is the vice president of Newtonstein, and a fellow inventor. The dreamer, “we lock him away in a little cupboard and out comes the crazy invention ideas,” he wholly focuses on the next big project. He is a qualified medical professional at the University of East Anglia. His life’s ambition is to develop medical products that will save patient’s lives. 

Mrs. S. Patel has a vast amount of experience in management of start up ventures with knowledge of product development, operations and distribution. 

Mark Perry is our amazing genius! A wizz designer and 3D modeller. A mechanical design engineer with over 15 year’s experience, he produces 2D and 3D solutions for all areas of design and drafting - everything from concept to photo realistic renderings and manufacturing drawings. He is a 6 Sigma, qualified to a Black-Belt level, and has experience in Lean Design including FMEA's, Quality Control Procedures and Lean Manufacturing. 

We work with numerous professionals in addition to our core team to help us manage various aspects of product invention and consumerism for example Video Graphy, Graphic designers, Press and Marketing, prototype engineers, Legal advisors, Accountants and many more. Look out for our other inventions coming soon like the world's first desalination water bottle (ability to drink sea water), a sleek blend and go device and many more amazing inventions (well we like to think so). 

Our other Work: 

 One we have already done is the Intelishake! See it here: bitly.com/intelishake-all 

We already mentioned the Rouncer Multi Kitchen Tool! bitly.com/intelishake-all

Other Ways You Can Help 

Please share the news about our Spiralina. Campaign on your social media pages, and with your cooking organizations, home and kitchen enthusiasts and everyone else you can think of! 

Design Protected:

Our product is design protected worldwide.

Dimensions:  7.7cm Diameter x 18.8cm height.
How to Use: 
- Select one of four blade tool inserts and place it in the slot of the tool cover. 
- Place the spiralising tool ontop of the storage container, twist to lock. 
- Hold a firm vegetable like a carrot, courgette, cucumber or even   
aubergine vertically over the blade V groove and push down until it is  
 slotted in. 
- Rotate the vegetable clockwise to begin pushing it through the blades like a pencil sharpener and that is it! 

Within seconds, obtain spaghetti like cuttings or endless spirals of   
ribbons depending on your choice of blade including whether you chose   
the thin or thick slicer.  
Contents:
- 1 Spiralina tool
- 1 Large storage container
- 4 Spiral blade inserts, 2 spaghetti blades (3mm & 6mm), 2 spiral blades (3mm & 6mm)
- 1 Hand guard tool
- Recipe booklet,
- Instruction Manual (5 languages, EN, DE, FR, ES, IT)This is Newtonstein's latest design protected kitchen innovation.The team that brought you the very successful ROUNCER:https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1593175966/rouncer-no-peeling-5-seconds-onion-dicer-slicer-14/description The Product:The art of Spiralising   Spiralina– Form, Function and High QualityWe
 have designed the Spiralina with quality in mind, a uniquely designed 
product like nothing else available in the market, a real problem solver
 and one we believe that will make the world a better place!The Spiralina was a Rouncer Spin off (our blockbuster kickstarter project that took in over £45,000 in funding).It
 will be constructed of the finest materials and created with precision 
quality. There will also be a money-back guarantee against defects or 
cancellation. Home and kitchen products have become very popular with 
consumers looking for new cool and useful products to add to their 
kitchen gadget list. The Spiralina will become a must have tool for 
every kitchen just as a knife would be, the ability to save you time and
 stop tears has been very well accepted by reviewers. The Newtonstein Team Priyesh is
 the founder of Newtonstein, and is one of the two inventors for this 
small business. He has run commerce operations and designed bespoke 
ecommerce systems for marketplace selling. His success came from 
Retailing before embarking on Newtonstein.com Snehal is
 the vice president of Newtonstein, and a fellow inventor. The dreamer, 
“we lock him away in a little cupboard and out comes the crazy invention
 ideas,” he wholly focuses on the next big project. He is a qualified 
medical professional at the University of East Anglia. His life’s 
ambition is to develop medical products that will save patient’s lives. Mrs. S. Patel has
 a vast amount of experience in management of start up ventures with 
knowledge of product development, operations and distribution. Mark Perry is
 our amazing genius! A wizz designer and 3D modeller. A mechanical 
design engineer with over 15 year’s experience, he produces 2D and 3D 
solutions for all areas of design and drafting - everything from concept
 to photo realistic renderings and manufacturing drawings. He is a 6 
Sigma, qualified to a Black-Belt level, and has experience in Lean 
Design including FMEA's, Quality Control Procedures and Lean 
Manufacturing. We work with numerous professionals in addition to
 our core team to help us manage various aspects of product invention 
and consumerism for example Video Graphy, Graphic designers, Press and 
Marketing, prototype engineers, Legal advisors, Accountants and many 
more. Look out for our other inventions coming soon like the world's 
first desalination water bottle (ability to drink sea water), a sleek 
blend and go device and many more amazing inventions (well we like to 
think so). Our other Work:  One we have already done is the Intelishake! See it here: bitly.com/intelishake-all We already mentioned the Rouncer Multi Kitchen Tool! bitly.com/intelishake-allOther Ways You Can Help Please
 share the news about our Spiralina. Campaign on your social media 
pages, and with your cooking organizations, home and kitchen enthusiasts
 and everyone else you can think of! Design Protected:Our product is design protected worldwide.

story:
Español

Thanks for viewing my project, it will be something big someday, help spread the word on your social networks please.
thank you




Lyon, the first customizable Smart Watch

Coping with the loss of a close friend or relative could be one of the biggest challenges we face. The death of a spouse, sibling, parent or child can cause a particularly deep pain. Overcome this loss takes time, but at some stage can achieve a renewed sense of purpose and direction in life. To overcome this situation every day, one strategy is to ensure the safety of loved ones.

Lyon device means security for you and your family, How ?, With its sophisticated  communication nfc-bluethoot, storage system vital data in emergencies, and current measurement systems vital signs, gives medical staff authorized, all information in real time as you need.

In people who require constant monitoring of vital signs, Lyon device is programmed to to detect any significant changes in vital signs, and immediately alert the authorized medical personnel, to thus act as quickly as possible to stabilize the user and provide and greater security for families.

The main function of Lyon device is useful at all times, since you are born until we die, in any situation, thanks to its system upgrade through external accessories. Your current limit is the knowledge barrier because it uses Android as the base system. One of the considerations that have been taken is that not everyone has access to the latest technology, but that is solved by leaving open framework (program to create new applications for Lyon device) to Lyon device development. Making it possible for all companies and individuals, pioneering technology or not, can freely develop an accessory for the Lyon device, thus adapting to the requirements of users and the market as such.

Its simple design makes it elegant, materials of the highest quality, provides the perfect finishing touch aesthetic that we like in addition to an estimated more than 10 years lifespan.

There are several unmet needs in this area of the market:

First: Constant monitoring of vital signs and provide medical care.

Second: Priority care: patients diagnosed with diseases that require continuous monitoring of vital signs; Identify, prevent and / or mitigate risk factors.

Third: The details of the design are very strict, and product validation environments were controlled by the risk associated with products that interact with people.

Fourth, an important goal of remote monitoring is to decrease the number of patients followed in a hospital. It is noninvasive. Benefit patients and their dependents.

Lyon main function device:

Constantly take your vital signs, for insertion into an algorithm for detecting cardiac or respiratory abnormalities, wherein the device take care of them know the patient is well, or detected a possible anomaly.

By presenting a situation of abnormality as the device is programmed to a previously contracted warn competent medical authority.

When medical unit arrives to check what is happening with a reader-link technology nfc bluetooth authorized, you can get real-time patient data as follows:

1.) Vital Signs.

1.1.) Pulse.

1.2.) Oximetry.

1.3.) Time.

1.4.) Alarm incidents.

1.5.) Temperature

2.) Medical History.

2.1.) Name, ID, emergency contact, blood type, problems Coagulation if owned, Drug Allergies, Diseases, Drugs that are consuming, treatments to which they are submitting, Surgeries performed, Allergies in general .

2.2.) Medical history depending on the patient available.

How will it work? and When?

In a checkup, the doctor will update the Device Lyon, according to the results, and are saved in the device memory, to go gradually filling all the basic information of the user.
Now, imagine this case, something that happens very often, imagine something tragic, something that nobody wants to go, your wife, your mother, your daughter, any woman you love, you are driving and unfortunately for carelessness or a mechanical failure has an accident, truck overturns, achieve out of the vehicle, but her wallet is in the passenger seat.

Ask yourself these two scenarios:

1) without lyon device.

The medical team who arrives at the emergency, have no idea of her identity or emergency contact number, treatments to which this submitting, allergies, clotting problems, if she is consuming drugs or not, must wait for connecting all medical instruments to monitor vital signs. It is a bit slow and arduous process. And with the desire to save a life, many things can happen. And even more with lack of information about her.
2) with lyon device.
Emergency personnel arrive, Lyon touch the device with an authorized reader nfc, and in the display of this reader, all relevant data will appear:

- Pulse.

- Oximetry.

- Time.

- Name, ID, emergency contact, blood type, problems Coagulation if owned, Drug Allergies, Diseases, Drugs that are consuming, treatments to which they are submitting, Surgeries performed, Allergies in general .

they have all the information they need and her signs in real time, with just a touch.


3) Plus its accessories (years old):


3.1) Persons who require constant monitoring of vital signs, prevention and monitoring. To imply that the product provides a constant assurance regarding the health of the user. (50 -....).

3.2) With the office accessory can be monitored from the wrist: calendar, emails, updates united people, have access to the cloud, and all android market applications supported, so that each device is Lyon sole. Without losing the security provided regarding health. (40-50)



3.3.) With the accessory undertake, you can see the latest updates regarding trends, recent business statistics, aid programs employer, job boards and classifieds, listings of banks with the lowest interest rates, and everything that android market offers. (30-40).

3.4.) You will support andriod allowing the use of all applications developed for the same, serving as entertainment, information, study, job listings, access to files in the cloud, fitness, social networks, etc. (20-30)

3.5.) Multimedia. Based on your operating system, device Lyon has many applications focused on entertainment and leisure, but thanks to an agreement with a company in Bogota Parquesoft who provide us with resources in this area to change not left alone here may also have educational software of them free publicity. (10-20)


3.6.) A device which will allow issuing alarms prevention when the user is in areas of concern will be taken, there will also be a device with microphone and speaker so you always hear the baby, and when he grows up to be a good resource for a greater parental accompaniment. (0-10)


There is also the Lyon sport, designed for those who want solely to constantly monitor your vital signs.

Lyon Device Sport


A small description

For everyone:


My story:

this is me:


He was my father:

He suffered a disease called ALS

The day he died, a device as lyon had given me one maybe two more days with him, is more a few more minutes to say goodbye, I would be happy with it, but fate is cruel, at first glance looked like a day like any other, but his body, according to medical staff wearing failing for hours, something we could not detect, so that day I started to design what took me a couple of years: Lyon, efficient and economical device useful for these cases, especially for low-income families like mine, I come to you to ask for funds and so to develop my project and maybe someday, my goal that every person in the world carries a Lyon for your safety and peace of your family can be made it is the hardest blow of my life, not to say some last words to my father, because the instruments to monitor their vital signs are very expensive. We lost the course of technology, which initially was to facilitate and make life safer, now just luxury and capitalism. Help me change a little this, contribute a bit to this cause, with your support will do my greatest effort to provide security to the families of the world.


if you want more info, send me an email to: andresfp9210@gmail.com

Thanks for your attention and your collaboration.

Español:

gracias por ver mi proyecto, se que será algo grande algún día, ayudame a difundirlo en tus redes sociales por favor.

gracias



Sobrellevar la pérdida de un amigo cercano o un familiar podría ser uno de los mayores retos que podemos enfrentar. La muerte de la pareja, un hermano, un padre o un hijo puede causar un dolor especialmente profundo. Superar esta pérdida toma tiempo, pero en alguna etapa se puede alcanzar un renovado sentido de propósito y dirección en la vida. Para superar cada día esta situación, una estrategia es velar por la seguridad de los seres queridos. 

Lyon device significa seguridad para ti y tu familia, ¿Cómo?, Gracias a su comunicación nfc-bluethoot,  su sofisticado sistema de almacenamiento de datos vitales en casos de emergencia, y sus sistemas de medición de signos vitales actuales, le brinda al personal médico autorizado, toda la información en tiempo real que necesite. 

En personas que requieran monitoreo constante de sus signos vitales, Lyon device está programado para al detectar cualquier cambio significativo en sus signos vitales, y alertar inmediatamente al personal médico autorizado, para que de esta manera actúen lo más rápido posible para estabilizar al usuario y brindar así mayor seguridad a las familias.

La principal función de Lyon device, es ser útil en todo momento, desde que naces hasta que mueres, en cualquier situación, gracias a su sistema de actualización mediante accesorios externos. Su límite actual es la barrera de conocimiento debido a que usa android como sistema base. Una de las consideraciones que se han tomado es que, no todos tenemos acceso a la tecnología más reciente, pero eso se soluciona al dejar abierto el framework (programa para crear nuevas aplicaciones para Lyon device) de desarrollo para Lyon device. Haciendo posible que todas las compañías y personas, pioneras o no en tecnología, puedan desarrollar libremente un accesorio para Lyon device, adaptándose así a los requerimientos de los usuarios y del mercado como tal.

Su diseño simple, lo hace elegante, sus materiales de la más alta calidad, le proporciona ese toque estético de acabado perfecto que tanto nos gusta además de tener una vida útil estimada de mas de 10 años.


Hay varias necesidades por satisfacer en este ámbito del mercado:

Primera: Monitoreo constante de los signos vitales y facilitar la asistencia médica. 

Segunda: Atención prioritaria: pacientes con diagnóstico de enfermedades que requieren continuo monitoreo de los signos vitales; Identificar, evitar y/o atenuar factores de riesgo.

Tercera: Las precisiones del diseño son muy estrictas, y los ambientes de validación del producto fueron controlados, por el riesgo asociado a productos que interactúan con las personas.

Cuarta: un importante objetivo del monitoreo a distancia es disminuir el número de pacientes en seguimiento en un centro hospitalario. No es invasivo. Beneficiaría a los pacientes y a los familiares a su cargo.

Función principal Lyon device:

Tomará constantemente los signos vitales del paciente, para introducirlo en un algoritmo de detección de anomalías cardiacas o respiratorias, donde el dispositivo se encargara de hacerle saber al paciente que está bien, o se ha detectado una posible anomalía.

Al presentarse una situación de anomalía según este programado el dispositivo se avisara a una autoridad médica competente previamente contratada.

Cuando llega la unidad médica, a revisar que es lo que está pasando, con un lector de tecnología de enlace nfc-bluetooth autorizada, podrá obtener en tiempo real los siguientes datos del paciente:

1.) Signos vitales.

  1.1.) Pulso.

  1.2.) Oximetría.

  1.3.) Hora.

  1.4.) Alarma de incidentes.

  1.5.) Temperatura

2.) Historial Médico.

  2.1.) Nombre, Identificación, Contacto de emergencia, Tipo de sangre, problemas de Coagulación si es que se poseen, Alergias a medicamentos, Enfermedades, Medicamentos que se estén consumiendo, Tratamientos a los cuales se está sometiendo, Cirugías realizadas, Alergias en general.

2.2.) Historias Clínicas por categoría según el paciente disponga.

Como funciona? y cuando?

En un control médico, el doctor, va a actualizar el Lyon Device, según los resultados, y se van guardando en la memoria del dispositivo, para ir completando poco a poco toda la información básica del usuario.

Ahora, imagina este caso, algo que sucede muy a menudo, imagina algo trágico, algo por lo que nadie quiere pasar, tu esposa, tu mama, tu hija, cualquier mujer que ames, va conduciendo y desafortunadamente por un descuido o un fallo mecánico, tiene un accidente, el carro vuelca, logran sacarla del vehículo, pero su billetera, queda en la silla de copiloto.

Plantéate estos dos escenarios:

1) Sin lyon device.

No tienen ni idea de su identidad, ni numero de contacto de emergencia, tratamientos a los cuales se este sometiendo, alergias,

 problemas de coagulacion, medicamentos que ella esta consumiendo, deben esperar a conectar todo el instrumental medico para monitorear sus signos vitales.

Es un proceso algo lento y arduo. Y con el afan de salvar una vida, pueden suceder muchas cosas. Y mas aun con falta de informacion acerca de ella.

2) Con lyon device.

Llega el personal de emergencias, tocas el dispositivo Lyon con un lector de nfc autorizado, y en la pantalla de este lector, aparecerán todos los datos competentes:

- Pulso.

- Oximetría.

- Tiempo.

- Nombre, ID, contactos de emergencia, tipo de sangre, problemas de coagulación en caso de propiedad, Alergias a medicamentos, enfermedades, drogas que consumen, los tratamientos a los que se están presentando, cirugías realizadas, alergias en general.

Ellos tienen todos los datos que necesitan y sus signos en tiempo real, con tan solo un toque.


3) Ademas de sus accesorios: (Edad) 


3.1.) Personas que requieren un Monitoreo constante de sus signos vitales: prevención y supervisión. Dar a entender que el producto brinda una seguridad constante en cuanto a la salud del usuario. (50-....).

3.2.) Con el accesorio de oficina se podrá monitorear desde la muñeca: la agenda, los correos, las actualizaciones de estados de las personas, tendrá acceso a la nube, y a todas las aplicaciones de android market soportadas, para que cada Lyon device sea único.  Sin perder la seguridad que brinda en cuanto a la salud. (40-50)


3.3.) Con el accesorio emprender, se podrán ver las últimas actualizaciones en cuanto a  tendencias, estadísticas empresariales recientes, programas de ayuda al empresario, bolsas de empleo y anuncios clasificados, listados de bancos con las tasas más bajas de intereses, y todo lo que android market ofrece. (30-40).

3.4.) Tendrá compatibilidad con andriod lo que permite la utilización de todas las aplicaciones desarrolladas para ese mismo, prestando servicios como entretenimiento, información de estudio, listas de trabajo, acceso a archivos en la nube, fitness, redes sociales, etc. (20-30)

3.5.) Multimedia. Partiendo de su sistema operativo, Lyon device cuenta con innumerables aplicaciones enfocadas al entretenimiento y ocio, pero no se queda solo acá también puede tener software educativo, gracias a un convenio con una empresa en parquesoft Bogota quienes nos proveerán de recursos en esta área a cambio de hacerles publicidad gratuita.  (10-20)


3.6.) Se tendrá un dispositivo el cual permitirá emitir alarmas de prevención cuando el usuario se encuentre en zonas de posible riesgo, también habrá un dispositivo con micrófono y un parlante para que siempre escuches al bebé, y cuando crezca será un buen recurso para un mayor acompañamiento paternal. (0-10)



Además, existe el Lyon sport, diseñado para aquellas personas que lo quieran única y exclusivamente para monitorear constantemente sus signos vitales. 
Lyon Device Sport

Una pequeña descripción: 

Hay para todos los gustos:

Mi historia:

Este soy yo:


El era mi padre:

El sufrió una enfermedad llamada ELA (Esclerosis Lateral Amiotrófica )

El día que el murió, un dispositivo como el Lyon me hubiese regalado uno quizás dos días mas junto a él, es más unos minutos más para despedirme, con eso yo sería feliz, pero el destino es cruel, a simple vista parecía un día como cualquier otro, pero su organismo, según personal médico llevaba fallando por horas, algo que no pudimos detectar, así que ese día empecé a diseñar lo que me llevo un par de años:  Lyon, un dispositivo eficiente económico y útil para estos casos, especialmente para familias de bajos recursos como la mía, acudo a ustedes para pedir fondos y así poder desarrollar mi proyecto y quizás algún día, mi meta de que cada persona en el mundo porte un Lyon para su seguridad y la tranquilidad de su familia pueda verse realizada, es el golpe más duro de mi vida, no poder decirle unas últimas palabras a mi padre, porque los instrumentos para monitorear sus signos vitales son muy caros. Hemos perdido el curso de la tecnología, algo que inicialmente era para facilitar y hacer la vida más segura, ahora solo es lujo y capitalismo. Ayúdame a cambiar un poco esto, aportar un granito de arena a esta causa, con su apoyo hare mi mas grande esfuerzo para aportar seguridad a las familias del mundo.

Si quieres más información, envíame un correo electrónico a: andresfp9210@gmail.com

Gracias por tu atención y tu colaboración.

así mayor seguridad a las familias.
La
principal función de Lyon device, es ser útil en todo momento, desde que naces
hasta que mueres, en cualquier situación, gracias a su sistema de actualización
mediante accesorios externos. Su límite actual es la barrera de conocimiento
debido a que usa android como sistema base. Una de las consideraciones que se
han tomado es que, no todos tenemos acceso a la tecnología más reciente, pero
eso se soluciona al dejar abierto el framework (programa para crear nuevas
aplicaciones para Lyon device) de desarrollo para Lyon device. Haciendo posible
que todas las compañías y personas, pioneras o no en tecnología, puedan
desarrollar libremente un accesorio para Lyon device, adaptándose así a los
requerimientos de los usuarios y del mercado como tal. 
Su diseño
simple, lo hace elegante, sus materiales de la más alta calidad, le proporciona
ese toque estético de acabado perfecto que tanto nos gusta además de tener una
vida útil estimada de mas de 10 años.
Hay varias necesidades por satisfacer en este ámbito del mercado:
Primera: Monitoreo constante de los signos vitales y facilitar la asistencia médica. 
Segunda: Atención prioritaria: pacientes con diagnóstico de enfermedades que requieren continuo monitoreo de los signos vitales; Identificar, evitar y/o atenuar factores de riesgo.
Tercera: Las precisiones del diseño son muy estrictas, y los ambientes de validación del producto fueron controlados, por el riesgo asociado a productos que interactúan con las personas.
Cuarta: un importante objetivo del monitoreo a distancia es disminuir el número de pacientes en seguimiento en un centro hospitalario. No es invasivo. Beneficiaría a los pacientes y a los familiares a su cargo.
Función principal Lyon device:
Tomará constantemente los signos vitales del paciente, para introducirlo
en un algoritmo de detección de anomalías cardiacas o respiratorias, donde el
dispositivo se encargara de hacerle saber al paciente que está bien, o se ha
detectado una posible anomalía.
Al presentarse una situación de anomalía según este programado el
dispositivo se avisara a una autoridad médica competente previamente
contratada.
Cuando llega la unidad médica, a revisar que es lo que está pasando, con
un lector de tecnología de enlace nfc-bluetooth autorizada, podrá obtener en
tiempo real los siguientes datos del paciente:
1.) Signos vitales.
  1.1.) Pulso.
  1.2.) Oximetría.
  1.3.) Hora.
  1.4.) Alarma de
incidentes.
  1.5.) Temperatura
2.) Historial Médico.
  2.1.) Nombre, Identificación,
Contacto de emergencia, Tipo de sangre, problemas de Coagulación si es que se
poseen, Alergias a medicamentos, Enfermedades, Medicamentos que se estén
consumiendo, Tratamientos a los cuales se está sometiendo, Cirugías realizadas,
Alergias en general.
2.2.) Historias
Clínicas por categoría según el paciente disponga.
Como funciona? y cuando?
En un control médico, el doctor, va a actualizar el Lyon
Device, según los resultados, y se van guardando en la memoria del dispositivo,
para ir completando poco a poco toda la información básica del usuario.
Ahora, imagina este caso, algo que sucede muy a menudo,
imagina algo trágico, algo por lo que nadie quiere pasar, tu esposa, tu mama,
tu hija, cualquier mujer que ames, va conduciendo y desafortunadamente por un
descuido o un fallo mecánico, tiene un accidente, el carro vuelca, logran
sacarla del vehículo, pero su billetera, queda en la silla de copiloto.
Plantéate estos dos escenarios:
1) Sin lyon device.
No tienen ni idea de su identidad, ni numero de contacto
de emergencia, tratamientos a los cuales se este sometiendo, alergias,
 problemas de
coagulacion, medicamentos que ella esta consumiendo, deben esperar a conectar
todo el instrumental medico para monitorear sus signos vitales.
Es un proceso algo lento y arduo. Y con el afan de salvar
una vida, pueden suceder muchas cosas. Y mas aun con falta de informacion
acerca de ella.
2) Con lyon device.
Llega el personal de emergencias, tocas el dispositivo Lyon
con un lector de nfc autorizado, y en la pantalla de este lector, aparecerán
todos los datos competentes:
- Pulso.
- Oximetría.
- Tiempo.
- Nombre, ID, contactos de emergencia, tipo de sangre,
problemas de coagulación en caso de propiedad, Alergias a medicamentos,
enfermedades, drogas que consumen, los tratamientos a los que se están
presentando, cirugías realizadas, alergias en general.
Ellos tienen todos los datos que necesitan y sus signos en
tiempo real, con tan solo un toque.
3) Ademas de sus accesorios: (Edad) 3.1.) Personas que
requieren un Monitoreo constante de sus signos vitales: prevención y supervisión. Dar a entender que el producto brinda
una seguridad constante en cuanto a la salud del usuario. (50-....).
3.2.) Con el
accesorio de oficina se podrá monitorear desde la muñeca: la agenda, los
correos, las actualizaciones de estados de las personas, tendrá acceso a la
nube, y a todas las aplicaciones de android market soportadas, para que cada Lyon
device sea único.  Sin perder la seguridad que brinda en cuanto a la salud.
(40-50)

3.3.) Con el accesorio emprender, se podrán ver las últimas
actualizaciones en cuanto a  tendencias,
estadísticas empresariales recientes, programas de ayuda al empresario, bolsas
de empleo y anuncios clasificados, listados de bancos con las tasas más bajas
de intereses, y todo lo que android market ofrece. (30-40).
3.4.) Tendrá
compatibilidad con andriod lo que permite la utilización de todas las
aplicaciones desarrolladas para ese mismo, prestando servicios como
entretenimiento, información de estudio, listas de trabajo, acceso a archivos
en la nube, fitness, redes sociales, etc. (20-30)
3.5.) Multimedia. Partiendo de su sistema operativo, Lyon device cuenta
con innumerables aplicaciones enfocadas al entretenimiento y ocio, pero no se
queda solo acá también puede tener software educativo, gracias a un convenio
con una empresa en parquesoft Bogota quienes nos proveerán de recursos en esta
área a cambio de hacerles publicidad gratuita. 
(10-20)

3.6.) Se tendrá un
dispositivo el cual permitirá emitir alarmas de prevención cuando el usuario se
encuentre en zonas de posible riesgo, también habrá un dispositivo con
micrófono y un parlante para que siempre escuches al bebé, y cuando crezca será
un buen recurso para un mayor acompañamiento paternal. (0-10)
Además, existe el Lyon sport, diseñado para aquellas personas que lo quieran única y exclusivamente para monitorear constantemente sus signos vitales. Lyon Device Sport


Una pequeña descripción: 


Hay para todos los gustos:





Mi historia:
Este soy yo:

El era mi padre:

El sufrió una enfermedad llamada ELA (Esclerosis Lateral Amiotrófica )

El día que el murió, un dispositivo como el Lyon me hubiese
regalado uno quizás dos días mas junto a él, es más unos minutos más para
despedirme, con eso yo sería feliz, pero el destino es cruel, a simple vista parecía
un día como cualquier otro, pero su organismo, según personal médico llevaba
fallando por horas, algo que no pudimos detectar, así que ese día empecé a
diseñar lo que me llevo un par de años:  Lyon, un dispositivo eficiente económico
y útil para estos casos, especialmente para familias de bajos recursos como la mía,
acudo a ustedes para pedir fondos y así poder desarrollar mi proyecto y quizás algún
día, mi meta de que cada persona en el mundo porte un Lyon para su seguridad y
la tranquilidad de su familia pueda verse realizada, es el golpe más duro de mi
vida, no poder decirle unas últimas palabras a mi padre, porque los
instrumentos para monitorear sus signos vitales son muy caros. Hemos perdido el
curso de la tecnología, algo que inicialmente era para facilitar y hacer la
vida más segura, ahora solo es lujo y capitalismo. Ayúdame a cambiar un poco
esto, aportar un granito de arena a esta causa, con su apoyo hare mi mas grande
esfuerzo para aportar seguridad a las familias del mundo.
Si quieres más información, envíame un correo electrónico a: andresfp9210@gmail.com
Gracias por tu atención y tu colaboración.

story:
The Brand

We're an independent brand & design studio based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. We produce collection of leather bag, briefcase and upscale accessories with the finest quality workmanship & materials.


What we do for people:

  • Quality: Finest leather & exceptional craftsmanship.
  • Fair Price: We work directly with our manufacturer to cut out all the middlemen, PR firms, so we’re able to offer our bags at a great value.
  • Design: Unique is the result from sense of minimalist. Your satisfaction is our final goal. 



Our approach

  • We have designing our collection, searching for the suitable leather and hardware since last year. Now we have received final prototypes and ready to start production. With your help to meet the minimum order quantity ($25,000) for our custom leather from the tannery and begin production.
  • We are offering our very first collection at almost 40% discount to our Indiegogo supporters. Please note: Duffel bag, and briefcase come with an adjustable, leather shoulder strap (up to 50 inches).


The Project

  • Like how other did: with the vision of producing high quality and reasonably priced leather products by cutting out the middleman.  

  • We aims to create this collection that's in keeping with our design identity; simple understated styling, classic looks, durable yet practical.  



Material / Production

  • We will deal directly with every supplier ourselves to minimize all the risks could happen like delays in materials and production. With the help of Indiegogo community, we hope we will make this project success.
  • We will keep you updated about the production; communicate frequently and openly with you, so please support this project with confidence.


Founder


Production Schedule

Mid of June - End of the campaign
First of July - Order leather
Mid of July - Start making the bags
Mid of August - Quality Control (QC)
End of August - Quality Control (QC) II
First of September - Packing & Shipping

story:
What is MotivationBelt®?

It is powerful, it is beautiful, simple and a very helpful product!



is the first fashion and diagnostic product in the World.


MotivationBelt® support you with the motivation scale day after day to keep your waist values ​​in view and react instantly to changes.

MotivationBelt® main feature is, that it influences the person behaving due to its subconscious reaction following the measurement result by taking the MotivationBelt® on.

MotivationBelt® is made from Genuine Leather, in several beautiful colours, in generally needed lengths, it has anti-allergic silver buckle that is packed in luxury package.


MotivationBelt® is available in several lenghts from 22 to 60 inch (56 to 152 cm) to fit any person feeling responsibility for his/her health and body shape.


Sizes:

71 – 56 cm I 28 – 22 inch

81 – 66 cm I 32 – 26 inch

91 – 76 cm I 36 – 30 inch

101 – 86 cm I 40 – 34 inch

112 – 96 cm I 44 – 38 inch

122 - 106 cm I 48 – 42 inch

132 – 117 cm I 52 – 46 inch

142 – 127 cm I 56 – 50 inch

152 – 137 cm I 60 – 54 inch

162 – 147 cm I 64 – 58 inch

172 – 157 cm I 68 – 62 inch

182 – 167 cm I 72 – 66 inch

All curent sizes are 4cm hight and are UNISEX.

- MotivationalBelt has motivational slogan on the back of it's belt, this helps to keep on track.

- We are prepared to vary slogan in time, which is commercially interesting. Creates a collection of slogans to increase fun and interest.

“- MotivationalBelt is available in several colours and sizes. This helps fitting to any day dress code.

- It is made out of genuine leather, processing is exceptional, therefore it looks exquisitely.

- Each piece is unique – produced by Hand made system.

-Originally produced in the EU, which ensures excellent workmanship.

Fitness centers have to face such arguments as:



As we know, it is not weird, because weight reduction is a process that involves physical activity that - putting it into simple terms - burning fat and building muscles.

Next comes our favorite question:



Usually, the client says:



If the clients carried a measuring tape, they would be able to check their measurements and verify that everything is proceeding successfully as planned. Of course, it is rather inconvenient to carry a measuring tape around in your pocket or handbag.

For this purpose, we have created the MotivationBelt®, which has on its inner side a scale, booth in centimeters and inches, so that clients may comfortably follow how their waist size is diminishing day after day.





                      


Daily feedback (visual check of the size of their waistline) reminds clients of their objective, namely, their desire to lose weight. 

         

                  


                                              



We Need Your Help now

Developing cutting edge technology isn't easy, and it's also very costly/time intensive. With your support, we can finally hit mass production and meet the factory's minimum order quantities. We choose our manufacturing partner based on their long track record of producing .


Current Progress: We already have final versions of MotivationBelts. The overall build is excellent and identical to what would be the mass produced version.

Manufacturing Production Plan in Europa: A large cash outlay is always required to start production. High quality Leather need to be purchased upfront. With the support of the Indiegogo community, we can finalize our designs and start manufacturing.


The Final Product: Latest in December we will send the first MotivationBelts to our supporters.


Thank you!

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. 

Please share our project thgrough Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!


If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at 

info@motivationbelt.com


For Press Inquiries contact press@motivationbelt.com

PRESS-KIT

story:
Summary 

 

Materials

  •  Ultradense Ripstop PU - Entire exterior.
  •  Vegan Microfiber Leather - Edges, handles, bottom and pinch points

 

Main Features

 

  •  Shoe Pocket - Waterproof and vented
  •  Laptop Pocket - Fits up to 15" laptops
  •  Outer Slip Pocket - Carry your wallet
  •  Passport Pocket - Protected from RFID
  •  Small Interior Zip Pocket - Carry small items
  •  Outer Side Pocket - Quick access to a notebook
  •  Dual Zip Interior Wall - Carry larger items in the side

 

  •  Microfiber Handles - Evenly distributed and ergonomic
  •  Fortified Base - Custom studs to keep your bag dry
  •  Custom Zippers - Built from Stainless Steel 
  •  Inner Anti-Scruff Fabric - Keep your things secure
  •  Cabin Bag Friendly - Fits all cabin allowances

 

 

  •  Shoulder Strap - Made with your comfort in mind
  •  Cushioned Padding - Evenly distributed weight loading
  •  Easy Access Clips - Easy to remove and store

 

 

Dimensions

 

Weight: 1kg       Capacity: 45L

Width: 55cm     Height: 40cm     Depth: 20cm

Fits every small carry-on cabin allowance 

(Including strict Ryanair allowances)

Our project was featured on the Backers Only Newsletter and we’d like to invite you to join its growing community of Kickstarter and Indiegogo backers - You'll receive exclusive access to amazing Early Bird offers and freebies delivered right to your inbox. Click here to subscribe.

story:
We present to your attention an innovative reusable mask MyMSQ with a replaceable filter.

The experience of our designers made it possible to create mask  MyMSQ  with an ideal obturation line. 

This allowed to create a universal model, convenient for anyone adult.

To learn more about MyMSQ mask click on the video.

MyMSQ - The new generation of reusable protective masks.

The MyMSQ mask is designed to provide comfort and serve you for a long time.                            Lightweight (23 g) makes the process of operation as comfortable as possible. 

 

 

 

Transparent mask MyMSQ

We have created a transparent mask MyMSQ. It works completely with Face ID.

 

You choose the protection class from FFP1 to FFP3 yourself. 

Changing the external filter allows you to do this in a few seconds.

 

You no longer need to buy and wear disposable masks. All you have to do is to change the filter. We care about nature. Our filters are made of natural materials, so they don't pollute the environment.

Filter replacing allows you to save up on disposable masks. The filters are designed for using with on MyMSQ reusable masks. Our filters can be used in everyday life, in manufacturing and healthcare facilities. The filter is changed as it gets wet.

 

Breathe in harmony with nature

Our filter range includes herbal substances. You can choose any of the presented fragrances. This will allow you to enjoy a pleasant aroma and not breathe in polluted air. And for those of you who just want to breathe in pure air, we have a regular filter too.

 

Forget foggy glasses

Thanks to polypropylene and a snug fit to the face, the glasses are prevented from fogging, unlike traditional cloth and surgical masks.

Protects against what ?

Our reusable mask will be practikal to everyone. Wearing it comfortably every day will help you protect your lungs from harmful particles in the air.

 

 

Polypropylene does not lose its properties in long-term usage. The mask will not only serve you for years but will also reduce the number of disposable waste.
Easy to clean in water, resistant to disinfection and sterilization.

The reusable mask is easy to disinfect in the microwave. Just put the mask without a filter in the microwave and turn it on. The microwave allows you to heat the mask up to 100 degrees. COVID-19 is dies at + 70°C. You will be protected and can use the mask again as intended.

 

Our Mask. Your Brand

We have paid great attention to the place for your brand on the mask. Your brand can be positioned on two sides. It will be seen by everyone, regardless of which direction you turn your head. Now you don't need to say where you work. Your mask will speak for you.

You can order a mask with a corporate color and your logo. Each of your employees can become the face of your brand.

 

Packages of 50 and 100 items are available. But you can always write to us and order a large batch.

 

We have done a lot of work to be ready to create a universal reusable protective mask. Take a look at how we made it.

START PRODUCTION

We have done a great job of preparing for the production and manufacturing of all the necessary molds. Now we need your help for the serial production of the MyMSQ masks. With your help, we can protect the planet's population from harmful pollutants, and we can protect the planet itself from an oversupply of used disposable masks.

story:
We know your days are full of activities, and that every day is a completely different story. Your activities change, your needs change; and, through time, even you change. 
Your backpack always comes along with you, but it isn't ready to keep up with your changing needs and tastes.


That's why you need your own TOK.




TOK is a versatile backpack created with a unique assembly system, that allows you to easily add and remove additional components. 

[Patent pending]

                 


TOKs are designed to fit your basic needs:    

               


1.  TOK Large Component if you need an extra set of clothes to work out.

                2. TOK Small Component if you need to carry your lunch for a long day.

               



After months of research and thousands of sketches, we came up with the best design you could imagine.  It doesn't matter what you do, your TOK will be there with you!

                    

[All the components were carefully designed to be securely attached to the Basic TOK.]





   

Some TOK components can be used individually!




The best thing is that you can mix and match your TOK to make it unique, just like you! You can even change your TOK depending on how you feel everyday!







  • No more having to buy different backpacks for different activities.

  • No more changing your whole backpack just because one tiny part
     of it is ripped.

  • No more having the same old, boring backpack every single day.

  • No more carrying a big backpack full of stuff you don’t need




We are seven Costa Rican students that dream of making TOK a reality. We need at least $15.000 to make this project come true. Even a single dollar can make a significant difference!


*Does not include the money that we will invest on your perks.




We know the impact that we can have on education. That’s why getting involved with schools is so important for us, even during our early stages. 

We want our products to help students go through every single activity that they have in a better and easier way. If you help us reach our goals, we will be able to donate TOKs to a local school called Escuela Mauro Fernández.

Education has always been a key for progress here in Costa Rica. We want to start making a difference in education right now. 






Your contribution is greatly appreciated. And you can also help us go viral! 

                                                                                                                                                     

                                                          TOK FACEBOOK PAGE



We offer all kinds of perks to thank you for every single dollar that you give TOK.

Right now, TOKs are only available through contributions to our campaign. You can pre-order your package on the right side of this page.

You can contribute $30 to our campaign now through this perk, and will receive a $30 gift card redeemable on any TOK Products available on our TOK Online Store, when we open it in early 2015.


 If you want to pre-order a TOK now, these are the options that you can choose from:

  • We will email you when the campaign is finished so you can select your TOK combination*
  • Click here for more info on this perk.

  • Chosen from our 2015 TOK Collection. 
  • We will email you when the campaign is finished so you can select your TOK combination*
  • Click here for more info on this perk.

  



  • Basic TOK + Large Component + Small Component.

  • We will email you when the campaign is finished so you can select your TOK combination*
  • Click here for more info on this perk
 



  • More than 20% Off Value!

  • We will email you when the campaign is finished so you can select your TOK combination*
  • Click here for more info on this perk

story: "RETIRE THE WIRES" and change the WAY you listen to Audio!!
story_txt:
"RETIRE THE WIRES" and change the WAY you listen to Audio!!In development our company Rootz Technology has created a prototype of an over-the-ear wireless, Bluetooth headphone complete with a built in 8GB Android device titled the SLD (Smart Listening Device). It is the world’s 1st full-size Smart headset that comes with an Android internal operating system allowing users to download their favorite media files directly to their Headset, and hold conversations via Bluetooth/Wi-Fi. NEVER again will a consumer be tangled up in wires or be out of reach of good music! 
Key Features:
(Live footage of Android Interface and Video Playback)
-Included with internal apps (e-Book reader, FM Radio, etc)
- Built-in Pedometer to track exercise & steps
- Audio-In Aux. Jack for those who still want the "Wired" option
- Transfer files USB
- Built In GPS
- Download your Favorite Apps via Google Play Market
- Stream Music Wireless via Bluetooth/Wi-Fi
- built in Internal Microphones for Phone Calls and Skype Conversations
- 16GB Internal Memory (Multiple Storage Levels Coming Soon)
Battery (expected)

Play time 8 hours
Standby time 200 hours
Charging time less than 1 hour
Charging: USB 
Type: Lithium Battery  
**Your pledge will help us deliver a friendly and discrete assistant that will enhance real life experiences. Buying devices that would equal the functions of The Smart Listening Device will set you back at least 600$.The Story of our ProgressWe were the First students with a patent from Jackson State.2013* 1st Student from Jackson State University to receive a patent while being currently enrolled.* Created 1stFull-Size Bluetooth Headphone* Sold 200 Units in 2 months and grossed over $40K through college campuses2014* Beats By Dreflooded the market w/ Bluetooth Headphones2015* In response, We started a new company (Moor Industries) & created the* SMART Headphone!WHY WE NEED HELP FROM INDIEGOGO:Since we have successfully proven our concept through multiple test trials we need help from IndieGoGo to create our final "manufacturing mold" design, and really bring our product to market with our own original style! Our Industrial Team has designed a Headset design that is truly unique! Not only do we have Technology Advancements, but a beautiful look as well! Help us bring the Dream to life and create Moor jobs for our community.

story:
Hello members of Indiegogo community and visitors,

My name is Ginika I. Chukwujama from Bologna Italy, a 31-year-old Italian designer. I have experienced the nightmare of losing my full-time job. I want to turn this misfortune into an opportunity and realize a longtime dream of running my own designer clothing company.

Realizing the instability of the European economic situation, I, Ginika have planned ahead, saving enough money to create a designing company (Ginik). I have obtained a registered trademark and produced a designer line of ladies' handbags and shoes, all made of pure quality Italian leather.

"These items are of extremely high quality. They compare favorably with the top name brands, such as Gucci, Dolce and Gabbana, and others. We have great products."

What I'm lacking is the financial backing and distribution capabilities of the "big boys." I currently have a license to sell on-line but I would also like to establish a bricks-and-mortar storefront, where I can market my leather goods.

I estimate my start-up costs to be around $550,000. This would cover a store license, leasing and development as well as website development, manufacturing, marketing and shipping. In order to generate this capital, I have launched an Indiegogo campaign on here. This page includes a sample photo of the Ginik handbag and shoes in gallery. 

Donations of any amount are welcome. For a $250 contribution, I will customize two Ginik products with the donor's personal name on top as the official sponsor. In addition, the contributor will receive two Ginik items with the donor's name imprinted on each item.

"I'm hoping that members of the Indiegogo community will help make my dream come true. I'm counting on this great community to provide encouragement and financial support in order to make my products available both on-line and in my own physical store. I'd really like to see the Ginik line available in the United States and other parts of the world."

Thank you for your precious time and kindness!!!

story:
About Novacy

Based in Paris, the world capital of fashion, Novacy is a brand that has made its marks in the world of high-tech luxury products. Novacy imposes its style and its know-how with respect for a tradition where the quality, perfection and elegance are the secrets of the marque by highlighting the craftsmanship.

Passionate about products of modern technology as well leather goods, the founders of Novacy have been able to bring together two domains of expertise by developing luxury products with elegant designs. The brand is designed to transform work and leisure products into unique articles and allow its owner to assert its social success.

The products are developed by the best French craftsmen specialized in leather goods.

Novacy offers a range of cases and sleeves in exotic leather for iPad and iPhone.


Product reviews

Products are developed with respect for traditional know-how, finest exotic leathers  (Grade 1) selected by us at our French supplier HERMES CUIRS PRECIEUX. All products are hand-made and hand-stitched in France. The finishing are pushed to the limits making your accessories exceptional.

Our logos are always discret, inside only.

Thin Cases Made in France for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus in genuine black/gold brown Alligator.


Thin Cases Made in France for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus in genuine black/natural/blue jeans Python.



Sleeves hand-made and hand-stitched in France for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus in genuine black/gold brown Alligator, skin lined with patent goat skin.

Sleeves hand-made and hand-stitched in France for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus in genuine black/natural/blue jeans Python, skin lined with patent goat skin.



Sleeves hand-made and hand-stitched in France for iPad Mini 3 and iPair Air 2 genuine black/gold brown Alligator, skin lined with patent goat skin and magnetic closure.



Sleeves hand-made and hand-stitched in France for iPad Mini 3 and iPair Air 2 genuine black/natural/blue jeans Python, skin lined with patent goat skin and magnetic closure.


Price

We use the finest high quality leathers (identical to those used by well-known French brand) and have artisans who require time to create perfectly hand-crafted products.

Several examples to prove that our prices are affordable:

Well-know brand of sleeve machine stitched for iPhone in Calf leather : $335

Our sleeve HAND-STITCHED for iPhone in Python :  $275

Well-know brand of sleeve machine stitched for iPad in Calf leather : $900

Our sleeve HAND-STITCHED for iPad in Python :  $650

Well-know brand of sleeve machine stitched for iPad in Alligator : $7750

Our sleeve HAND-STITCHED for iPad in Alligator : $3700

Our products are full hand-made and hand-stitched.


Why we need $15,000


We need $15,000 to buy leather stock and to pay the manufacturers so as to launch the production of the articles.

If we attain this objective of $15,000, we shall be able to offer new colours and different types of leathers.


Please note

We shall do our best to deliver the products beginning June.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any news along the way, we'll let you know! 

Thank you for your support !

WWW.NOVACY-PARIS.COM

story:
More than 200 golfers from 18 Special Olympics North America programs will compete in the 13th annual Special Olympics North America Golf Invitational Tournament at the Wigwam Resort in Litchfield Park, Ariz., Sept. 6-9, 2012. 
 
Special Olympics golf, part of a worldwide sports program for children and adults with intellectual disabilities, offers five levels of play for athletes with different golf abilities. Olympic-style Opening Ceremonies will tee off the event on Thursday, Sept. 6, with three competitive golf rounds played Friday, Sept. 7, through Sunday, Sept. 9.
 
Awards ceremonies for the golf competition will take place immediately following the final round on Sunday, Sept. 9. KPMG, The PGA of America, USGA and PGA Tour are presenting sponsors of the 2012 tournament.
PGA Professional Greg Leicht will share the tournament director role with Special Olympics Senior Sports Development Manager Craig Pippert.
 
Bill Schack who is also the PR director for the Special Olympics in Leon county and Cyrus Benjamin Buker (defending State of Florida Unified Golf Gold Medalists)have been invited to represent the Florida Special Olympics.

This trip will be very costly !!! But what an honor to be able to have this opportunity !!!

The money raised will help with the following expenses:

UPDATE- ALL THE ITEMS BELOW HAVE BEEN DONATED !!!! WE ARE NOW WORKING ON $$ FOR AIRLINE TICKETS, CAR RENTAL, GIFT CARDS FOR FOOD,GAS ETC !!!!!!

 Golf balls.
 Team golf hats.
 Team Golf Shirts.
 Team Golf Towels
 Restaurant gift cards to keep them fed.
 Luggage fees.
 Golf club Travel Bags.
 Matching team golf bags 
 Cost of our airline tickets.
 Cost of our rental car.

We are also pushing hard locally for any donations of any of the above.

Please give anything you can !! You would NOT believe how far just $5.00 can go from mulitple people. This is not an opportunity many get to get involved in.

There are no words to thank you enough for anything you can do or any connections you may have !!!!

story:
Nakate exists to provide unique designs from Ugandan artisans to fashion conscious women. We use the creation of our pieces as an opportunity to establish relationships connecting Ugandan professionals and artisans with marginalized women in rural villages – using African talent to nourish African growth and development.

  • Rather than focusing on poverty, disease or a “feel good” story, we seek to connect directly with Africa’s rising talent and enable them to do the work of empowerment in their own communities.

  • We begin with networking within African diaspora and professionals on the continent and then connect them to self formed artisan groups on the ground, using African talent to nurture African growth and development.
  •  We seek out individuals in their 20s and 30s with vision for the continent’s future and a desire to learn more about social entrepreneurship.

  • We make it a priority to create change within business models that are already formed in the local culture, both honoring the way the local business culture works, and seeking to use it for the development of smart business. Within this ideology, we have discovered that it is common for artisan groups of 50-200 women to form around Ugandan run AIDS clinics and sell together at the local market. This is the model we invest in.
  • We run a 6 month test period with our young professionals as business development interns, asking them to connect us to a self formed group of female artisans, and help us bring them to scale in an international product market through developing their design, quality control and timetables to our standards.
  • We have done this effectively for over a year, and are currently looking to put two more professionals into our intern process. We’ve developed a line of paper beads this way, and are looking to do it with three more product lines this year.
  • We currently empower approximately 12 women to provide for their families, and provide supplemental income to dozens of others. We are looking to quadruple our impact in 2013.


I have been given a small business loan to expand our impact through our partnership with individual artisans in Uganda and will be leaving on July 17th to expand our product lines and, with that expansion, our work to increase the financial independence of our partners.

Over the next four weeks I will:

  • Meet directly with the artisans we work with to share a small business development curriculum I have developed with my entrepreneur coach.

  • Take and develop new Nakate designs created by a designer exclusively for Nakate. Through the development of these designs, I wil teach our artisans to implement simple systems of quality control, production timing, consistency and design patterns.

  • Buy new stock from these artisans to sell to our wholesalers and in our online store, directly affecting their ability to pay their bills and provide for their families through creative means, rather than back breaking labor or participation in the local sex industry.

  • Grow our impact through working with an increased number of artisans through expanding our lines into more cow horn pieces and hand made bags.

  • Network with more professionals and entrepreneurs in Kampala to expand our management team on the ground.

In order to fully reach our impact goal, I am raising $1,000 more toward my work on the ground this summer. Your contribution to our work will be directly invested into purchasing stock from the women we work with, directly improving their financial, physical and emotional well being and assisting me in creating a larger impact on the lives of our partners through empowerment and business rather than a hand out.


Alternatively, you can shop our online store, currently 40% off with the code NEWSTOCK: http://www.nakateproject.com/store/shop-our-col....
